* * * * *

Chapter 1: Black and Gold

Ridley: *He noticed the party step back with intimidation.* "Well-" *He smirked and clapped his hands together.* "This will be a very awkward fight if you all intend on being consumed with fear." *He smiled at each party member, waiting for their response.*

Lance: *He grunted and placed his hand on the side, hiding his anger.* "That smirk-"

Ridley: "What about it?" *He touched his lips, looking at Lance in confusion.*

Lance: "I won't ever forget it." *Lightning sparked and swirled in between his fingers, forming itself into a sword.*

Ridley: *He noticed the lightning, lowering his hand in a curious manner.* "I'm intrigued? What Remenistal is that?"

Cameron: *He reached over his shoulder and grabbed hold to something.* "Humph-" *His image disappeared leaving behind a swirl of sparks.*

Lance: "It's an ultimate Rostickal!" *He took a step forward and flashstepped, causing a pulse of grass to blow where he stood.*

Ridley: "Ultimate Remenistal?"

PKMY: "Tssk-" *She punched her fists together and charged towards Ridley.*

Season: "Tyler, Lezard, Holland, be on guard, the fight has finally started-" *He slowly stepped away from the party and a brown glyph formed itself under him.*

Tyler: (The final battle... This is it!...)

Freya: *She stood next to Holland.* (When do you want me to strike?)

Holland: *He shook his head, patiently waiting.* "Right now we'll just get in the way-"

Lance: *He appeared next to Ridley with the lightning sword raised.* "..." *He stared at Ridley's head, quickly slicing downwards.* (Got him?!)

Ridley: *He arched backwards barely avoiding the lightning.* "Did you seriously think you could possibly perform a sneak attack on me?"

Lance: *He watched the grass burn around his lightning in shock, as if he wasn't expecting Ridley to move.* (Dammit-)

Ridley: "Haha, you're certainly a funny one-"

Lance: "You!" *He raised his arm and took large steps towards Ridley, aimlessly slicing the lightning across his face.*

Cameron: *His image appeared in the air above Ridley.* "Humph-" *He looked down, raising his blue sword with glyphic symbols engraved on it.*

Ridley: *He avoided Lance's strikes without raising his arms.* (From above?) *He thought to himself, keeping his focus on Lance.*

Cameron: "Air Slash." *He waved the sword downwards, slicing a visible air slash towards Ridley.*

PKMY: "Yahoo-" *She somersaulted and flipped towards Ridley.*

Lance: "Avoid this then-" *He gripped the lightning with both hands, causing the lightning to double in thickness.* "Harh!" *He raised his arms and sliced it downwards.*

Ridley: "Aha, the folly!" *He raised both his arms and caught the visible air blade in one hand and the lightning in the other.*

Lance: "W-Wat?!" *He gasped in disbelief, watching the lightning dance in Ridley's hand.*
Cameron: "Preposterous!" *He looked down with a shocked face.* (He caught it with his bare hand!-)

PKMY: "Harh!" *She flipped into striking distance and kicked the ground, jumping over Ridley.*

Ridley: "Oh, what a sigh." *He flicked his wrists, causing both the air blade and lightning to shatter away.*

Lance: *He stumbled back with disorientation.* "Arh-?"

Ridley: "Hmm?" *He tilted his head up and watched PKMY jump above him in a spiralling motion.*

PKMY: "Raging Swirling Strike." *She swayed her arms and suddenly spiralled faster in the air, violently kicking Ridley in the face.*

Ridley: *He moved his arm at an amazing speed and blocked her kick with his hand.* "Flexible little one-"

PKMY: *Her hair and clothes flapped forward, due to suddenly stopping.* (How-?)

Ridley: "On Kath's behalf, I won't accept your betrayal to the warriors." *He smirked at PKMY, tightly holding onto her foot.*

Lance: *He clicked his fingers and lightning swirled in his hands, forming another sword.* "Don't act tough, I can do this all day!?"

Ridley: "Hmm? I see-"

PKMY: "Tssk." *She frowned with anger and pointed both hands at Ridley.*

Ridley: "With my power open the dark gates, silently gather and consume the hate-" *His arm shook, as he kept a firm grip on PKMY's foot.*

PKMY: *She tried to kick her way out of Ridley's grip, watching a green glyph spiral in front of her hands.* "AIR SWIRL-"

Ridley: "MANIPULATE, DARK STATE" *He pushed PKMY into the air and he twirled around, causing swirls of darkness to spiral around his hands.*

Cameron: *He landed on the ground and pointed the sword at Ridley, as his body glowed a shade of blue.* "Streaming Sword."

Ridley: "Please accept this token!" *He flicked his wrists up and a wave of darkness erupted from the ground, slamming into Lance and Cameron's stomach.*

Lance: "Bah-"
Cameron: "Gah-"

Lezard: "I know he's Consultant level, but it's not like he's even trying."

Holland: "..."

PKMY: *She looked down from the air, gritting her teeth at Ridley.* (He threw me this high with a wave of his hand?) *She kicked her legs, causing her to spiral back into striking distance.*

Ridley: *He looked back up, staring at PKMY surprised.* "Oh? Kicking off the air by creating a platform of Astragons, allowing you to alter course? Amazing." *He mumbled to himself with a smirk.*

PKMY: *She touched the ground with her toes and tightened her fists, readying to punch Ridley in the face.* "Shut it-"

Ridley: "NIGHTSHADE" *He straightened his arm and a ball of shadow grew in front of his palm.* "Goodbye, red-haired capt-"

*A pillar of rock erupted up from the ground and smashed into Ridley's chest, causing an instant dirt cloud to form around him.*

Season: "GROUND SHAKING"

PKMY: *The tremors caused her to lose balance.* "Tssk, watch where you're using your Rostical!" *She looked behind her at Season.*

Season: "Not now!-"

*A stream of black lightning blasted out of the dirt cloud and into PKMY's shoulder, causing her to scream.*

Holland: "Amy!"

Fryfry: *A swarm of fireflies flew out of a spiralling red glyph, which instantly materialised in the air.* (Myrror Shield.) *The outer fireflies crossed paths in front of PKMY, forming a glass-like reflective shield.*

Ridley: *He watched the black lightning flash in front of the shield.* "Oh? You blocked it?"

PKMY: *She watched the shield shine, causing the black lightning's stream to break.* (Thanks, Fryfry.)

Fryfry: "Bzzzst."

Ridley: "Marvellous-"

Lezard: "HEALING RINGS" *He waved his arms in the air and white rings spiralled around Lance, Cameron and PKMY.*

Tyler: "Here-" *He reached into the RPG bag and quickly threw his hand in the air.*

Ridley: "Oh-?" *He watched a green gas spiral around PKMY, before fading into nothing.*

Tyler: "Acro Berries!"

Ridley: *He raised his arm and casually waved it to one side, instantly blowing the dirt away* "Hmm? This is no good."

*Ridley shook his head, watching Lance, Cameron and PKMY stand back on their feet, as if nothing happened.*

PKMY: *She lowered her head and gritted her teeth.* (Not a good start-)

Ridley: "Lezard, I like your father's hat." *He watched the rings of light fade, causing him to glance at Lezard.* "It suits you-"

Lezard: "Don't you dare!"

Cameron: *He tightened his grip on the sword and flashstepped next to Ridley.* "Humph." *He sliced the air across, causing Ridley to step back.*

Ridley: "Wow, that was close-"

Lance: "LIGHTNING BLAST" *He straightened his arm and a stream of lightning blasted towards Ridley from behind.*

Ridley: "Forceful sounds, radiate the ground, as deep as abyss, DARK STYX" *Shadow enveloped Lance's lightning, causing it to swirl around him and towards Cameron.*

PKMY: "Lance, stop it now!"

Lance: "Tssk-" *He looked at PKMY in shock and quickly lowered his arm, causing the lightning to disintegrate away.*

Cameron: *His eyes widened, as strings of lightning sparked past his face.* "..."

Ridley: "Oh, so close!" *He smiled with failure.* "I'm hoping one of you destroys yourself-"

PKMY: "Shut up! Seven finger snap-flying palm strike." *She placed her hand behind her side, flashstepping in front of Ridley.*

Lance: *He aimed for Ridley's side and pushed forward, blasting a stream of lightning towards him.* "LIGHTNING BLAST"

PKMY: "Harh!" *She pushed her hand into Ridley's chest, causing a water-like ripple to envelop her hand.* "Heh, you're gone-"

Ridley: "Oh, really?" *He mumbled in a bored-like tone, casually grabbing onto her wrist.* "Snap."

PKMY: "Snap?" *She looked confused, as she tried to pull herself away.*

Ridley: "Oh yes, the snapping-" *He flicked his wrist, causing PKMY to collapse to the ground in pain.*

PKMY: "Argh-"

Ridley: "Tssk, tssk, Lance-" *He swayed his free hand to the side, backhanding the lightning away from him.*

Lance: *He lowered his arm, frowning in shock.* "How the-?"

Ridley: *He focused his attention back to PKMY, tightening his grip.* "Haven't heard that snap yet-"

*A ring of fire flared in Ridley's face and exploded, allowing PKMY to kick herself out of his grip.*

Ridley: "My, Caesar-" *He slid back along the grass, waving smoke out of his face.* "What a strong burst of Neurons-"

Season: "FIRE'S PULSE" *A ring of flame extinguished around his hand.*

PKMY: *She slid back along the ground on her toes, noticing an instant bruise which formed around her wrist.* (He was going to break my wrist!-)

Lance: *He sighed with anger and clicked his fingers, causing lightning to spark.* "Air Slash." *He raised his lightning sword, watching Ridley slide across the ground.* "Harh." *He slashed across his shoulder and a visible air blade sliced through the air towards Ridley.*

Ridley: "Meaningless-"

Cameron: *His image appeared directly in front of Ridley.* "Hmph-" *He lunged the sword towards Ridley's neck.*

Ridley: "Sword of arts, this sword is the start, rot and decay, haste and make no delay, ROTTING SWORD" *A black sword puffed like smoke in his hand.*

PKMY: "Tssk." *She shook his hand, watching Cameron's sword touch Ridley's neck.* (Got him-?!)

Ridley: "Good reflexes, Cameron-" *He flicked his wrist and moved the black sword at blinding speeds, blocking Cameron's strike.*

Cameron: *He watched sparks flash off his sword in shock, as if he wasn't expecting Ridley to block his attack.* (It is smoke-)

Ridley: *He looked past the swords, smiling at Cameron.* "Very strong-"

Cameron: *He leant forward with gritted teeth, attempting to jab the sword through Ridley's black sword.* (I can not break it!)

Apollo: (It just shows what kind of level his Neurons are at!-)

Ridley: *He raised his other arm and pointed it to his side without losing eye contact on Cameron.* "You've become much stronger-" *He caught an air blade which screeched from Lance's direction.*

Cameron: *His arm and cape blew in the wind, caused by Lance's attack.* (Have I underestimated the Consultant's power?)

Ridley: *He flicked his wrist, causing the air blade to swirl away.* "Useless-" *He smirked and straightened his arm towards Cameron's face.* "NIGHTSH-"

PKMY: *She flashstepped next to Ridley.* "Double Smack." *She spun around and backhanded Ridley across the face.*

Ridley: "Oof-?!"

PKMY: *She spiralled around and slapped downwards, flicking his nose.* "Heh-" *She placed her hands on the ground and lifted her legs in the air, kicking him in the stomach.*

Ridley: *He leant forward, pretending to ignore PKMY's kick.* "Strong, Amy-"

Lance: "Air Slash." *He sliced his lightning sword downwards, causing a line of dirt to blast towards Ridley.*

PKMY: "Thanks, shithead!-" *She stood on one hand and looked up, forming a fist with her free hand.* "Airs pulsing, searing and soaring, rippling strike."

Ridley: "Hmm, oh what shall I ever do?"

Cameron: "Die!" *He grunted in anger.*

Ridley: "I can't do that-" *He slashed the sword, knocking Cameron back.*

Cameron: *He awkwardly stepped back, watching black and blue sparks scatter off his sword.* (Not possible! His Neurons are at a level where a jab from my sword could not break its structural integrity-)

Ridley: "Swirling shadows flock, with the motion all will block, darkness strikes hearts with fear, NIGHT SPHERE" *A whirl of mist-like shadow swirled around him, forming into a barrier.*

PKMY: "Harh." *She punched towards Ridley's feet and a pulse of shadow swirled in front of her.*

Ridley: *He noticed a punch-like dent in the shield outside, causing him to glance at PKMY.* (That would've smarted.)

PKMY: (My Neuron-filled punch! It was blocked!) *She flipped back up, landing on her feet.*

Ridley: *The ground suddenly burst next to him and a slash-like trail of shadow puffed in the air above his shield.* "Oh? Another Air Slash, Lance? Not bad."

Lance: "Shut it, will you?!" *He ran towards the shadow-like sphere, straightening his arm at it.*

Tyler: "Season, do something?"

Season: *He shook his head, recalling the time Ridley manipulated Lance's lightning.* "Knowing he can alter the course of Rostical, I don't want to risk it-"

Cameron: *He flashstepped next to the sphere and held the sword with both hands, watching an aura swirl around it.* "I will break your barrier! Hard Blade."

Ridley: "All in attacking range? Oh dear." *He clicked his fingers and the shield exploded, knocking Cameron, PKMY and Lance into the air.*

Lance: "Shit!-"
PKMY: "Tssk!"
Cameron: "Tcch-"

Tyler: "This isn't looking good-"

Lezard: "HEALING RINGS" *He raised his arms and white rings formed themselves around Cameron, PKMY and Lance before they hit the ground.*

Holland: "Alright, Freya, now it's our turn-" *He took a step forward, preparing himself to run.*

Ridley: "Now, now-" *He quickly glanced behind him to the Spacial Funnel.* (It still requires some time-) "Why don't we talk about this?"

Lance: *He grunted and leant up, watching the light heal his grass burns.* "No-"

Ridley: "To be honest, Lance, I don't blame you for your disgusting attitude."

Lance: "Wat?"

Ridley: "You are that weak you couldn't even save your beloved best friend."

Lance: *He swayed his arm to the side, causing lightning to swirl into a sword.* "H-Huh?"

Ridley: "If only you were stronger, he would still be alive."

Season: "What is he-?"

Ridley: "I can see it now.. He'd be having a giggle at one of your jokes and just being friendly."

Lance: *He looked shocked and stared at the ground, as the lightning in his hand swirled away.* "I.."

Season: "Lance, don't fall for it!"

Ridley: "Oh, Season, you seem quite cheery."

Season: "What's that supposed to mean?!" *A blue glyph formed itself under his feet.*

Ridley: "Oh? You don't know, do you?!" *He chuckled, casually swaying the black sword to each side.* "Surpreon, it's completely destroyed."

Season: "W-What?" *He stared at Ridley and paused in shock, causing the glyph to slowly fade away.*

Ridley: "I knew about the barrier, and, let me tell you. It was strong." *He smiled and sighed.*

Season: (He can't be telling the truth-) *He dropped to his knees in disbelief.* (How would he even know-..?)

Ridley: "Cameron, why are you attacking me? I have no idea why you would betray me?"

Cameron: *He stood up and faced Ridley, ignoring the white rings which spiralled around him.* "You betrayed me!"

Ridley: "No I didn't? You're my number one. I've put a lot of trust into you."

Tyler: (The barrier? I told him the barrier...) *He shook his head with a dropping jaw, looking at his hands in shock and disgust.*

Cameron: "You sent Sofia to kill me!"

Ridley: "Sofia? That low ranking captain? Don't be absurd! Is this why you never came back to Sorrowprax after your mission with Teresa?"

Cameron: "Teresa was an ex-number one ranking captain!"

Ridley: *He gasped in shock.* "Was she really?"

Cameron: *He paused and hesitantly lowered his sword.* "Y-You did not know?"

Holland: "Don't believe his lies, Cameron! Let's get him, Amy-"

PKMY: "I-I can't-"

Holland: "Why?" *He grunted in confusion, keeping his focus on Ridley.*

PKMY: "H-Holly-" *She held her head in pain and her knees buckled.* "Grr, it hurts!"

Holland: *He looked at PKMY worried, glancing at Lezard.* "What's wrong?!"

Lezard: *He shook his head.* "She's completely healed."

Holland: "Dang it, Amy!" *He ran up to PKMY to see if she was hurt.*

PKMY: "Their emotions, their sudden sadness. It hurts me-"

Ridley: "Oh, you care for each other. It's cute seeing how you all have bonded-"

Holland: *He frowned and looked at Ridley.* "You have nothing to say to me!" *He stood up, causing Freya to growl.* "Let's get him!"

Freya: "Ruff!"

Ridley: "Well, it's true. I have nothing to say to you." *He swayed the black sword, as if he didn't care about the party's presence.*

Lezard: "Lezard will back you up!" *He adjusted his hat and stood in a battle-ready pose.*

Holland: *His muscles bulged and he charged directly for Ridley.* "Freya-" (Gargling Whirlpool behind me to trap him, and I'll attack with several punches.)

Freya: *She pranced behind Holland, growing in size.* (Got it!) *She growled in thought and raised her snout, gargling water.* (Gargling Whirlpool.)

Holland: *He raised his fist and ignored a vortex of water which spiralled around him towards Ridley.* "You seriously need to stop smiling!"

Ridley: "But, I'm excited that I've nearly completed our plan?" *His hair flapped, as strings of water blasted past his sides.*

Holland: *He ran into striking distance, forming a fist.* "Good for you!-"

Ridley: "Good for me." *He looked at Holland with a widening smile.*

Holland: (He's not even attempting to raise his sword against me!-) "Harh." *He squinted his eyes and punched Ridley in the face.*

Freya: (That pain? What happened?!) *She barked in thought, keeping a steady vortex-like swirl of water around Holland and Ridley.*

Holland: "What?" *He grunted in pain as his hand came to a complete stop.*

Ridley: *He stared at Holland's fist.* "Your fist was very close-"

Holland: *He stared in front of him in shock.* "Why?"

Cameron: *He held Holland's fist with an emotionless face.* "I am sorry, I thought you had betrayed me."

Holland: "Answer me, Cameron?!" *He gasped in disbelief.*

Cameron: "Will you forgive me?"

Ridley: "Of course." *He silently smirked at Holland from behind Cameron.*

Holland: *He noticed Ridley's face, causing him to frown.* "H-He's lying!-"

Cameron: "Air Slash." *He waved his sword past Holland, slicing a visible air blade into the distance.*

Freya: "Owroo-?" *She quickly leant forward and jumped to the side, as the ground exploded where she stood.* "Grah?" *She slid on her side across the ground, staring at Cameron with heightened vision.*

Cameron: *He watched the water lose its current, causing it to splash around him.* "Why would he lie? It is understandable once I have heard his side of the story."

Holland: "Cameron."

Cameron: "I am number one of the warriors, I must uphold that title. ICICLE EDGE" *He pushed Holland away and raised his arm, causing a large ice lance to form above him.*

Holland: *His legs shook, as he slid back from Cameron.* "Damn it! Freya."

Freya: "Ruff!" (Aerial Pounce.) *She bent her legs and jumped high into the air.* (Sonic Roar.) *She barked out a visible shockwave towards Cameron.*

Cameron: "Humph." *He pretended to throw a spear, causing the ice to blast into the air towards Freya.*

Holland: "Freya!-" *He watched the shockwave shatter the ice lance into a scattered spray away from her.*

Freya: (I'm fine-) *She extended and flapped her wings, staying in the air.*

Cameron: *He flashstepped in front of Holland and kicked him in the gut.* "Hmph-" *He pushed his foot further and blasted Holland across the ground towards Tyler and Lezard.*

Holland: "Ah-" *He tumbled on the ground, causing Fryfry to swarm towards him.*

Fryfry: *It buzzed around Holland and raised their shield, causing him to gently slid along the ground.* "Bzzz."

Holland: *He noticed he slowed down and looked over his shoulder, noticing the shield.* "Thanks."

Ridley: *He sighed and placed his hand on his temple.* "Cameron, keep him busy. Once I complete my plan, I'll deal with Sofia myself."

Cameron: *He nodded his head in a professional manner and raised the sword, pointing it at the party.* "Of course."

Apollo: (Cameron, listen to me! I do not believe this is the right thing to do-)

Cameron: (The notion of Sofia telling the truth is a fallacy.)

Ridley: (A loyal number one-) *He slowly turned around and walked towards the Spacial Funnel.* (Such idiocy.) *He shook his head with a smirk.*

*A cold gust of wind blew across the vacant land.*

Lezard: "His mind games impacted the entire party with offensive capabilities." *He mumbled with a loss of hope, causing Tyler to look at him.*

Tyler: "Cameron, w-what are you doing?"

Holland: *The shield shattered as the fireflies disintegrated into nothing.* "He's not listening to reason!" *He stood up straight and stared at Cameron.*

Tyler: *He took short deep breaths.* (This, this, this is not how I imagined-) "-This shouldn't be turning out so bad!"

Lezard: "Not you too, Tyler-?"

Tyler: "Cameron, you're intelligent like Teresa! Why are you being so easily fooled?!" *He yelled with emotion, causing Freya, Holland and Lezard to look at him in shock.*

Freya: *She circled in the air and kept a close eye on Cameron.* (His stance, there is no opening.)

Cameron: "I was a fool to think the Consultant meant any harm towards me!"

Tyler: "No! I thought you were part of the party!" *He reached into the RPG bag, squealing with emotion.*

Cameron: *He focused his attention on Tyler's arm.* "Remove your hand from the bag, or-"

Tyler: "Or you'll what? Defeat me? Kill me?" *He took a step closer, causing Lezard to grab his arm.*

Lezard: "I don't feel any Neurons from you, don't be foolish, young one."

Tyler: *He gently pushed Lezard's hand away.* "I-I'm fine."

PKMY: *She sat on her knees panting while watching Tyler shuffle past her towards Cameron.* (I feel such an immense feeling of fear coming from him-)

Tyler: "Well?!"

Cameron: "I have only seen you use your unusual Ougi-" *He glanced at Season, watching him stare at the ground.* "Perhaps you know something else..."

*Cameron mumbled to himself and squinted his eyes, looking back to Tyler.*

Cameron: "But you have no fighting skills, do not be childish!"

Tyler: "In my opinion, you're the one that's being childish!" *His heart thumped through his shirt.*

Cameron: "My loyalty is with the Consultant-"

Tyler: "Fine, then I'll fight you myself." *His fingers twitched with fear.*

Cameron: *He sighed and pointed the sword at Tyler.* "If you wish to end it, so be it."

----------

Sofia: *She giggled at Lorilei and Cassidy, watching them look at her.* "You two are just staring at me, how boring!"

Cassidy: "I'll show you boring!" *He reached behind his back and pulled his arm in front, causing a string of sparks to scatter around his arm.*

Sofia: "Oh?" *She looked at the sparks with slight excitement.*

Cassidy: *He held a divine bamboo staff which was four times larger than his body.* "Why did thou betray us?!"

Sofia: "'Cause you were all boring."

Lorilei: "That's not good, Sofia."

Cassidy: "You bitch." *He held the staff with both hands and tightened his grip, swirling his arms and hands.*

Lorilei: *She watched the staff move at near blinding speeds, listening to its hollow, whoosh-like sounds.* "This is madness, Sofia."

Sofia: "In order to level up, you need to step up the difficulty." *She licked her lips, giggling in an evil-like manner.*

Cassidy: "You're ill!-"

Sofia: "The only person that can give you opportunities, is yourself!"

Cassidy: *He frowned at Sofia, spinning the staff at an increasing speed.* "Then you will suffer."

Sofia: *She ignored Cassidy, admiring his skill with the staff.* "Hah? That's nice-"

Cassidy: *He raised the staff behind him in one hand and charged towards Sofia, causing her to look alert.* "Betrayal is not tolerated-"

Sofia: (I better take Cassidy and Lorilei seriously-) *She reached to her thigh and raised her arm, causing a wave of sparks to scatter behind her.* "Yee harh!"

*Sofia raised her arm and swirled a large leather whip above her, catching Cassidy's attention.*

Cassidy: "A whip.. Like I said to you many times-" *He spun around and jabbed the staff past Sofia's head.*

Sofia: *Her ponytail violently flapped around the staff.* "Missed."

Cassidy: "Whips are not a good choice of weapon."

Sofia: "Hahe hahehahe-" *She opened her mouth in excitement and flicked her wrist, causing the whip to slither towards Cassidy.*

Cassidy: *He quickly leant back and whacked the staff across Sofia's face.* "Humph." *He jumped to the side, barely avoiding the whip.*

Sofia: "Hahe, ouch-" *She looked to the side where Cassidy hit her.*

Lorilei: *She looked down, noticing a crack in the stone from where Sofia's whip landed.* "She has Neurons inside the whip!-"

Sofia: "Hahe-" *She laughed at Lorilei and flicked the whip back into the air above her.*

Cassidy: "Give up-"

Sofia: *She paused and stepped back, trying to contain her excitement.* "Sticky Smash."

Cassidy: "Humph." *He ignored a growing shade of blue around Sofia's body.* "Harh." *He spun around while spinning the staff in the opposite direction.* "Ha!" *He slammed the staff across Sofia's face, knocking her head to the other side.*

Sofia: "Hahe!" *A small stream of blood ran from her lips, causing her to lick it.* "Delicious-"

Cassidy: *He spun the staff in one hand as he stepped back, looking at Sofia in disgust.* "You were always strange, but you weren't ever like this."

Sofia: "How would you know?" *The whip slithered towards Cassidy, as if it had a mind of its own.*

Cassidy: "Darn it-" *He spun his body and the staff.* "Harh!" *He whacked the tip of the whip away, causing a stream of sparks to scatter.*

Sofia: *She watched the whip slightly flick back, due to Cassidy's swing.* "You've grown weak-"

Cassidy: "What are you talking about? You're the one that seems weak-"

Sofia: "Hiyah-" *She waved her arm across, snapping the whip towards Cassidy's face.*

Cassidy: "Sphere of Might." *He hit the staff on the ground, causing a sphere-like pulse to blow the whip into the opposite direction.*

Sofia: "Haheha!" *She smirked, discreetly watching the whip pierce through the air on its own accord.*

Cassidy: *He frowned at Sofia, pointing his staff at her.* "Is your defeat that hilarious?"

Lorilei: *She looked to the side and gasped.* "Cassidy!-"

Sofia: *She watched the whip slither into striking distance, suddenly wrapping itself around Cassidy's wrist.* "Hahe, whips aren't a good choice of weapon?"

Cassidy: "How-?" *He spoke under his breath, listening to the leather tighten around his wrist.* "You didn't move your arm-?"

Sofia: "Gotcha-"

Cassidy: ".. I'll have to use it already?" *He threw his staff into the air, causing Sofia to look up in disappointment.*

Sofia: "Given up-?"

Cassidy: "Ougi-" *He flicked his wrist, causing the staff to spiral downwards.*

Cassidy: "One-"

Sofia: "Hah?" *She rapidly blinked in discomfort.*

Sofia: "Kerh-"

Sofia: "Hahe-" *She smirked, noticing a slight graze mark on her cheekbone.*

Sofia: *She continued to open and close her eyes, ignoring the constant and consistent strikes of Cassidy's staff.* (I'm going to have to use these powers already?)

Lezard: "What-?" *He spoke under his breath, watching the bright beam pulse through Ridley and across the land.*

Season: *He buckled at the knees and grabbed the trident with both hands, using it to support himself.* "Did you enjoy my Grand Rostical?"

Ridley: *The beam's size shrunk before it faded into particles of blue twinkles.* "Argh-" *He hunched forward in pain, covering a large hole in his stomach with both hands.*

Season: "I've created something stronger, another variant of the Rostical you encountered before."

Ridley: "What-ck are you babbling about?" *He groaned under his breath, struggling to keep eye contact with Season.*

Season: "I-I.. Will show you."

Ridley: *He closed his eyes.* (I will confront whatever power he says he possesses. Then, I'll unleash the other side...)

Tyler: (How can Ridley stand with such a ridiculous wound?)

Ridley: (The same power that killed Teresa Seraph, and, that experimental number one, Jewel..) *He slightly smirked to himself and opened his eyes, watching blood run down his hand.*

Season: "My Rostical explodes deep in the hot abyss-" *He grunted, raising the trident above his head.*

Ridley: (That incantation?)

*Ridley had a flashback of the purple firework which exploded the tree in a pulse.*

Ridley: (That was a powerful move, but he has already used that. Maybe the damage has affected his memory-?) "Hahaha."

Season: "Grander than the seven stars of The Astral Plains, blast, ignite, brighten the area with your spectacular array-"

PKMY: *She looked around, noticing the area become pitch black.* (I haven't seen you use this before, Season-)

Season: "I shall a-tear your insignificant bonds, with the seraphic blood, this battle will finish!-" *Rings of purple glyphs spiralled all around his body, blowing his hair and robes to each side.*

Ridley: *His hair blow back, as he stared at the purple glyphs in a worried manner.* (That pure level of Neurons he's gathering, it's actually a growing worry-)

Tyler: "How can he-?"

Darkwing: "Skree."

Lorilei: "Oh my? Did you hear that?" *She flapped her wings, slightly slowing down.*

Alicia: "No, those creatures." *She looked around frightened, catching Celest's attention.*

Celest: "What creatures-?"

*A black cloud of shadow flew off the side of the mountain and flocked directly towards Celest, Lorilei and Alicia.*

Lorilei: "What are they?"

Celest: "A cloud?"

Alicia: "They are skeletal creatures we believe are the Consultant's doing."

Celest: *She stared at the flock of Darkwings with widening eyes.* "There's too many to count!"

Darkwing: "Skree!" *It flapped its wings, as it flew through the air.*

Celest: "Why couldn't thy sense these before?" *She stopped, hovering in the air.*

Alicia: *She spiralled back and silently stared at Lorilei and Celest, noticing their anxious faces.* (I really dislike those creatures!)

Locki: "W-What do you need to tell me?"

Pepper: "How I was given life."

Locki: "Given? So, you were dead?"

Pepper: "Yes-cghk" *She gagged, causing Locki to look at her in shock.*

Locki: "What?" *He looked down and noticed black veins growing out of Pepper's chest, stomach and neck.*

Sofia: *She grunted in rage as she covered one eye in pain.* "Game over!" *She screamed as blood poured down her arm.*

Locki: "What are-?" *He closely inspected the veins with double vision.* (Whips?)

Sofia: *She sniffed and wiped her face, smearing dirt across her cheek.* "Haheahe!"

Locki: *He heard screeches in the distance, causing him to look into the air in confusion.* "What is that?"

Sofia: "The army of Darkwings! I summoned them to kill your other party members, hahehaheaheahea."

Pepper: *Blood ran from her wounds and dripped on to the ground.* "What is this?"

Sofia: "My Ougi! Multi-Vein Snap."

Pepper: *She gasped and dropped to her knees in front of Locki.* "It's draining-"

Locki: *He watched Sofia's black vein-like whips move through Pepper.* "G-Get them out!"

Sofia: *Her visible wounds started to heal and close up, causing her to sigh in pleasure.* "Your Radiatons, are filled with hope, love and warmth. It tastes so nice-" *She raised her hand and licked the blood off her fingers.*

Locki: *He helplessly stared at Pepper with desperation.* (This infuriates me, I can't do anything-)

Pepper: "With your attack, you have determined your own fate!"

Sofia: "Hah? I've determined my own fate?" *She stood up straight and lowered her arms, picking shards of bark out of her healing waist.* "How? I'm all healed now and I've punctured several of your major organs."

Pepper: *The 'S'-shaped tattoo appeared on her forehead.* "Your being will be purified."

Locki: (Something feels odd with Pepper-) *He looked at her in confusion.* (She's been struck with life-threatening wounds, yet, she talks as if she's going to win-)

Pepper: "This will take a moment, but once you realise what is going to happen. You will tremble and cry in fear-" *She looked over her shoulder, staring at Sofia with cold eyes.*

Sofia: *She grunted, as she hid her intimidation.* (How dare she intimidate me!) *She frowned and pulled the handle back, violently ripping the whips out of Pepper's back.*

----------

Ridley: *He watched Jewel take several steps towards him.* (Despite these two ladies being number one in ranking. My power has-) *A heartbeat pulsed through his body, causing him to gag and stumble forward.* (What?)

Teresa: *She glanced over her shoulder and looked at PKMY, watching her lay on the ground in a worried manner.* (Even knowing Ridley's power, he has still managed to incapacitate the entire party?)

Ridley: *He coughed and stood up straight, hiding his sudden loss of composure.* (That was a sickly feeling-) *He looked up into the sky and noticed the red moon.*

Jewel: "I will not fail this time!" *She panted with her mouth open.*

Ridley: (Blast, The Rubistral Moon is already taking its toll on me-) "I have no time for this."

Jewel: *She glanced at PKMY and the surrounding area.* "Teresa, move her out of the way and we'll tag team this disgusting tyrant!"

Teresa: "Indeed." *She hesitantly lowered the Pentarang and reached down to pick PKMY up.*

PKMY: "Memories.. Urhh.."

Teresa: *She noticed PKMY's skin sizzle and burn, causing her to discreetly gasp with widening eyes.* (What has Amy done to receive these burns?!)

*Teresa quickly analysed the burns, picking PKMY up.*

Teresa: (It is as if she has come into contact with a highly concentrated burst of Neurons? I do not see any Roharnia, thus, is not plausible?)

Ridley: (This fight could have turned out for the worst-) *He raised his hand, watching the tip of his fingers twitch.* (Regardless of my morals, I have no choice but to kill them all before my powers are drained to the moon.)

Jewel: *She flashstepped in front of Ridley.* "Take this-"

Ridley: *He looked up and smiled.* "Harh!" *He punched her in the face, causing an eruption of darkness to explode around her.* "Hmph-"

Jewel: *She stumbled back and suddenly warped into the air.* "Which one is the real one? Hee Tee." *Her voice echoed in every direction.*

Ridley: (Another illusion?)

Lance: *He started to breathe normally, causing him to stand up with a grunt.* (What's happening?)

Ridley: (She fools people by the eyes and hearing, and depending on her stamina even touch-) *He closed his eyes.*

Jewel: "Hee tee tee."

Ridley: *He opened his eyes and raised his arm, as a black sword puffed into his hand.* (I have no time for this, seriously-)

Lance: *He slowly exhaled through his mouth, wiping stress-induced sweat off his face.* (That was a shit feeling.. It felt like the same achin' you get from the flu.)

Ridley: "Found you-" *He shouted in a serious manner and flashstepped above the ground several feet away, violently ramming the sword into the vacant air.*

Jewel: "Kah-" *Her image warped and appeared in front of Ridley, silently staring at him with a dropping jaw.*

Ridley: *He landed on the ground, sighing in accomplishment.* "It's a shame I couldn't use your powerful illusions to my advantage."

Jewel: "H-How-?" *She spoke under her breath, as blood ran in between her eyes and down her nose.*

Ridley: "You can't fool me twice." *He let go of the sword and stepped back, watching Jewel struggle to stay on her feet.*

Teresa: *She held PKMY in her arms and gasped.* (Jewel's Neuron signature!-) *She quickly turned around, instantly noticing a black sword pierced through Jewel's head.*

Ridley: "This time, no more surprises, please. Astragons at my command, no mercy for the damned, with all my might, DARK STRIKE"

Teresa: "Tcch-" *She stood up and faced Ridley in anger, as her body glowed a shade of blue.* "Typhoon's-"

Jewel: *Darkness covered her head, causing tears to silently run down her cheeks.* (I'm sorry, Teresa-)

Ridley: *He turned around and clicked his fingers, causing the shadow to explode.* "Who's next?"

Teresa: "Jewel!"

Lance: "Sh-Shit." *He watched Jewel's body collapse to the ground with widening eyes, as terror filled his body.* (Her head just exploded!-)

Teresa: "You!" *She screamed in anguish.*

PKMY: *Her hair floated as if she was in water.* (This feeling-...) *She coughed out more blood and her vision blurred as she jumped in and out of consciousness.*

Lance: *He suddenly flashstepped and stood next to Teresa, facing Ridley with anger.* "I feel a little better from his last attack, let's kick his ass, aye."

Teresa: "Let's do it." *She grunted with growing rage, as Jewel's body disintegrated into tiny white orbs.*

Ridley: *He faced Teresa who raised the Pentarang and Lance whose lightning sparked in his hand.* "Did I strike a nerve?"

Lance: *He stepped forward and raised the lightning sword.* "Watev-"

*The Spacial Funnel warped and a clear image of a train appeared in it.*

Ridley: "Oh?" *He turned around with excitement and looked back to Teresa and Lance.* "A little more delayed than I expected-"

Lance: *He glanced at the Spacial Funnel and paused, tilting his head in disbelief.* (It can't be-)

Ridley: "But, I bid my farewell." *He smiled in happiness and flashstepped in front of the Spacial Funnel.*

Teresa: *She stared at the train, lowering the Pentarang in confusion.* "What is that Rosterology device?"

Lance: "I-It's a train."

Teresa: "A train?"

Ridley: "Finally!" *He stepped through the Spacial Funnel and his hair instantly blew back, as he stepped on the top of the moving train.*

Lance: *He noticed a country-like landscape the train railed through.* "That's several suburbs away from Dee Highs!"

Teresa: "Tcch, come on!"

Lance: "D-Damn right!"

*Teresa and Lance flashstepped in front of the Spacial Funnel and braced themselves, watching Ridley walk down the train.*

Teresa: "We won't have long-"

Lance: "L-Long for what?"

Teresa: "Until the lack of Neurons and Astragons take its toll on us."

Lance: "G-Got it."

Teresa: "I do not believe I would have said this several months ago, but we fight as equals, comrades, Lance."

Lance: "Aye?" *He looked to his side, ignoring his rapidly blowing hair caused by the Spacial Funnel.*

Teresa: "I have no desire to experience any more loss of those that I value."

Lance: "Let's do this." *He nodded his head and stepped through the Spacial Funnel.*

Teresa: *She stepped forward and her hair and cape instantly blew back, as strong winds howled past her.* "What is this?" *She squinted her eyes and raised her arms, trying to block the wind.*

Lance: *He slightly lost balance as the train vibrated under his feet.* "Wat are you doin'!?"

Ridley: "Huh?" *He turned around in shock, as if he wasn't expecting their presence.* "You followed me? Haha, the folly! My powers aren't restricted here!"

Lance: "But, I got the advantage."

Ridley: "Oh?" *He glanced over his shoulder and stared into the distance, noticing several large buildings.* "Magnificent." *He unintentionally ignored Lance, smirking with accomplishment.*

Lance: *He looked past Ridley and noticed the buildings.* "Shit, we're heading into the city."

Teresa: *She looked behind her, noticing the warped air.* "At the very least, the Spacial Funnel is following us."

Lance: "Yea."

Ridley: "Come? I don't mind waiting, you'll eventually be drained of your Remenistal." *He chuckled to himself, focusing his attention back to Lance and Teresa.*

Sofia: *She noticed the large growing blood puddle underneath Pepper.* "You keep saying that, but I see your game over, it's inevitable."

Sofia: *Her eyes widened.* "What of it?" *She hissed in frustration.*

Sofia: "Excuse me?!"

Pepper: "Are you ready?" *Her garments slowly glowed and started to warp.*

Sofia: "For what?" *She stepped back and flicked the whip to her side, causing it to slap the air.*

Chapter 2: All for One

Ridley: (This is excellent.. Just as I theorised-) *He smirked at Lance and Teresa, watching his hair rapidly flap on his forehead.* (At the cost of The Rubistral Moon's drawbacks, my Neurons and Astragons are not fading away-)

*Ridley looked at his hand and formed a fist, chuckling to himself in thought.*

Ridley: (Not the very slightest.)

Lance: *He raised his lightning sword, staring at the black sword in Ridley's hand.* "Alright, let's get him."

Teresa: "Let us make this quick-" *She stepped forward and flashstepped, causing a momentary shift of the wind's current.*

Lance: "Aha." *He chuckled at Teresa's impatience and watched her suddenly appear behind Ridley.*

Ridley: *He watched Lance chuckle, causing him to frown.* "I don't see what you've got to be happy about-?"

Lance: "Pssht." *He jumped forward and ran towards Ridley with a fading smile.* "..."

Ridley: (Despite being the number one nuisance-) *He stared at Lance and smiled in a condescending manner.* (They're still easily manipulated-)

Lance: *He ran into striking distance, causing him to look serious.* (This guy can't last forever, look how many people he's already fought-)

Ridley: *He firmly held onto the sword and jumped forward, slashing across Lance's shoulder.* "Hmph-"

Lance: "Grr-" *The lightning flashed, as he blocked Ridley's strike.*

Ridley: "You've become faster! I was certain I just struck you then."

Lance: "Just shut up, will you?!"

Teresa: (Using Rostical would not be wise here-) *She stealthily stepped forward, noticing an opening in Ridley's stance.*

Ridley: "Why so cranky, Lance?"

Lance: *He slashed to the side, watching Ridley block his strike.* "Just. Shut. Up."

Ridley: *He held his sword out, watching Lance's lightning violently spark against it.* "Rude-"

Teresa: "Harh." *She raised the Pentarang and jumped forward, slashing Ridley down the back.*

Ridley: "Argh!" *His eyes widened in shock.* (She was behind!-) *He glanced over his shoulder at Teresa.* (Why didn't I notice?! Has this excitement gone to my head?)

Lance: "Ya better look at me!" *He grabbed the lightning with both hands and flicked it to the side, pushing Ridley's sword away.*

Ridley: "The folly-"

Lance: "Pssht, I don't know what that means, but-" *He dropped himself on the train's roof and jabbed the lightning towards Ridley's ankle.* "Hah."

Ridley: *He lifted his leg up, avoiding Lance's jab.* (Still primitive battle positions-)

Teresa: "Humph." *She sliced the Pentarang at blinding speeds across Ridley's head.*

Ridley: *He hunched forward and ducked under Teresa's swing, watching strands of hair blow past his head.* "M-My hair?"

Lance: "Harh!" *He tilted the lightning upwards, jabbing it forward.*

Ridley: *He quickly grabbed the lightning's tip with his hand and pointed the other at Lance's head.* "DARK-"

Teresa: "Shattering Slice." *She spoke in a calm manner and sliced the air downwards.* "Humph."

Ridley: *His eyes widened, as he threw Lance's lightning sword to the side.* (Blast it-)

Lance: "Huh-?"

Ridley: *He jumped forward on top of Lance, riding him along the train.* "Ah-?"

Lance: *He slid across the train, watching his lightning sword spark away.* (Dammit-)

Ridley: *He quickly looked behind him, watching the air shatter like glass.* (That was close, Terra-)

Lance: "Get off me! LIGHTNING BLAST" *He pushed his arm forward and a stream of lightning blasted through Ridley's shoulder and into the air.*

Man: *He drove in a blue car down a country-like road, bobbing his head and hand to the beat of the music.* "'Cause I'm acceptable my way-" *He chuckled and turned the radio down as the music finished playing.* "Man, that song pleases the one and only, Pierce."

Ridley: *He stared at the stream of lightning and grabbed Lance's wrist, causing it to crack several times.* (That hurts-)

Pierce: *He noticed a stream of lightning in the mirror, causing him to swerve off the road.* (What was that?!) *He popped his head out the window and stared at the passing train.* "Filming a movie? Right on!" *He smirked and nodded his head in approval, watching Teresa walk on the train.*

Lance: (LIGHTNING PULSE) *He grunted as rings of blue lightning spiralled around his wrist, causing Ridley to let go.* "Argh-"

Ridley: "Grr." *He raised the black sword, quickly jabbing it towards Lance's head.*

Lance: "Ah!" *He moved his head to the side and the sword sliced his cheek and ear.* (Shit!)

Ridley: (Close-.. It's stuck.) *He frowned in thought, wiggling the sword in an annoyed manner.*

*Several girls giggled inside the train, closely reading from one manga book, oblivious to their surroundings.*

Ling: "Hooh?" *She sat in the train by herself and look up to the roof, instantly noticing the tip of the black sword.* "Oooh?" *She lowered a schoolbook she was reading from and rested it on her lap, squinting her eyes at the sword.*

Teresa: *She flashstepped in the air above Ridley, watching him stand over Lance.* "Typhoon's Pulse." *She lowered the Pentarang and pointed her free hand down at Ridley, aiming at his head.*

Lance: *He noticed Teresa in the air, causing him to struggle.* "Ah, shit-"

Ridley: "Stop struggling, it will only hurt for a little bit-"

Lance: "Gah!-" *He hit Ridley with his elbow and rolled to the side, causing him to gasp in shock.* "C-Crap!" *His hair flapped at an angle as he leant over the edge, staring at the train tracks.*

Teresa: "Humph." *She pushed forward, causing the wind to momentarily blow around her.*

Ridley: "Hmm?" *He looked up and the roof suddenly exploded around him, as an immense blast of wind blew a hole in it.* "Ah-?"

*The hole created a vacuum-like suction, causing Ridley to stumble forward and fall into the train.*

Teresa: "Tcch-" *She flashstepped next to Lance and grabbed his shoulder, pulling him up.*

Lance: *He awkwardly nodded his head at Teresa.* "Th-Thanks-"

Teresa: "Come-" *She turned around and leapt down into the train.* (Every single action requires more Neurons and Astragons. I had to focus more Astragons than normal around my body to ensure maximum efficiency in my aerial performance-)

Ridley: "NIGHTSHADE" *He ran down the cart and pointed his arm behind him, as a stream of black lightning blasted towards Teresa.*

*The passengers screamed and yelled in shock as they all ducked their heads in response.*

Teresa: *She landed on the floor and noticed the lightning, crossing her arms in a defensive manner.* "Tcch-"

Lance: *He fell from the roof and collapsed in front of Teresa, gritting his teeth.* "MAGNETIC RUMBLE" *He shouted and raised his arm from the floor, causing a white shield to expand from his hand.*

Ridley: *He ran into the next cart and noticed security officers running towards him.* (People of justice?)

Teresa: *She watched the black lightning spark against the shield directly in front of her face, causing her hair to flap backwards.* (Ridley..)

*Teresa stared at Ridley's back, listening to the shield's rumbling thunder.*

Teresa: "He is getting away." *She grunted with impatience, catching Lance's attention.*

Lance: *He stood up, causing the shield to disintegrate with the black lightning.* "Is that impatience? An emotion, aye?"

Teresa: "Tcch." *She jumped on the top of a nearby chair in between two passengers.*

Bob: *He looked at the roof, staring at the hole in fear.* (What's happening?!)

Billy: "Ooooowh." *He froze in fear and slowly glanced up Teresa's leg, causing his nose to start bleeding.*

Teresa: (He will not get away-) *She jumped forward and ran on her toes on top of the seats towards the next cart.*

Lance: (Ha.) *He quickly ran down the cart, smirking at Teresa's unusual behaviour.*

Security Man: "Hey, you! Sit down! Are you causing a fuss?" *He noticed Ridley's black sword, causing him to tighten his grip on his handheld radio.*

Ridley: "No fuss at all-" *Shadows expanded from his arm in reaction to a hooded man on a nearby seat.* "Hmm? My darkness likes your presence?"

Hooded Man: "Get lost 'yo."

Ridley: *He flashstepped on a vacant seat in front of the hooded man, suddenly lunging the sword through his head.* "Justice-"

*Passengers screamed at Ridley and the security man dropped the radio in fear.*

Security Man: "H-He-He, teleported?!"
Woman: "Blood!" *She screamed in terror, avoiding eye contact with Ridley.*

Teresa: "Harh!" *She appeared on top of a chair behind Ridley and elegantly leant forward, slicing the Pentarang downwards.*

Ridley: *He quickly placed his foot on the window and pushed himself into the aisle, jumping out of Teresa's strike.* "I keep barely avoiding-"

*A flash of light shined off the metallic linings of the chairs around Ridley, causing him to glance to his side.*

Lance: "Harh!" *He lunged his lightning sword towards Ridley's face.*

Ridley: *He adjusted his footing and flicked the sword across, causing sparks to rain on a nearby woman.* "Grr-"

Bing: "Eeeek-" *She screamed at the sparks as she curled herself up into a ball.*

*The rows of chairs four isles from Teresa's swing, suddenly exploded in half.*

Teresa: *She pulled the Pentarang out of the floor with an emotionless face.* (I was not expecting him to use the area to his advantage-) *She glanced at the window to her side, noticing a crack in the grass where he placed his foot.*

Lance: *He watched several passengers roll off the chairs in terror.* (Shit, everythin' is so fragile-) "Oi, Teresa, be careful aye."

Teresa: *She raised her arm, ignoring the pieces of metal and plastic which snapped off the Pentarang.* "It is too confined-"

Ridley: "Hmph." *He smirked and clicked his fingers, causing a pulse of shadow to push Lance back.*

Teresa: "Tcch, Typhoon's-"

Ridley: "DARK STYX" *He pointed at Teresa and smirked.* "You know, I'll manipulate your attack right back at you."

Teresa: *She froze, undecided what to do.* (He is right-)

Lance: *He stumbled back and the train rocked, causing him to hit the ground.* "Shit nuggets!"

Ridley: "Haha." *He turned around and ran past the speechless security man and towards the next cart.*

Lance: *He jumped up in anger and stared at Teresa who raised the Pentarang behind her shoulder.* "Wat are ya doin'?!"

Teresa: "Air Pentaraid." *She threw the Pentarang and it sliced through the air down the aisle.*

Lance: "You can throw that thing? I guess it is shaped like a boomerang."

Ridley: *He noticed a cluster of women, causing shadow to swirl around his wrist.* "Oh? More villains."

Big Nose Woman: "Beat it, tosser."

Ridley: "Oh my." *He smirked in astonishment.* "HOLYSHADE" *He straightened his arm at the women, causing them to laugh.* "Oh?"

Big Nose Woman: "Holy shade?"

Crow Neck Sally: "Aha, you're a tad far from da comic store, luv."

Ridley: "Oh really? Thank you." *He smirked as white lightning sparked through their heads and into the chairs, exploding their limbs in the process.* "Marvellous-"

*A flash of light whooshed through the air and suddenly slammed Ridley on the side of the head, smashing him out of the train through the glass window.*

Ridley: "Ouch-" *He rolled down a grassy hill, as shards of glass spiralled around him.*

Teresa: (Direct hit.) *She watched the flash of light spiral back towards her.*

Lance: *He noticed Ridley tumbling across the road, causing him to run towards the window.* "How did he-?"

Teresa: "Go!"

Lance: "Shit-, right-, wateva." *He pushed his arm towards the window.* "THUNDER BOOM" *A clash of thunder shattered the glass, causing the air to vacuum outside.*

Woman: *She covered her ears in astonishment while squinting her eyes in a defensive manner.* (Superheroes?! Nah! They have to be making a show, where is the director?! This is dangerous!) *She watched Lance jump out of the window and tumble down a slope towards the road.*

Teresa: *She raised her arm and caught the returning Pentarang.* (How is he using Rostical without being exhausted?) *She pondered to herself at Lance before jumping out the window.*

Ridley: *He kicked the ground and jumped high into the air, causing a trail of dirt to sway from his boots.* (Hmm, at least I've reached my new city.)

*Ridley glanced to his side down the road and observed the buildings in excitement, watching cars drive by.*

Lance: "LIGHTNING BLAST"

Ridley: *He landed on the road and sighed at Lance, facing him with growing boredom.* "If you're going to be slightly frustrating, could you please use different Remenistal at least?"

Lance: "Eat some shit nuggets, loser!" *He pushed forward, blasting a stream of lightning towards Ridley.*

Ridley: "How old, how about I spice it up? DARK STYX" *He swirled his hands towards the lightning, causing darkness to envelop it.*

Teresa: *She flashstepped next to Lance, blowing a pulse of dirt around her.* "Magnanimity Decibel." *She crossed her arms and four flower-like glyphs rotated in front of her.*

*Teresa pushed forward and a barrage of blue flower petals sliced the air towards Ridley.*

Lance: *A car started beeping at him, as it drove up the road at a fast speed.* "Sh-Shit, get off the road!-"

Driver: "You get off the road, you halfwit!"

Ridley: *He warped the lightning and swayed his arms forward, blasting it back to Lance.* "Haha." *Shadow spiralled from his shoulder, causing him to look at the driver in the car.*

Driver: "I said, get off the road, you heap of shits!"

Ridley: "I see-" *He looked at the lightning, discreetly nudging his hands.*

Lance: *He watched the lightning blast back towards him, causing him to quickly raise his arm in response.* "MAGNETIC-"

Teresa: *She noticed the lightning suddenly stop, causing her to glance at Lance impressed.* "You can now shield attacks from afar?"

Lance: (Huh? Why did it stop-?) "I-It's not me, aye."

Ridley: *He motioned his arm and the lightning shot into the car, causing it to instantly explode high into the air.* "There."

Lance: *The force of the explosion knocked him across the road.* "Argh!"

Ridley: *He looked up and watched an explosion of flames swirl from inside the car, causing the shadow to fade away.* "Justice."

Lance: *He slid on one side of his face across the road, rolling onto the grass.* (My face bloody scraped across-, I hate this feelin'!-)

Teresa: *Her hair blew to one side, as she ignored the flames of the car.* (The lack of Astragons has affected this Azure Burst's startup time?) *She focused on the four glowing glyphs in front of her.*

Ridley: "Now-" *Blue flower petals suddenly swayed past him, slicing his arms, legs and chest.*

Teresa: "Humph." *She grunted in satisfaction, watching cuts form all over Ridley's body.*

Ridley: "Blast it! Swirling shadows flock, with the motion all will block, darkness strikes hearts with fear, NIGHT SPHERE"

Teresa: "I will continue this Azure until your body slices to pieces!"

Ridley: *A swirl of mist-like shadow swirled around him, forming itself into a barrier.* "Such anger, Teresa Seraph. It's not healthy to bottle it up." *He chuckled as the car hit the road and exploded again.*

Lance: *He slowly stood up and ignored the graze-like marks on one side of his face.* (Not good-) *He frowned, holding his shoulder in pain.*

Teresa: (I am being starved of Neurons and Astragons-) *She panted and started to sweat.* (It is taking its toll on me now-)

Ridley: *He clicked his fingers and the shield burst, pulsing away the flow of petals.* "Haha." *He faced the city and flashstepped out of the area, causing the road to crack where he stood.*

Teresa: "Tcch-" *She gritted her teeth and frowned, looking at Lance in frustration.* "Let us pursue him immediately."

Lance: *He shook his head, stepping onto the road.* "The city is huge, he could be anywhere!" *He lowered his arm, speaking in a defeated manner.*

Teresa: "Always troubling!"

Lance: "A-Aye?"

Teresa: "Who else would possess an energy signature here?!" *She grunted and faced the city before flashstepping off the road.*

Lance: "Oh.. Yea." *He looked awkward and watched the dirt swirl where Teresa stood before flashstepping into the city.*

Ridley: *His image suddenly appeared in front of a man.* "Hello."

Man: "Harh?" *He stopped and gave Ridley a strange look.*

Ridley: *He rammed the sword into the man's chest and smirked.* "You were quite the naughty gentleman. The shadow reacted to your presence the most so far-" *He paused and quickly looked behind him in a frustrated manner.* (Why haven't their powers been drained yet?!)

*Teresa and Lance flashstepped on a wide pavement, a street away behind Ridley.*

Ridley: *He heard the train breaking in the distance, which drifted his attention towards the top of a large pillar of stairs.* "Hmm?" *Shadow enveloped his entire body, causing him to smirk in disbelief.* (We've got a lot of work to do, there are so many impurities around here-)

Lance: "Smear upon the skies and envelop your might, thunder roar down, LIGHTNING PULSE" *He clapped his hands in front and a ring of blue lightning rumbled like thunder.* "Gah-"

*Lance pushed forward causing the ring of lightning to slowly rumble towards Ridley.*

Ridley: *He noticed people jumping away from the lightning in astonishment.* "You shouldn't freely use Remenistal like that, you could hurt the innocent people-"

Teresa: *She flashstepped on top of a car, causing all the windows to smash and shatter on to the pavement.* "Give it up!" *She panted, as sweat ran down her chin.*

Ridley: "I'd imagine it's hard to breathe-" *He turned around and smirked, purposely ignoring Teresa.*

Teresa: *She stared at Ridley's back, pointing her finger at him.* "Do not ignore me-"

Ridley: "Hmph-" *He ran towards the set of stairs in the distance, easily running out of the lightning's range.*

Lance: (My lightning doesn't move as fast as it usually does-)

*The lightning hit a nearby store and exploded the doors off their hinges, causing people inside to scream.*

Teresa: "L-Lance-" *She lowered her arm and sighed with fatigue.* "Surely you know, we can not let him escape-"

Lance: "I know, I know." *He sounded worried and looked up, watching Ridley jump over the stairs in one leap.* (At least he's headin' to the train station-) *He had glimpses of the Spacial Funnel.*

Teresa: "Tcch-" (I will merely slow him down, I must regain my composure and adjust to my handicap-) "Go, Lance! I will catch up!-"

Lance: "U-Umm, got it." *He took a deep breath and ran towards the stairs.*

*People walked into the street oblivious to what happened and they noticed Teresa on top of the car.*

Teresa: (When I was previously here, I did not use this amount of energy.. Our internal Neurons are running out of battery life..)

*The crowd whispered and pointed at Teresa, slowly clustering into small groups around the car.*

Teresa: "Tcch." *She bent her knees and flashstepped off the car.*

*The crowd around the car gasped in shock, as a large dent burst itself on the roof.*

Ridley: *He ran into the train station and directly towards a large group of people mixed with business and casual clothing.* "Now-"

*Ridley flicked the sword up and sliced two men from behind across the neck.*

Man: *He watched the men's head roll off their shoulders, causing him to yell at Ridley in shock.* "What?!" *He reached to his side under his jacket and pulled out a handgun.* "D-Damn you, freak!"

Ridley: *He stopped and looked at the man, noticing the handgun in his hand.* "Oh-?"

Man: "Arh." *He aimed the gun and pulled the trigger, shooting at Ridley.*
