Valkyrie: "MYSTIC SHIELD-" *She lowered her arm and watched a golden shield instantaneously spiral around her, blocking the balls of fire.*

Sofia: "Haheahe! Like a taste of your own-?!"

Valkyrie: "-STRIKE" *She watched the shield burst, blasting the balls of fire back into different directions around Sofia.*

Sofia: *Massive bursts of bright red flames exploded, flapping her ponytail to each side.* "How-?!"

Valkyrie: "Humph." *She watched the shield's shattering glass-like aura form into balls, suddenly blasting towards Sofia.*

Sofia: *She gasped with widening eyes, quickly flipping over the glass-like balls.* (A triple combo?!) *She landed and screamed in thought, listening to the glass shatter behind her.*

Valkyrie: "Thy can feel the confusion.."

Sofia: "Shut up!"

Valkyrie: "By purposely releasing the shield prematurely, it created a pulse of Astragenicons and which done at the correct corresponding time, bounced back the Remenistal."

Sofia: *She shook her head in frustration, ignoring branches of burning leaves which fell to the ground.* "You've somehow cheated the game!"

Valkyrie: "Do thou now understand what thy have said to thou from the start-?"

Sofia: *She screamed at Pepper in frustration and looked up into the sky past the swirling swarm of Darkwings.* (Then I'll fight to my advantage-) *Black and white radiant wings erupted from her back, catching Pepper's attention.*

Valkyrie: "Oh?"

Sofia: "Hahehahe, you may have been better back then, Pepper." *She grunted in anger and a wave of smoke puffed around her eyes, solidifying into a black visor.*

Valkyrie: "Better?"

Sofia: "But I've been practising my flying techniques for years!" *She suddenly blasted into the air, causing swirls of dirt to scatter where she stood.*

Valkyrie: "Thy see-" *She pointed the sword into the air, aiming it for Sofia.* "Ougi, Radiant Lancer." *Her sword shattered into pieces and she flicked her wrist, causing a sword made of aura to shoot out from the handle.*

Sofia: *Her ponytail flapped in the air behind her.* (I'll use the Darkwings as fodder, then I'll hide in the clouds and use my Ougi-) *She smirked in a worried manner.*

Valkyrie: "Hermph!" *She lunged the sword upwards and the aura extended, violently piercing through the air.*

Sofia: "Darkwings-" *A sword of light stabbed her through the shoulder, causing her to gasp in fright.*

Valkyrie: "Thy have become weak-" *She spread her arms, as six blue radiant wings erupted from her back.* "Hermph."

*Pepper flicked her arm to the side and sparks scattered from a re-materialising crystal sword.*

Sofia: *She held her shoulder in pain as the light disintegrated.* (What kind of Azure or Rostical was that?!)

Valkyrie: "..." *She blasted into the air and her image disappeared, giving the illusion she flashstepped.*

*The ground cracked and exploded, due to the force of Pepper's jump.*

Sofia: *She heard an explosion from the mountain, causing her to look back.* (A dirt cloud?)

Valkyrie: "Indeed."

Sofia: *She gasped and looked in front.* "How-?"

Valkyrie: *She lowered the sword to her side and pointed her hand at Sofia.* "The divine art bright as the holy sun number eighty nine, CRIMSON BEAM" *A fluoro red pulse splashed around her hand and a straight beam blasted towards Sofia at incredible speeds.*

Sofia: "Locki's!-" *She raised her hands, as the beam slammed into her arms.* "Arh-grarh!" *She frowned in pain, as she slowly floated back due to the force of the beam.*

Valkyrie: *She lowered her arm, causing the beam to disintegrate away.* "Air Slash." *She spun her body and sliced upwards, causing a visible air slash to screech towards Sofia.*

Sofia: *She stared at the burns on her arms which visibly and slowly healed.* "You-" *She looked up and quickly raised her hand, blocking the air slash.*

Valkyrie: *She watched the clouds behind Sofia cut in two.* "..."

Sofia: *She frowned in anger and her eyes shined, allowing her to throw away the air slash.* (Sharp-) *Blood stringed down her hand.*

Valkyrie: *She watched the air slash smash into the mountain, causing a massive explosion to rise.* (Her hand was meant to be cleanly sliced off-)

Sofia: "Darkwings, get her!" *She screamed at the top of her lungs, causing a swarm of Darkwings to dive towards Pepper.*

Valkyrie: *She casually looked to the side with her beautiful golden eyes.* "Raining Fury." *She raised the sword against her cheek and jabbed the sword like a missile, bursting a Darkwing into swirling pieces.*

Sofia: "There're heaps, haheahe-" *She licked the deep cut on her hand, smirking at Pepper.*

Valkyrie: "Thy see." *She faced the Darkwings and spread her legs, as if she stood on the ground.*

Sofia: (Pepper's eyes changed colour.. I didn't even notice.)

Valkyrie: "Sacred blood throughout my veins, thy say heed thout command, SOUTHERN CROSS" *The glyphic cross formed circles and a bright light emanated from the glyph, which made unusual sounds.*

Sofia: *She noticed Pepper focusing her attention to the Darkwings that dived into striking distance.* "Grarharheharh." *She spun around and blasted towards a set of multi-layered clouds.*

Valkyrie: "My power is different-" *She raised her arms, causing the glyph to separate and levitate above her, creating a 3D-like glyph.* "Herh!" *She tapped her foot, causing a blinding light to shatter the nearby Darkwings.*

Sofia: *She flew through puffy clouds and slowed her flying speed.* (My shoulder-) *She placed her hand on her shoulder and looked at the blood on her hand.* (It's healed, but it's still stinging-)

Valkyrie: *She noticed another swarm of Darkwings dive towards her.* (Sofia was correct, there are many-) "Ougi, Angelic Celestic Siren." *She hummed on a soft-high note and a pulse of silver wind blew from her mouth.*

Darkwing: "Skree-" *Its eyes glowed silver, causing it to suddenly stop.*

Valkyrie: *She watched the swarm fall under her control.* "Destroy the others-" *Her words caused the swarm to screech and turn around towards the other Darkwings.*

*Several Darkwings violently dived into each other and others shot skeletal arrows in the air.*

Valkyrie: *She turned around and faced the direction where Sofia once stood.* (She must have finally understood my power and has fled?)

Sofia: *She panted and reached to her sides.* (My beloved whip-) *Sparks scattered from her sides and she held a whip in each hand.* (These are weaker, a Black Brigade variant.)

Valkyrie: *She glided through the air, causing her robes and hair to gently flap on her sides.* (She's masking her power.) *She thought with an emotionless face, scanning the sky for Sofia.*

Sofia: (I can feel her, she's still far away. I'll take the time to regenerate these burns and then strike using the clouds like I did with Celest-)

Valkyrie: *She glanced at a set of clouds in the distance and faced it.* "Cloud Cutter." *She flicked the sword, causing an invisible force to screech.*

Sofia: "What-" *She flew to the side, as the clouds sliced in half revealing her position.*

Valkyrie: "HOLY LANCE" *She watched a stroke of light fall from the sky and past Sofia.*

Sofia: *Blood strung from her arm, as a deep slash mark appeared on it.* (That Holy Lance was fast-)

Valkyrie: "HOLY LANCE" *Her wings moved like razor blades and she soared through the air towards Sofia.*

Sofia: "Ah-" *She spun around, barely avoiding the lance.* (This isn't possible!)

Valkyrie: "HOLY LANCE"

Sofia: "More-" *Her wings flared, allowing her to swirl in the air with unnatural movements.*

Valkyrie: "HOLY LANCE, HOLY LANCE, HOLY LANCE, HOLY LANCE, HOLY LANCE, HOLY LANCE" *She flew into striking distance, causing her to raise the sword.*

Sofia: *She danced along the air, avoiding each devastating lance.* "Grah-" *A cut formed downwards on her cheek and another on her foot, causing sparks to scatter off her armour.* (The sheer force, the Rasticsplash of the lances are slicing the air on to my body-)

Valkyrie: "Slithering Slicer." *She vibrated her wrist, causing the sword to slither like a snake.*

Sofia: *She looked up and smirked with exhaustion.* (That's all the lances-)

Valkyrie: *She flashstepped face to face to Sofia and slashed the sword across her body.* "Hermph-"

Sofia: "Bwgarh!" *She spiralled in the air, due to Pepper's slash.* "Keh-" *Her wings flared, causing her to stop in mid-air.*

Valkyrie: "Hermph." *She glided towards Sofia with the sword raised.*

Sofia: "Ah!" *She grunted in anger and flashstepped behind Pepper.*

Valkyrie: "Ougi, come to my aid and fight alongside me, Ice Dragoon."

Sofia: "H-Harh?" *Boulders of ice materialised and exploded in the air, shattering into dragon-like sculptures.*

Valkyrie: "Kill her." *She spoke calmly, staring at the clouds in front of her.*

Sofia: (She isn't even bothering to turn around to face me-) *The dragons roared, causing mist to escape their mouths.* "Tssk-" *She spun around and blasted high into the air.*

Valkyrie: *She slowly spiralled around and watched four ice dragons fly after Sofia.* (Thy am curious, to what drove this woman of the light-) *She watched Sofia shatter two dragons by twirling her whips like a tornado.*

Sofia: "Yee harh!" *She crossed her arms, placing them on her chest.*

Valkyrie: (To this-)

Sofia: *She tightened her arms and kicked her legs, suddenly spinning herself around.* "Hah!" *She extended her arms and sliced downwards, shattering the other two ice sculptures.*

Valkyrie: *She disintegrated into strings of white light and materialised under Sofia.* "Thou exceeded my expectations to defeat the ice sculptures."

Sofia: "Gah." *She looked down in shock and frowned.* "Roaring Beast Kick." *She leant forward and dived down at Pepper.*

Valkyrie: *She threw the sword in the air to her side.* (Perhaps thy'm seeing this all wrong. There are some spirits that are just naturally bad, life's outliers-)

Sofia: "Hahehahe!" *She dived into striking distance, causing her to raise her leg.*

Valkyrie: "Infinity Fury of Kicks." *She stood on one leg and kicked the other across Sofia.*

*A loud thump could be heard, as Pepper and Sofia's legs connected.*

Sofia: *She grunted, trying to kick Pepper's leg away.* "Get, off!-"

Valkyrie: *She motioned her arms under Sofia and slowly raised them in a fluid manner.* "Power of the deep depths, let our power roar like thunder, and shatter like ice, heed our words, ETHEREAL RAPIDS"

Sofia: "H-Huh-" *Rumbling could be heard, causing her to look down.* "W-Wha-?!" *A river-sized gush of fluoro white water erupted up, taking her with it.*

*Rainbows shined from the sprinkles of water which sprayed into the air, as the violent current enveloped Sofia.*

Valkyrie: *She swayed her arm towards the water and moved her fingers, causing it to swirl to her command.* "Child's play-"

Sofia: "Skrah!" *She screamed which caused the water to suddenly burst in a pulse away from her.*

Valkyrie: *She lowered her hand and elegantly flicked her hair over her shoulder.* "LIGHTNING STORM" *Clouds spiralled and instantly formed above Sofia.*

Sofia: (That won't be enough to-) *Water dripped from her hair in front of her eyes, causing her to gasp.* "No-" *Lightning which fell like rain flashed around her.* "Argh!" *Her body violently twitched from side to side.*

Valkyrie: *She soared through the air towards Sofia.* (This game of chase is tiring-)

Sofia: *Her band which held her ponytail together lit on fire.* "Shrarh-" *The lightning faded, causing her to bend over in agony.* "H-Have I met my match?"

Valkyrie: "Perhaps." *She spoke with an emotionless face, hovering at a close distance to Sofia.*

Sofia: "Fine, I'll use Rostical." *She coughed in anger.*

Valkyrie: "Oh really? How cute. SILENCING FORCE" *She opened and closed her hands at Sofia.*

Sofia: "How cute? You're going to get a game over now!-" *She stopped in mid-sentence and looked shocked, touching her throat.* (I can't talk?!)

Valkyrie: *She raised her arm and the crystal clear sword materialised back into her hand.* "Herh." *She dived towards Sofia, pointing the sword forward.*

Sofia: (She's diving at a speed where I can react and attack accordingly-) *She spiralled in the air and over Pepper.* (Harh.) *She flicked her arm behind her, causing the whip to wrap itself around Pepper's sword.*

Valkyrie: (Thy continue to underestimate her-) *She swiftly spun around and faced Sofia, ignoring her hair and robes that flapped around her.*

Sofia: (Grarh-) *She stared at Pepper and flicked her other hand, swirling the other whip above her.*

Valkyrie: "Thou're skilful at wielding two whips."

Sofia: (Harh.) *She frowned in response, slicing the whip downwards towards Pepper's head.*

Valkyrie: *She tilted the sword's angle, causing it to slice the whip to pieces.* "Hermph-" *She flashstepped as the whip sliced the air where she stood.*

Sofia: *She looked at the sliced whip in frustration and threw it away, causing it to fall through the sky.* (Grr-)

Valkyrie: "Enough evasive abilities, thy am ready to end this battle."

Sofia: *She slapped the air with her whip, causing it to make a crack-like sound.* (Sound?) "I-It's finished." *She coughed to clear her throat.*

Valkyrie: "It was preferable when thou did not speak-"

Sofia: "Ougi-"

Valkyrie: "That whip will not endure the Ougi you used on me before-"

Sofia: "Darkness of wicked blood, light of pure heart, combine your forces and show 'em what I can do! Holy Red Eruption." *A swirl of blood-like liquid swirled in her left hand, as a pulse of light-like liquid spiralled in her right hand.*

Valkyrie: (She has two Ougis?)

Sofia: *She ran on the air towards Pepper with her fists raised.* "Harh!"

Valkyrie: "Ougi, Celestrial Lancer."

Sofia: "Wha-?"

*Five swirls of fire burnt themselves into the shape of a sword, causing the air to warp around them.*

Valkyrie: *The swords solidified and pointed towards Sofia.* "Hermph-" *She clapped her hands and the swords shot at blinding speeds, stabbing into Sofia's waist.*

Sofia: "Arh!" *She screamed in pain, as the clothes burnt around the swords.* (Get her!)

*Several Darkwings escaped the ones controlled by Pepper and they swarmed towards her.*

Sofia: *She smirked, as blood ran out of her nose.* "They'll get you!"

Valkyrie: "Perhaps." *She straightened her hand behind her.* "Shattering bonds, my Radiagenicons explode and implode the power of light, SERENITY SWIRL" *She opened her hand and several twirls of light blasted through the air towards the Darkwings.*

Sofia: (She's just staring at me with those condescending eyes!-) "These are hot!-" *She punched the swords, trying to break free.*

Valkyrie: "Hot? DIAMOND'S EDGE" *Sounds of scraping glass echoed in the wind.*

Sofia: (Diamond's Edge? I remember Lorilei using that-) *She looked down and braced herself.*

Valkyrie: *She raised the sword and held it with both hands.* "Hermph-" *She sliced horizontally and a slash of ice erupted, covering Sofia.*

Sofia: *The fire swords instantly extinguished due to the ice's pressure.* (Ice is only good to pierce the body-)

*The slash-like line of ice grew and expanded, as continuous chunks of ice exploded on top of each other.*

Sofia: (It hurts!-) *Veins showed themselves on her skin, as the freezing ice started to burn her body.*

Valkyrie: *She clicked her fingers, causing the small mountain of ice to shatter.* (Now to finish her-) *Glitters of light shined in her face, as the ice spiralled towards the ground.*

Sofia: *She slowly descended in a motionless manner, watching ice crack off her arms.* (I've never encountered a power like hers before!)

Valkyrie: (Where?) *She lost track of Sofia due to the glittering light.*

Sofia: (I can't move! Move!) *Her arms, legs and wings twitched.*

Valkyrie: *She scanned the area and noticed the shine of Sofia's radiant wings.* "There." *She placed her hand behind her back.*

Sofia: *She coughed and looked worried.* (She's stronger than me! I have to get out of here! Ridley, my love, I won't fail you-)

Valkyrie: "ARCADIC PULSARE" *She reached out and a gust of white aura took form of a hand.*

Sofia: "Gah-" (I have to retreat! How immensely, completely and utterly pathetic of me!) *Her black and white wings flared and moved like razor blades.*

*Sofia raised her arms and wiped the blood from her nose before adjusting the black visor around her eyes.*

Sofia: (Full speed-) *She shot through the air away from Pepper.*

Valkyrie: *The hand-like aura swirled and twirled through the air towards Sofia.* (My power is limitless, thy feel no signs of fatigue-)

Sofia: *She showed her gritted teeth, as she breathed through her mouth in desperation.* (I've forgotten where the Spacial Funnel is-) *She swayed to each side avoiding puffs of cloud.* (-To get out of here!)

Valkyrie: *She motioned her arm with the aura, increasing its speed.* "Hermph-"

Sofia: *Her hair elegantly, yet, violently flapped behind her.* "Arh!" (I just remembered where the Spacial Funnel is!-)

Valkyrie: *She opened her hand and quickly closed it, causing the aura to grab on to Sofia's ankle.* (Now your demise is inevitable.)

Sofia: *Her eyes instantly widened in shock, causing her to look at her ankle.* "Grah!"

Valkyrie: (Now thou're in the grasp of judgement.) *Her voice echoed in Sofia's mind with an intimidating tone.*

Sofia: (Get this aura off of me!) *She formed a fist.* "Bloody Erup-" *A lance of white light shot down from the sky, piercing her through the chest.* "Karh-"

Valkyrie: *She leant back and enthusiastically swayed her arms.* "Since thou use whips, perhaps thou may appreciate this-" *She flew in a large circle and quickly spiralled her body, causing loops of the aura to travel towards Sofia.*

Sofia: "What is she doing-?" *The loop spiralled up and violently flicked her upside down.* "What!?" *Another loop threw her across the sky and whipped her towards the mountain.*

Valkyrie: *She watched Sofia being flung into the mountain, causing a massive explosion of dirt and vegetation to rise.* (On the other side of the mountain, away from my Sacred Knights.)

*Pepper shook her wrist, causing the string of aura to disintegrate into nothing.*

Valkyrie: (The only cure for the pain that your existence creates is death. Your purification will end in solitude, which will complement the doleful expression on your face.)

Sofia: *She moaned and dragged herself off several sharp rocks.* "W-Wh-" *She coughed out dirt and looked around.* (She used the aura to swing me into the mountain, like a whip.)

*Sofia attempted to push herself up and collapsed onto the dirt.*

Sofia: (I can't-) *She spat out blood.* (Not yet.)

Valkyrie: "Majestic light, motion forth and put forward what is inevitable, the ancient twilight power of the radiant beings grant me all your strength-"

*Unreadable symbols and hieroglyphs materialised in the air, causing light to shimmer off Pepper's armour.*

Valkyrie: "All spirits bow down to this almighty power, thy say tremble and wither down before my knees-" *A massive white glyph spiralled in the air behind Pepper.*

*The glyph made chime-like sounds and expanded, causing several rings to form and rotate around it.*

Valkyrie: "To fight me such is your reward, SACRED SWARM" *She swayed her arms back and threw them in front towards the mountain, causing the glyph to shine.* "Hermph-"

*Thick blinding streams of light erupted out from the glyph and past Pepper, leaving trails of glittering dust-like light behind them.*

Sofia: *Missile-like screeches could be heard in the distance.* (What are those noises-?) *Twinkles of light could be seen through the dirt cloud.*

Valkyrie: *Her hair and robes flapped forward, as continuous streams of light erupted past her towards the mountain.* (It was hard not using these high levelled techniques right away-)

*Explosions of light caused the mountain to rumble, causing Pepper to look serious.*

Valkyrie: (Otherwise this vessel would have died instantaneously.) *She watched chunks of boulders roll off the mountain, tumbling through the sky.* (It was a necessity to wait until the fusion of Radiagenicons was complete.)

*Streams of light continued to explode into the ground, bursting large rocks into the air.*

Sofia: *She spiralled and flopped through the air as waves of light exploded on all sides.* (What's that?) *She looked in front and watched an arm sway past her face and into the distance.* (That's mine?)

Valkyrie: *The glyphs and light around her disintegrated into the air, causing her to lower her arms.* (Thy am pleased to see the entire mountain did not shatter to that Remenistal.) *She smirked, watching the dirt settle around the mountain.*

Sofia: *She lay on the rubble and looked at her arm, noticing it was missing.* (It was!)

Valkyrie: *She stood on the air with an emotionless face.* (Despite her wicked intent, it still saddens me when a life begins to fade away.)

Sofia: (Regenerate-) *She focused on her missing arm and nothing happened, cueing her to look surprised.* (My power has dwindled to this? Perhaps I can take advantage and hide in the dirt cloud-?)

Valkyrie: "Power of the forbidden spirits, come to my command, with seraphic powers, TELEPORTATION" *She disappeared in a flash of purple light.*

Sofia: *Her wings distorted and flashed, bursting into nothing.* (Her Neurons-, she's very far away, all I need to do is crawl in the rubble and maybe she'll think I'm dead-)

Valkyrie: *A purple glyph flashed on the ground next to Sofia.* "Hmm?" *She stepped off the glyph and looked down to Sofia with condescending eyes.*

Sofia: "Teleportation? How?"

Valkyrie: "Thou dare insult me?"

Sofia: "B-But my love sealed all tele-?"

Valkyrie: "Thou think a mere seal could stop me from using my power?"

Sofia: "I'll just have to raise the difficulty again to defeat-"

Valkyrie: *She spread her legs, causing her hair and robes to flap around her.* "Thy will now use the strongest Remenistal-" *She breathed heavily and started to concentrate.*

----------

Lance: *He looked at Ridley with a twitching eye and formed fists, ignoring his long purple hair which flapped around his shoulders.* "You have no idea wat is gonna happen, do ya?"

Ridley: "To be quite honest, with these aurora powers, I'm not fussed with whatever power-up you have received."

Lance: "Heh-" *His long hair waved in the wind, as he stared at Ridley with anticipation.*

Ridley: "Well then-" *He smirked and flicked his hands, causing the ground to explode around Lance.* "That was easy-"

Lance: "I rekon." *He grunted, as he stared at Ridley's back.*

Ridley: "Oh my-?!" *He quickly spun around.*

Lance: *He bounced forward and jumped up.* "Hah!" *He kicked the air and an invisible force pushed Ridley along the ground.*

Ridley: "Ha!" *He slid back and waved his hand, causing a stroke of aurora to slice past Lance.*

Lance: "Tssk." *He watched the aurora light sway behind his shoulder, noticing a string of blood run down his arm.*

Ridley: *A swirl of aurora spiralled around his feet, causing him to instantly stop.* "..."

Lance: *He smirked at Ridley and landed on the ground, watching water spiral around his arm.* (Water-?)

Ridley: (I don't understand.. I know for a fact Lance can only use lightning.)

Lance: *He watched the water pulse away, leaving his shoulder completely healed.* "Heh."

Ridley: (The water healed his wounds?) "Oh well-"

Lance: *He raised his arm and green lightning sparked in between his fingers, taking shape of a sword.* "Come on, coco butts." *He bent at the knees and flashstepped several feet face to face to Ridley.*

Ridley: *He watched the ground explode where Lance stood, causing him to lean back.* "Hmph."

Lance: "Harh!" *He sliced the sword across Ridley's face.*

Ridley: *He ducked, avoiding the slice.* "Too slow-"

Lance: *He suddenly kicked Ridley in the face, knocking him back.* "I dunno why I never thought of this, hey." *He raised his other arm and red lightning sparked, taking form of a sword.*

Ridley: *He wiped his mouth and stood up, looking at the green and red lightning.* (Duel wielding?)

Lance: *He ran forward at incredible speeds and slash upwards and across.* "Air Slash."

Ridley: *He swayed to each side, avoiding the air slashes.* "Pathetic-" *He coughed in shock, as the air slashes cut into his back.* (How-?! He manipulated them?!)

Lance: *He flashstepped face to face to Ridley and crossed the lightning, slicing in front.* "Heh." *He smirked, as lightning splintered past his face.* "Wow."

Ridley: *Lightning sparked up his arm.* "Blast- ouch" *He stumbled back, coughing in shock.*

Lance: "You should be more careful when handlin' lightning, someone more experienced with the element taught me that."

Ridley: "Careful?"

Lance: "Blockin' it with your hands is a safety hazard."

Ridley: *His eye twitched in anger.* "Don't lecture me, boy."

Lance: "FLAMING WHEEL" *He clicked his fingers, causing an eruption of flames to spiral around Ridley.*

Ridley: *He frowned and stamped his foot, causing a pulse of shadow to extinguish the flames.* "Lance-"

Lance: "Yea?" *He appeared behind Ridley, jabbing the swords towards the back of his head.*

Ridley: *He spun around in shock and raised his arms, watching two black swords puff into his hands.* "ROTTING SWORD" *He blocked Lance's jabs, watching lightning travel up his arms.* "Argh."

Lance: "Aha, usin' two swords? That's pretty tough-" *He smirked and leant forward, forcing Ridley back.*

Ridley: "Hmm-"

Lance: *He jumped forward, slashing and slicing the air in front of Ridley.* "Heh."

Ridley: *He continuously stepped back avoiding Lance's strikes.* (When did he obtain this swordsmanship-?) *He triggered a flashback of observing Cameron's fighting style.* (Cameron?!)

Lance: *He spun in an acrobatic manner, kicking directly onto Ridley's sword, blasting him back.* "Ha."

Ridley: *He slid back and frowned, swaying the black sword to the side.* "Regardless, I will defeat-"

Lance: "LIGHTNING CHAIN BLAST" *He pushed forward, blasting five fluoro yellow streams of lightning at Ridley.*

Ridley: *He watched the lightning curve into striking distance, causing him to slash them away.* (They are following my Neuron signature?!) *He shouted in thought, watching the streams of lightning swirl back towards him.*

Lance: *He flashstepped behind Ridley, slicing across.* (Aha.)

Ridley: *He quickly moved the black swords at blinding speeds, hitting all five streams of lightning back.* "Tssk." *He quickly ducked under Lance's strike and jumped up, avoiding two streams of yellow lightning behind him.*

Lance: *He looked up and smirked, filled with confidence.* "Heh."

Ridley: *He landed on the ground and leant back, readying himself.* (I'm amazed these streams of lightning haven't broken after being hit a few times-)

Lance: *He suddenly appeared directly next to Ridley, kneeing him in the ribs.* "Heh." *He swayed to the side, allowing three streams of lightning to spark into Ridley's shoulder.*

Ridley: "Argh-" *He shouted, causing a pulse of shadow to suddenly disintegrate the lightning away.*

Lance: "Whoa, settle down, man." *He jumped towards Ridley, slicing the lightning sword downwards.*

Ridley: *He ignored his burns and raised his sword, blocking Lance's strike.* "Tssk-"

Lance: "Yahoo." *He pushed forward, blasting Ridley across the ground.*

Ridley: *He tumbled back and hit the ground, quickly sliding onto his feet.* "How-?"

Lance: *He flashstepped under Ridley, sweeping him off his feet.* "Heh-" *He jumped on his hands, kicking Ridley up into the air.*

Ridley: "Why you!-" *He looked down, throwing a black sword directly onto Lance, causing the ground to burst around him.*

Lance: *He flashstepped in the air next to Ridley, jabbing the lightning towards his face.* "Hah!"

Ridley: *He quickly slashed the lightning away, causing electricity to spark up his black sword.* (Blast the Astragons-)

Lance: *He flashstepped above Ridley and raised his arms, clapping them downwards.* "THUNDER BOOM"

Ridley: *He looked up in shock, before suddenly being shot into the ground.* "Kah-" *He coughed in shock, listening to echoing thunder rumble through the air.*

Lance: *He flashstepped above Ridley, hovering in the air.* "Emperor's Fury." *He watched aura swirl around his fist, causing him to punch it directly into Ridley's back.*

*Lance smirked, watching Ridley's body puff into smoke, causing his fist to touch the ground.*

Ridley: *He appeared in a puff of smoke in the distance, causing him to frown at Lance.* (I have this immense power, so why am I being-?)

*Ridley shouted in thought, causing aurora coloured lights to swirl in his hands, taking shape of swords.*

Ridley: "Excellent, now-" *He took a step forward, watching Lance's image appear directly in front of his face.*

Lance: "Tcch." *He jabbed the lightning directly towards Ridley's forehead, causing him to smirk in a victorious manner.*

Ridley: *He quickly crossed his aurora swords in front of his face, causing Lance's lightning to suddenly repel back.* (Huh?)

Lance: *He stumbled back, as the ground exploded in the distance where he punched Ridley.* "Wha-?"

Ridley: *He grunted and nudged forward, pushing Lance back with a pulse of aurora.* "Haha!"

Lance: "Wat's funny?" *He smirked and watched from a bird's eye view, as his hair flapped in the wind.*

Ridley: *He looked up startled.* "I beg your pardon?" *He looked in front and noticed Lance sliding back.* (There's two!? Like Teresa!-)

Lance: "Oi-" *He shouted from the air, catching Ridley's attention.*

Ridley: *He stared at Lance in the air, who appeared to hover over him.* (Which one do I strike?)

Lance: *He smirked, staring at Ridley from the air.* "Ougi." *He spoke with a widening smile, placing one hand in front and the other over his shoulder.*

Ridley: (Ougi? A lightning-based Ougi must possess a powerful Rasticsplash-)

Lance: *He continued to slide back on the ground.* (I dunno why I'm able to move so easily, maybe he's just bein' slow?) *He bent at the knees, causing him to stop sliding.* "Forty five-" *He raised the two lightning swords next to his head.* "Streaming Sword."

Ridley: "Streaming Sword?" *He quickly looked back in front at Lance.*

Lance: "Wat 'bout me?" *White liquid materialised and swirled around his hands.* "Mastered state of Alchemy and Crafting I show you, Ragnarok." *The liquid formed a bazooka and he shot a green fluoro ball at Ridley.*

Ridley: *He jumped back and covered his face, as a green pulse exploded the ground high into the air.* (I was barely able to react in time-)

*A green and red stream of lightning blasted through the dirt cloud, towards Ridley.*

Ridley: *He gasped in shock and flashstepped to the side, avoiding the green stream of lightning.* "Tssk." *He hit the red stream of lightning with both his swords, repelling it back.*

Lance: *He flashstepped behind Ridley and threw away the bazooka, causing it to disintegrate into white liquid.* "'Sup?"

Ridley: *He slid across the ground causing his feet to wobble and he looked back in shock.* "Harh!" *He waved behind him and sliced Lance with his aurora sword.*

Lance: *He flashstepped back, avoiding Ridley's strike.* "Close, man."

Ridley: "Tssk-" *He spun around and raised the sword, facing Lance.*

Lance: "Hittin' an armless man? Weak as!" *He shouted at Ridley's back and dived out of the dirt cloud with the lightning swords raised.*

Lance: "Gah? Wat's that?" *He smirked at Ridley, watching him look behind him at his copy.*

Ridley: *He flashstepped into striking distance and slashed the sword across, causing a visible aurora air slash to slice towards Lance.* "Think quick-"

Ridley: "Excuse-?" *His face lit up, as a white beam with blue fluoro shading blasted towards him.* "Grahh." *He crossed the swords and blocked the beam.*

Lance: *He raised his vacant hand and wobbled it around.* "Why limit myself?" *He mumbled and straightened his other arm towards Ridley.* "SOLAR FLARE"

Ridley: "What are you talking about?!"

Lance: "I guess a Hi-Ougi is up." *He looked away, shrugging his shoulders.*

*An enormous comet enveloped with aurora coloured light plummeted from the sky and crashed into Ridley.*

Ridley: "Oh, but why?" *He spoke with an upbeat attitude, concealing his exhaustion from Lance.*

Lance: "I beat you."

Ridley: "Admirable attempt... But a worthy foe? Never." *He cautiously walked up to Lance and looked down with an enormous smirk.* "I will finally end your miserable suffering."

Lance: "I think it's time to use my strongest Rostickal."

Ridley: (Stronger than Meteor Swarm and Solar Flare?) *He stared at Lance and chuckled.* "Alright, sure, finish me." *He bent down and smirked in Lance's face.*

Sofia: "Y-You can't defeat me? I win the game-"

Valkyrie: "Astragenicons perform and dance the sacred steps, Neuragenicons light up and form yourselves-"

*Two glyphic rings spiralled in front and behind Pepper, catching Sofia's attention.*

Valkyrie: "The seeker and master of Remenistal thy ask upon the Radiagenicons to give life-"

*The glyphs expanded around Pepper, slowly spiralling around her.*

Valkyrie: "Our emotions and beings become one and harness the power of our bonds-"

Sofia: (What is she doing? The strongest Rostical? Don't make me laugh!) *She watched a pentagram-shaped glyph spiral around her and she dragged herself along the ground, trying to squirm away.*

Valkyrie: "The words of a healer, purity of spirits, thy alone will purify the doubts in your heart. Forbidden and secretive knowledge thy demand, The Voice of On let me hear your words-"

Sofia: *She watched a mass of symbols, glyphs and unreadable texts float in the air, forming glyphic-like walls around the pentagram.* (This is a ridiculously long incantation, perhaps she's bluffing?! To teach me a lesson?!) "Yes, a lesson! Hahehahe-"

Valkyrie: "The shape of this holy pentagram form the door to your existence-"

*A white platform made of symbols drew itself underneath Sofia, causing her eyes to shine.*

Sofia: *She watched the glyphs around her glow in reaction to Pepper's voice.* (What?!)

*Sigil-like glyphs and unreadable symbols rose up from the ground, generating powerful swirls of wind.*

Sofia: *Her eyes widened in shock.* (She's serious-) *She watched the air suddenly blur with power, giving the illusion it was raining.*

*The glyphs vibrated and hummed under Sofia, causing light to glitter around her.*

Valkyrie: "Any last words?"

Sofia: "No more continues.." *She paused and stopped struggling to move, unintentionally exhaling in pain.*

Valkyrie: "What?"

Sofia: "I'm sorry, my love." *She looked up into the sky, smirking in a defeated manner.*

*Swirls of solidifying light slowly drew themselves towards Sofia, clustering around her.*

Valkyrie: "SERAPHIC GATE"

*A bright white beam violently exploded from the glyphic platform, erupting high into the air.*

Valkyrie: *She looked up, watching the clouds shine and spiral around the light.* "May the Radiagenicons ease your spirit to The Astral Plains."

Sofia: (You filthy dirty lamps left me for dead and I'm the one that suffers like this? Hahehahe, make things right, my love-)

*The clouds sizzled and the light pulsated, causing the air itself to vibrate.*

Valkyrie: (It took two seconds for Seraphic Gate to reach the thermosphere? A side-effect of The Philosopher's Heart taking so long to be activated.)

Sofia: "Game over." *She closed her eyes, as her body burnt and vaporised into the light.*

Valkyrie: *She looked away and stared past the blowing trees into the distance.* "Power of the forbidden spirits, come to my command, with seraphic powers-"

*Small orbs of white light floated into the sky, as the glyphs, symbols and texts disintegrated into the air.*

Valkyrie: "TELEPORTATION" *She suddenly disappeared in a flash of purple light.*

*Pepper stepped off a fading purple glyph, blowing ferns, grass and dirt away.*

Valkyrie: "Comrades-" *She walked towards the unconscious party members and clicked her fingers, causing them all to gasp awake.*

Alicia: "W-Wharh?"
Celest: "A-Argh?"
Lorilei: "O-Oh?"
Locki: "P-Pepper." *He gasped and leant up, causing his armour to rattle.*

Valkyrie: "Thy sensed another problem that disrupted order of peace, where is this man?"

Lorilei: *She stared at Pepper in awe.* (She's beautiful.)

Locki: "Pepper." *He smirked with amazement.*

Valkyrie: "Listen and concentrate! This vessel has suffered no permanent damages, but she will if my spirit is contained for an extended duration-"

Celest: "Excuse the intrusion, mistress. Alicia, where was the Consultant said to be?"

Alicia: "Th-The-"

Valkyrie: *She nodded her head, as if she could understand Alicia's thoughts.* "Thy understand-" *She waved her arm and the party was blinded with a bright flash of white light.*

----------

Ridley: "So what is this special Remenistal?"

Lance: *He looked down and appeared sad.* "I never used it because it felt wrong."

Ridley: "Wrong?"

Lance: "It reminds me of what happened."

Ridley: *He frowned, suddenly punching Lance across the face.* "Foolish, wasting my time like this."

Lance: *He leant to the side, spitting out blood.* "Tssk." (I'll have to put my everythin' into this, even the last Newgong and Astragong of my being.)

Ridley: *He slowly stood up straight.* "You probably don't have anything-"

Lance: "Untouchable flames, splinter from the divine spirit, burning courage engrave my immense power, scorch thout foe-" *He quickly shouted out the incantation and jumped up with all his strength, lunging himself towards Ridley.*

Ridley: *His eyes widened in sheer shock.* "What incantation is that-?"

Lance: "PHOENIX BLASTER" *He punched Ridley in the gut, as an eruption of black flames blasted Ridley in the air.*

Ridley: *He coughed out blood which sizzled and turned to steam before it flicked out of arm's reach.* (These Neurons!-)

Lance: *Black lines spread all over his body from the phoenix tattoo which was kept hidden under his bangle.* (Old man...)

*Lance collapsed to the ground and rolled onto his back, watching the flames screech like a bird.*

Lance: (Millard.)

Ridley: *His arms and legs burnt into ash.* (No, my dream! Our dream!) *His hair singed into nothing and his skin burnt, due to the black flames which enveloped him.*

Lance: *He watched the black fire splinter in the breeze.* (He just got.. Owned.)

Cameron: *Bird-like screeches caught his attention, causing him to look up.* (What the lost Astragons is that?!) *He shouted in thought, staring at the black flames with widening eyes.*

Ridley: (Gabby, all I wanted was to acquire peace.. People understand pain, that's why, I needed to do the things I did, in order to obtain peace-)

*Ridley looked up, staring at a light only he could see.*

Gabriel and Ridley: "Peace!"

Gabriel: "No, we'll stand by each other's side 'til the end of time!" *He quickly spun around and leant down, helping Ridley onto the rock next to him.* "We'll be the heroes that spread peace and justice across the lands."

Ridley: "Yeah!"

Ridley: (When you've been cut you begin to heal, so, I had to inflict the people of darkness with pain.. If everyone understood what pain felt like, then every person would be able to understand one another-) *He closed his eyes, causing tears to run down his cheeks before evaporating into steam.* (The irony is in the diverse group that has sought my death, it proves that our theory of pain is true-)

Lance: *His vision blurred and his breathing slowed down.* (This power is escapin'..) *The Soul Links became visible to each party member before snapping off like strings.*

Ridley: (Would I have done things differently? Maybe the methods, but I wouldn't change the goal.. If anything, I hope my death births good things from you meddling children.. I hope I get to see you again, Gabby-) *The fire phoenix suddenly and violently exploded into a massive black flare in the sky.*

Lezard: *He regained consciousness and felt hot gusts of wind, causing him to look up towards the sky.* "..."

Tyler: *He groaned and sighed, noticing a strong wind blow downwards.* (The air, it's hot-) *He looked up and instantly stared at the black flames in amazement.* (It's huge!-)

Teresa: (Inconceivable! He has surpassed even the Consultants themselves!)

Lezard: *He watched the fire swirl in the sky.* (Powerful and beautiful, like my parents.)

*Lezard held onto his cone-shaped hat, slightly surprised he was still wearing it.*

Lezard: (Father, mother monster.. Sister monster.. Please, everyone be safe!)

Holland: *He stood up and noticed Lance lying on the ground.* "His breathing-" *The purple ring around his iris spiralled, magnifying his vision.* "He's not breathing!"

PKMY: *Her skin appeared blue, as she twitched with an emotionless face.* "H-Holly-" *She whispered, catching his attention.*

Holland: *He looked down and noticed her appearance, filling him with terror.* "N-No-" *He dropped to the ground beside PKMY.*

Season: *He leant up with a grunt-like mumble and stared at the plumes of black flames, watching them disappear from the sky.* "D-Did Lance really do it?"

Tyler: "W-We have to see if he's alright."

Teresa: "Tcch-" *She awkwardly stood up in pain, ignoring her pale appearing skin.* "I-I will get him-"

*A blinding white light flashed in front of the party, drawing all their attention towards it.*

Season: "Who's there?"

Cameron: *He blinked several times, noticing five party members in the fading light.* "I do not recognise-"

Alicia: *She stepped forward, causing the party to relax.* "Where's Lance?"

Tyler: "Over there-" *He urgently pointed in front behind her.* "But hurry, he's not breathing."

Alicia: "N-No-" *She gasped with sudden terror and quickly turned around.*

Valkyrie: *She watched splinters of ash swirl in the air and took a step forward, grunting with respect.* "The Consultant's power was equivalent to Sofia's, yet, you all were able to defeat him."

Season: *He looked at Pepper, causing him to smile with uncertainty.* (Is that-?)

Valkyrie: "Thy am impressed."

Lorilei: "Mistress?" *She sounded surprised.*

Valkyrie: "Thy will fully heal all your wounds, but, it won't stop the inevitable sleeping your bodies will require. Tell me where to send thou all."

Season: *He smiled in disbelief and hope, as if he wasn't sure if he should say anything.* "Th-The Sheridan."

Valkyrie: *She glanced at Season and nodded her head, as if she could read his mind.* "Thy understand-" *She raised her hand and readied to click her finger.*

Tyler: "Pepper?"

Valkyrie: "Hmph." *She chuckled with a slight smile and clicked her finger, causing a strong blast of white light to blind the party.*

Chapter 3: Relaxing Tenses

Lance: "Hmm..." *He moaned and slowly opened his eyes, finding himself lying on a bed.* (Huh?) *He moaned again and blinked, glancing across an unfamiliar room with blurred vision.*

Alicia: *She slept in a wooden chair, awkwardly resting her head on the bed by Lance's feet.* "Sh-She's beautiful-the lights-she looks like Pepper-"

Lance: *He leant up, welcoming Alicia with a smile.* "Hey-"

Alicia: *She inhaled loudly through her nose and leant up, watching the pendant dangle from her neck as she leant over the bed.* "H-Huh?"

Lance: "'Sup, shit nugget?" *He mumbled with a widening smile.*

Alicia: "You're-?" *She looked at Lance and smiled in excitement, rubbing her eyes.* "You're up."

Lance: "Yea, I thought so too, but since you said it, I definitely know I'm awake now, thanks-"

Alicia: *She quickly stood up and jumped on top of Lance, giving him a warm hug.* "You're finally awake."

Lance: *He smirked and held her tightly while lovingly kissing her on the head.* "So, how long have I been asleep this time?"

Alicia: "Seven days."

Lance: (A week!-)

Alicia: (I'm so happy you're okay.) *She whispered in thought, cupping her pendant in happiness.*

Lance: "That's a long time, aye.." *He brushed hair out of Alicia's face.*

Alicia: "Yep."

Lance: "Wat's everyone doin'? Where are we? Wait-" *He unintentionally spoke with a rising voice and leant up, looking at Alicia in a worried manner.* "Wat happened to the Consultant?!"

Alicia: "Shh-" *She looked to each side and pointed across the room, drawing Lance's attention to patients resting in single beds.*

Lance: "My bad."

Alicia: "Umm-" *She closed her eyes and slightly frowned with concentration, biting her bottom lip.*

Lance: *He focused his attention back to Alicia, hiding his smile.* "Wat are ya doin'?"

Alicia: *She leant back in concentration, waving her hand across Lance's body.* "With my new abilities, I can feel damages with my Radiatons."

Lance: "Aye?"

Alicia: "It's like, running your hand along a smooth surface, and when you feel a ditch or a bump, that's where the damage is."

Lance: (Stupid beautiful bitch..) *He rolled his eyes and chuckled with blushing cheeks.*

Alicia: *She nodded her head in a reassuring manner, opening her eyes.* "You're alright to get up."

Lance: "Pssht, I was gonna get up anyways."

Alicia: "Tee hee."

Lance: "Now, you wanna get off of me? It's goin' to look suss if someone walks in."

Alicia: "Tee hee, yep."

Lance: "You must be losin' weight too, you didn't crush my bones like ya used to." *He smirked and gently held Alicia's arm, helping her off the bed.*

Alicia: "Let's go for a walk, I can tell you what happened."

Lance: "It better be epic." *He slowly raised the sheets and inspected his body, nodding his head in approval.* (I got clothes on this time-)

*Lance grunted and jumped out of the bed, stretching his arms in a child-like manner.*

Lance: "So-" *He looked down to polished floors and up to the roof, raising an eyebrow in confusion.* "Did ya mention where we were?"

Alicia: "We're in the castle of Silver Wind Island." *She walked into the hallway and spun around, facing Lance with her arms behind her back.*

Lance: "And everyone else?"

Alicia: "Excuse me, grottom bottom."

Lance: "Aye?" *He stood at the doorway and looked at Alicia with a curious and puzzled smirk.*

Alicia: "Tee hee, isn't my company good enough?" *She slightly swayed to the side, giggling in an innocent manner.*

Lance: *He walked into the hallway and stood on the long red carpet.* "Nah, wateva." *He chuckled and gently kissed Alicia on the lips, holding her hand in a loving manner.*

Alicia: "Season and Tyler are in the research facility a few floors up."

Lance: "Why don't we say hello?"

Alicia: "Umm, Season-" *She looked down, tapping the red carpet with the tip of her foot.* "He requested to do something by himself." (.. He seemed really sad-)

Lance: "OK, wat about the others?"

Alicia: "Holland left the city to defeat some of the remaining skeleton creatures."

Lance: "Skree?"

Alicia: *She nodded her head, looking back up to Lance.* "Lezard said they're called Darkwings."

Lance: "Darkwings.. Does that mean we lost?" *He spoke with anticipation, looking at Alicia in a serious yet mature manner.*

Alicia: "S-Sorry?"

Lance: "If those creatures are still left, then the Consultant is still alive?"

Alicia: *She giggled and rubbed his arm.* "You defeated him with a Grand Rostical no one besides Lezard and Teresa had seen before."

Lance: *He looked down, discreetly smiling in relief.* (So, that defeated him-) "Watta 'bout Teresa and Docta Jingles?"

Alicia: "PKMY woke up a few days earlier than you. She was in a critical condition for some time."

Lance: "And Teresa?"

Alicia: "She's with her."

Lance: "So, where are they?"

Alicia: "They went for a walk, I'm not sure where they are now."

Lance: "Why?"

Alicia: "Because I was with you, waiting for you to wake up."

Lance: (.. I don't deserve her, aye.) *He started to walk down the stairs with Alicia and half smirked to himself, looking away with blushing cheeks.* "Oh, fairo."

----------

*Holland, Nathan, Blake and Cameron walked through a thick forest.*

Nathan: *He looked around with the sword raised, as strings of dust blew over his shoulder.* "Do any of you sense any more?"

Holland: "I think we might have got them all."

Blake: *He strutted up to a nearby tree and placed his hand on it, causing Nathan to stare at him in a curious manner.* "They say-"

*Blake paused and looked up to the rustling leaves as if they were communicating to each other.*

Blake: "There's apparently a Spacial Funnel somewhere up ahead hey."

Cameron: *He glanced at the party, nodding his head in a professional manner.* "It would not hurt to check."

Nathan: "This is the last area Dawn said those creatures spawned from, we might as well ensure it's all been checked."

Holland: "Yeah." *He grunted in agreement.*

Blake: "And, for all we know, those fugly things could breed-" *He stepped away from the tree and pulled a disgusted look, shivering at the thought.*

Nathan: *He stepped forward, causing the party to walk deeper through the forest.* (Walking through this forest peacefully.. It's relaxing, but I've somehow grown used to Lezard being annoying.)

----------

*Teresa and PKMY sat on an ancient stone bridge, listening to bird and monkey-like noises from the forest around them.*

PKMY: *She glanced behind her and stared at the long set of stairs which travelled up, giving the illusion it led towards the sky.* "It's fine to admit it."

Teresa: "Tcch."

PKMY: "I miss her too." *She looked down to her lap, playing with a string of grass in her hands.*

Teresa: "Indeed." *She looked through the cracks of the trees, staring up into the sky.*

PKMY: "So, this is where you created that seal-?" *She looked at Teresa and reached up, gently running her finger along Teresa's forehead in a sisterly manner.*

Teresa: "No, there is a city located on the top of these stairs, hidden in a Spacial Funnel."

PKMY: "Eh?"

Teresa: "It is where Joy, Lupton and Chrisma are from."

PKMY: (Her friends..) *She nodded her head in understanding, refocusing her attention back to the grass in her hand.* "You were always so secretive."

Teresa: "It was my role as a number one captain. The less you knew, the better."

PKMY: "Yea.. Makes sense." *She sighed under her breath.*

Teresa: "Nevertheless, I owe you an apology."

PKMY: "Eh?"

Teresa: "I am sorry."

PKMY: "Sorry for wat?"

Teresa: "The way I have acted towards you."

PKMY: "I-?"

Teresa: "Amy. I had not realised it then, but I focused on my own desires."

PKMY: *She looked at Teresa in confusion.* "You never acted badly towards me."

Teresa: "Although that is true, I never treated you like a sister."

PKMY: "Terra.."

Teresa: "And for that, I apologise."

PKMY: (It's obvious she's finally removed the seal.)

Teresa: "I have treated everyone who cared about me, with-?"

PKMY: "No emotions."

Teresa: "Precisely."

PKMY: "Don't apologise. I would've done the same if I was in your position."

Teresa: *Her eyes shined gold.* "It was ironic to the point of almost feeling like a punishment, that when I sealed my emotions, I also sealed this power."

PKMY: "How is that irony?"

Teresa: "I ran through many simulations to find the best results in defeating the Consultant, one of the variables that impacted those results was my emotions. It was evident that I had to remove the variable if I ever desired the most favourable outcome, and then the incidents that transpired with mother-" *She paused as she started to grow emotional.*

PKMY: "It's OK-"

Teresa: *She unintentionally ignored PKMY.* "Without emotions, I truly believed I would be a better fighter-"

PKMY: "And you were."

Teresa: *Her eyes watered and she leant on PKMY's shoulder.* "Indeed."

PKMY: "Why are you sad? We defeated the Consultant."

Teresa: "Hoh?"

PKMY: "Your emotions, it's also kinda wearing off on me too." *She pretended to smile.*

Teresa: *She sniffed and smirked.* "I have felt uneasy though."

PKMY: "Why is that?"

Teresa: *She pushed herself off PKMY's shoulder and wiped under her eyes.* "These past few days have been unnaturally quiet."

PKMY: "You mean relaxing?"

Teresa: *She smiled and nodded her head.* "Hmm."

PKMY: *She looked down with a worried expression on her face.* "There's something that's been on my mind that the Consultant said."

Teresa: "Yes?"

PKMY: "He told Season he destroyed Surpreon-"

Teresa: *Her eyes widened as if she forgot.* "I have forgotten!" *She stood up with urgency.*

PKMY: "Wat?" *She looked up puzzled.*

Teresa: "It is true. We need to assist Season."

PKMY: "I-It is true?" *She spoke under her breath, slowly standing up in shock.*

Teresa: "Here-" *She closed her eyes and freed her mind, causing PKMY to gasp.*

PKMY: *Images of Surpreon in ruins, flashed in her mind.* "No..."

Teresa: "Just before we left this sunrise, Season was taking Tyler to Surpreon to check his findings. I can not believe something to that extreme and importance slipped my mind."

PKMY: "In your defence, your memory has been cloudy since you've had problems with that Grand Seal."

Teresa: "Indeed-" *She presented her hand to PKMY.*

PKMY: "Let's be there, for our big stupid brother."

Teresa: *She smiled.* (Caesar.) *PKMY grabbed her hand, causing their images to disappear in a flash of white light.*

----------

*Season and Tyler stood next to each other inside the research facility, watching Dawn prepare the researchers for a glyph.*

Dawn: *She glanced at Season and Tyler, pushing her glasses up with one finger.* "It should be ready shortly."

Season: "That would be excellent, thank you."

Tyler: *He smiled, adjusting the RPG bag.* (It's great how we're able to teleport now.)

Madora: *She flicked her long black hair and sighed, hobbling into the research facility.* "I just thought I should let you know I'll be returning back home for a while-"

Tyler: "Madora!"

Season: *He turned around and greeted her with a smile.* "How are you feeling?"

Madora: "Oh." *She looked at Season and Tyler startled as if she wasn't expecting them and smiled.* "I'm feeling much better, thank you."

Season: "Splendid."

Tyler: "Umm, s-so.." *He looked at Madora and paused.*

Madora: "Deary?"

Tyler: "If you don't mind me asking, what was wrong with you?"

Dawn: "Although, we aren't entirely sure what was the cause of it, thanks to research we now have speculations about the pulse."

Madora: "..." *She chuckled to herself as if Dawn was right.*

Tyler: "The pulse?"

Dawn: "The pulse which disabled the ability to teleport."

Tyler: "Ah." *He nodded his head in an interested manner, giving Dawn more of his attention.*

Season: "Hmm? What has the pulse got to do with Tyler's question?"

Dawn: "Research believes that the pulse was indeed the factor which rendered Madora in that dull-like daze."

Madora: *She hobbled towards Season, slowly nodding her head in agreement.* "I am one with Astragons. As fortunate as it may sound, it seemed when the Consultant was defeated the seal broke, and therefore, allowed me to return to normal."

Season: "Surely you could have prevented or found a way to block the symptoms you displayed?"

Madora: "Perhaps, but if I had known about the pulse sooner, I may have been able to do so."

Season: (As I thought, but I wanted to satisfy my curiosity-)

Researcher: "Ma'am. It's ready!"

Dawn: "Excellent, activate it now."

Researcher: "Yes." *He grunted and faced the Rosterology console.*

Dawn: *She rubbed several bandages on her arms caused by a Darkwing attack.* "The glyph is being prepared now." *She glanced at Season and walked away, hiding the pain in her arm.*

Season: "Thank you."

Madora: "How is everyone? I heard from Alicia that these creatures broke into the castle."

Dawn: "Yeah, we're fine." *She bent down and shuffled through papers, brushing Madora off with a wave of her hand.*

Madora: "There will be a time to congratulate your efforts later."

Tyler: (Later?)

Researcher: *Several images popped up on the screen, causing him to nod his head.* "Activating the glyph now."

Madora: "So, what are you two doing now?"

Season: "Hermm." *He mumbled awkwardly.*

Tyler: "T-To Surpreon-"

*A purple glyph drew itself on the ground, catching Tyler's attention.*

Madora: (Surpreon-) *She looked up and smiled.* "Be sure to come back here. We'll need closure."

Season: "Closure?"

Madora: "Yes." *She turned away, suddenly disappearing in a flash of aurora light.*

Season: *He stared in the space Madora stood, nervously pondering to himself.* (What Ridley told me.. I hope that it isn't true.)

Tyler: *The last line of the glyph connected, causing it to glow purple.* "Season." *He stepped towards the glyph and faced Season, waiting for his response.*

Season: "Oh right, hohoho." *He turned around and walked straight past Tyler towards the glyph.*

Tyler: *He watched Season disappear in a flash of purple light, causing him to smirk in admiration.* (Being away from Surpreon for so long, I actually kind of feel homesick.) *He chuckled to himself and shook his head, taking a step towards the glyph.*

?????: "Tyler."

Tyler: "Sorry?" *He turned around and noticed Chrisma slide into the room with a childish smirk on her face.*

Chrisma: "Tyler! Oh, get in?!" *She groaned under her breath, running towards Tyler.*

Tyler: "I'm sorry, got to go-" *He quickly trotted onto the glyph and disappeared in a flash of purple light.*

Dawn: *She stood up and slammed her hands on the desk she was using, looking at Chrisma in frustration.* "No yelling or running in the research facility!"

Chrisma: "Oh bless-" *She faced Dawn and nervously grabbed onto her robes, bowing in respect.* "Sorry."

Dawn: "What have you got to say for yourself?!"

Chrisma: "For.. For research?" *She fist pumped the air above her head, causing Dawn to nod her head in approval.*

Dawn: "For research!" *She shouted, fist punching above her head.*

Chrisma: *She smiled with boosted morale, groaning in excitement.* "Whoup whoup!"

*Joy and Lupton walked into the facility and noticed Chrisma.*

----------

Lance: *He walked down the stairs and stopped in the hallway, watching Alicia walk down the steps.* "Pepper.."

Alicia: "I know." *She spoke in recollection, smiling at Lance's reaction.*

Lance: *He smirked, shaking his head in disbelief.* "Wow, that's Angler for ya."

Alicia: *She skipped off the stairs and giggled, facing the exit.* "But you really should've seen what she looked like-"

Lance: *He firmly held Alicia's hand making sure she didn't trip over his feet, as she walked towards the door.* "Same old same old?"

Alicia: "No." *She shook her head, rocking their hands back and forth.* "Even before she transformed, she was already beautiful."

Lance: "Aye?" *He flicked his long brown hair out of his face, giving Alicia a strange look.*

Alicia: "S-Sorry?"

Lance: "Beautiful? She's like twelve, freak."

Alicia: "N-No, she looked like Teresa's age."

Lance: "You don't say?" *He mumbled and noticed the door ripple, causing him to stop.*

Lezard: *He hobbled into the castle and sarcastically gasped the moment he noticed Alicia and Lance.* "Why hello there, silly sausages!"

Alicia: "Lezard." *She smiled and bit her bottom lip, excited to see him.*

Lance: "'Sup?"

Lezard: "Why-?" *He held onto his cone-shaped hat with one hand and pointed to the ceiling with the other.* "The roof of course."

Lance: "Rightio-" *He rolled his eyes.*

Lezard: *He noticed Lance's hair, causing him to sarcastically hiss in disgust.* (It's suddenly long? Was that because of what happened in our fight with the Consultant?) "Ouchies! Hisssst."

Lance: "Huh?" *He looked at Lezard in confusion.*

Alicia: (Tee hee, Lance hasn't even noticed.)

Lance: "Wat is it now? Sausage eating puppies?"

Lezard: (Sausage eating puppies? Lezard might use that!) *He shook his head as if Lance was wrong.* "I'd like to say, you look better with shorter hair."

Lance: "Hair?" *He brushed his hand through his hair and grunted in shock, causing him to let go of Alicia's hand.* "Wat the-?" *He spoke under his breath, looking at his hair in confusion.*

Alicia: *She giggled at Lance and stepped closer towards him, looking at Lezard in a protective manner.* "I like it any way he wants."

Lance: "Aha, thanks, grottom bottom, but, I'll definitely be cuttin' this."

Alicia: "Whatever, you dirty butt biscuit."

Lance: *He chuckled, covering his mouth with his hand.* "Aha, wat?"

Alicia: "Tee hee, you heard me."

Lance: "Ahahahaha, ah hahaha." *He laughed hysterically, smiling at Alicia with warm welcoming eyes.*

Lezard: "Butt biscuit? I swear, children these days." *He shook his head in disappointment, adjusting the cone-shaped hat.*

Lance: "Ah wateva."

Lezard: *He coughed and stepped to the side, moving away from the door.* "I actually came here to see how you were, Lance."

Alicia: *She observed Lezard.* (His tone isn't sarcastic, he's serious.)

Lezard: "Before you become the centre of attention, I wanted to personally thank you."

Lance: (The centre of attention?)

Lezard: (Those flames-) *He silently dropped to his knees and bowed.*

Lance: "W-Wat are you doing?" *He spoke in shock, quickly looking behind him in embarrassment.*

Alicia: (Why is he bowing to Lance?)

Lezard: "I witnessed the Remenistal you used to defeat the Consultant."

Lance: "Oh.." *He focused his attention back to Lezard, staring at him in a serious manner.*

Lance: *He silently stared at Lezard as if he already knew.* (It wasn't like it was obvious or anythin'.)

Lance: *He paused, keeping his mature-like facial expression.* "Get up."

Lezard: *He looked up, emphasising his seriousness.* "I truly mean that."

Lance: *He noticed Lezard's emotional face, causing him to look surprised.* "W-Why?"

Lezard: "No.. It felt like you did it for fath-, Millard."

Lance: "..."

Lezard: "Father monster.. He entrusted you with his power. He saw something in you, that he didn't see in many."

Lance: "..."

Lance: "I arh, err-" *He awkwardly mumbled, looking away in an uncomfortable-like manner.*

Lezard: "I'm probably not explaining myself properly, bwarhah-" *He chuckled, wiping his eyes.*

Alicia: (I wish I was there to help you, Lance.)

Tyler: "H-Huh?" *He jumped in fright and gasped.*

Tyler: "..."

Tyler: "..."

Alicia: "I can cut it with this-" *She applied pressure against her hands, causing a small ice-like dagger to extend out of her palm.*

Lance: "Nice." *He watched the ice sparkle, nodding his head in approval.*

Alicia: "Okay-" *She reached forward, causing Lance to lean back.*

Lance: "Whoa, settle down, tiger!"

Alicia: "Sorry?"

Lance: "I think we better stand for this."

Alicia: "Okay."

Lance: "Have you done this before?" *He stood up and reached down, gently helped her up.*

Alicia: "I used to cut the children's hair in my village all the time."

Lance: "Oh, the kids?"

Alicia: "Yep. So I guess that was perfect practice to cut yours."

Lance: "Oh, I keep forgettin' how hilarious you are."

Alicia: "Tee hee."

Lance: "You can be quiet and cut my hair now?"

Alicia: "How would you like it?"

Lance: "I dunno, just so it isn't longer than Docta Jingles."

Alicia: "Umm." *She inspected the back of his head.* (On the Sheridan, I liked his hair when it was long everywhere, so-) *She mentally prepared herself before grabbing a cluster of Lance's hair.*

Lance: "For my final words, I just wanted to thank my friends and family-"

Alicia: "Shh." *She slapped him on the shoulder, causing him to laugh and stop.*

Lance: "Alright." *He coughed away his smile and tried to be serious.*

Alicia: *She raised the dagger made of ice and flicked her wrist, causing strands of hair to blow away in the sea breeze.* "It cuts easy-"

Lance: "And I'm still alive-"

Alicia: "Shush you-" *She mumbled in concentration, grabbing another handful of hair.*

Lance: "Aha, sorry, beautiful."

*Doves flew in a flock over a large magnificent castle which floated on an island above the clouds.*

*Locki, Celest, Lorilei and members of The Wise bowed in a line, inside a large cathedral-like room.*

Valkyrie: *She proudly walked into the room, causing everyone to lower their heads.* "Rise." *Her stern voice echoed, causing the party to slowly rise.*

The Wise: *A small elderly woman looked at the Valkyrie.* "Thou have summoned us for what reason, mistress?"

Valkyrie: "Repairs to the damage the man known as Ridley has caused."

Celest: "Damages?"

Valkyrie: "The Imperial Glacial Castle, Silver Wind Island and its royal castle. And Surpreon."

The Wise: *A tall old man looked at the Valkyrie in confusion.* "All with respect, mistress, but to help the peasants below?"

Valkyrie: "All spirits are of equal, that is all thy see."

The Wise: "Yes, thou're exactly right, mistress." *He looked away with respect.*

Valkyrie: "Thy will return shortly, but it is expected that repairs will be established."

Everyone: "Yes, mistress."

Valkyrie: "Excellent, my noble einherjar." *She spoke in respect and smiled with love as gold and silver strings spiralled out of her body.*

Pepper: "Karh-" *She stepped forward and panted in exhaustion.*

Celest: "Mistress?"

Pepper: "Mistress?" *She sounded confused and looked around in a puzzled manner.*

Locki: "Pepper."

Pepper: *She looked at Locki, confirming her identity.* "What happened?"

*Several members of The Wise looked at each other and nodded their heads, as if they already pre-discussed something.*

The Wise: "Pepper Captian."

Pepper: "Y-Yes?" *Sweat started to drip down her face.*

The Wise: "We owe thou a massive apology."

*Celest, Locki and Lorilei looked to their side, staring at The Wise in shock.*

Pepper: "I say, what about yeah?"

The Wise: "Punishing thou, when thou weren't at fault."

Locki: *He formed a fist, keeping his emotionless face.* "..."

The Wise: "We have discussed this beforehand, and, we humbly wish to ask of thou, to accept our apology?"

Pepper: "Yes."

Locki: "With all respect to The Wise, Pepper, thou should not so eagerly accept their apology."

Celest: (In a sense, I agree with Locki.)

Pepper: (If it wasn't for them, I wouldn't have had the opportunity to make friends with everyone.)

*Pepper smiled in thought and stepped forward, readying to answer The Wise.*

Pepper: "I-" *Her eyes rolled back and she fell forward, slipping into unconsciousness.*

Locki: *He stood up and flashstepped, allowing him to catch Pepper before she fell onto the floor.* "She's exhausted."

Lorilei: "Oh my-"

The Wise: "And, Lorilei Gales."

Lorilei: "Hmm?" *She sounded nervous as she avoided eye contact with each member of The Wise.*

The Wise: "Due to the Valkyrie's influence, we may need to revise our long-lived rules."

Celest: *She stood up and slowly walked towards Pepper and Locki while keeping eye contact with the old man speaking.* "What are thou saying?"

The Wise: "Perhaps rules may need to be updated to suit the needs of the current trend or generation."

Lorilei: "Oh dear, I still don't grasp what you're trying to say?" *She spoke in confusion with her high in tone voice.*

The Wise: "For the time being, until we fulfil the mistress' request, thou are free to walk on Valhalla soil once again."

Lorilei: *She smiled to herself.* (For a moment, I thought they were going to banish me again or send me back to that prison-)

Celest: *She smiled, glancing at Lorilei in the corner of her eye.* (How curious! The Wise has never admitted to changing the rules before!)

Locki: (She's back to her normal age in appearance.) *He admired Pepper's armour and face.*

The Wise: "The mistress awakened when Pepper lost her life, has it been confirmed if she was somehow resurrected or if she has received a Sacred Knight's secondary chance?"

The Wise: "Resurrection isn't possible!" *She gasped in disbelief.*

The Wise: "This is our mistress we're talking about! Surely such a miracle isn't out of her reach."

Celest: "With respect, does it matter if she has or hasn't? She still breathes the air, her heart beats, her Neurons burn and Astragons flow-"

The Wise: "It would be wise to know in case she was to ever lose her life."

Celest: *She looked displeased but hesitantly nodded her head.* "Thy will check the mistress' memories to confirm."

Locki: *He discreetly rubbed Pepper's cheek with his fingers and smiled.* "Thy would like to move Pepper to an appropriate area for a swift recovery."

The Wise: "That is fine, dismissed."

Locki: "Thy would like to offer my appreciation." *He looked at Celest.* "Thy will be back momentarily."

Celest: "Indeed, take her somewhere safe."

Locki: "Definitely." *He smiled with seriousness and disappeared in a flash of white light.*

Celest: *She turned around and faced Lorilei.* "Lorilei, thy'll need assistance in preparations to repair The Imperial Glacial Castle."

Lorilei: "Of course."

The Wise: "We shall begin preparations ourselves."

Lorilei: "Understood-" *She watched each member of The Wise place hoods over their heads, before flashstepping out of the room.*

Celest: "This way." *She motioned her head and walked away, causing her footsteps to echo throughout the room.*

Blake: *He looked at his hands and scrunched his fingers, causing green, fluoro dragon-like claws to extend over his polished nails.* "Fufufu-"

Darkwing: *It sliced its arm across Blake.* "Skree!-"

Blake: "Too slow! Scorching Claws." *He lunged forward and straightened his fingers, violently jabbing them through the Darkwing's shoulder.*

Darkwing: "Sk-"

Blake: *He ripped its arm off and slashed its chest, slicing off all of its ribs.* "You had no chance, bitches."

Man: "That embarrassment is slicing its bones like butter!"
Darkwing: "Skree-" *Its skull cracked and changed shape into a bow, aiming it in Blake's face.*

Blake: "Dragonised Hammer." *He chuckled and rammed his hand through the Darkwing's head, causing its body to suddenly puff into dust in spirals of green flames.* "Fufu, didn't even hafta use my Ougi."

Mio: (Fufufufu.) *He chuckled with his deep voice, causing Blake's dragon-like eyes to momentarily flash with power.*

Nathan: *He landed on one foot and flicked his sword up, slicing off the Darkwing's arms and legs with a sway of rainbow coloured sparks.* "You don't stand a chance."

Man: *He watched from the middle of the villagers.* (He didn't even make contact with the creature and its limbs still sliced off?!)

Nathan: (To think, I learnt battle techniques from our little Karol-) *He grunted and suddenly spun around on his one foot, slicing the air around him.* "Harh!"

Blake: *He looked at Nathan with an altered visual perspective, watching the wind sway green around his body.* (If I had your eyes before fighting Nath, maybe I could've defeated him in several shots.)

Mio: (Why not now?)

Blake: "Fufu." ('Cause he's one of my bitches now.)

Mio: (Bothersome..) *He chuckled in a condescending manner.*

Darkwing: "Skra-" *It watched its ribs shatter off its body from invisible air slashes, noticing flashes of rainbow coloured sparks swirl around its bones.*

Blake: (It doesn't have any legs or arms, we've almost finished this, aye.) *He spoke with a sigh and placed one hand on his waist.*

Nathan: *He faced the Darkwing, flashstepping directly in front of its face.* "Umph."

Darkwing: *Its body quickly warped and faded, causing Nathan's sword to slice the air where its head was.* "Skreee." *Its screech echoed around Nathan.*

Nathan: "Hmm-" *He skilfully landed on the ground and quickly raised the sword, listening to its echoing screech.* "Just missed?"

Darkwing: "Skrah!" *It appeared behind Nathan and leant forward, jabbing its arm through his back.*

Nathan: *He looked down in shock, noticing the Darkwing's skeletal fingers twiddle in his chest.* "A-Ah-"

Keno: (No! Nathan!)

Cameron: *He watched from a distance and stared at the Darkwing behind Nathan, noticing its new form.* (It regenerated its legs and arms fairly quickly-)

Darkwing: *It ripped its arm out and noticed its fingers, looking at them in a curious manner.* "Sk?"

Blake: *He watched Nathan smirk, causing him to look confused.* (Why is he-?)

Mio: (Check the Darkwing's claws.)

Blake: *He glanced at the Darkwing's fingers.* (There's no blood.)

Nathan: "Harh!-" *He spun around and sliced the Darkwing's hand off.*

Darkwing: "Skr-?!"

Nathan: *His image appeared in the air behind the Darkwing.* "..."

Keno: (What-!?) *He thought with widening eyes.*

Blake: (It hasn't even noticed the copy behind it-)

Darkwing: *It stared at Nathan in front of it and raised its other arm, readying to attack.* "Skree!"

Nathan: *He firmly held the sword behind him and he slashed across the back of the Darkwing's neck, causing its body to suddenly puff into dust.* "Harh!"

Cameron: "Two copies!" *He mumbled to himself with a dropping jaw.* (Like Teresa-)

Nathan: "That's what I'm talking about-" *He looked down at his other image through the dust and noticed a hole in his shirt left by the Darkwing, watching his image fade away.*

Holland: *He frowned at the Darkwing as it slashed the air across Freya.* (Keep dodging-)

Freya: *She ducked and jumped over its arms.* (Its nails are sharp, I can hear it screeching through the air-)

Holland: (Don't think about that, you're doing great!)

Apollo: (She spoke?) *He flapped his wings, watching from a bird's eye view.*

Nathan: (Ha, what am I saying? He doesn't need my help.)

Darkwing: *Its skull cracked and instantly took shape of a bow, shooting out a skeletal arrow at Freya.* "Skree-"

Holland: (Ignore the water, avoid the bone!-)

*The freezing water swirled into two thickening streams of ice, causing Holland to smirk in amazement.*

Holland: (Nice.)

Cameron: *He watched a vortex of ice spiral down towards the Darkwing.* (A combination of three Scoldrant-based Azure Bursts.)

Man: *He stood up in an urgent manner.* "Wait." *His words caused the party to face him with curiosity.*

Chapter 4: Restorative Initiative

Alicia: "There." *She stepped back and opened her hand, causing strands of hair to blow away in the wind.*

Lance: *He turned around with an innocent face and looked up, staring at the hair on his fringe.* "Does it look good?"

Alicia: "It's what it looked like before I left you on the Sheridan."

Lance: "So.. Does it look good?"

Alicia: "It makes you look more rugged, like Holland."

Lance: "Umm." *He flicked his hair on the side.* "Is that a good thing?"

Alicia: *She bit her bottom lip, taking a step closer.* "It looks even better-" *She stood on her toes and wrapped her arms around Lance's neck before kissing him.*

Lance: *He smirked and opened his eyes.* "So, I'll take that as a yes."

Alicia: "Y-Yep, tee hee." *She giggled, admiring his new hair.*

Lance: "Wait, so you think Holland is rugged?" *He smirked with slight jealousy.*

Alicia: "Don't know." *She stepped away and giggled, pretending to be mean to Lance.*

Lance: "Nah, wateva." *He crossed his arms and pouted, turning away like a child.*

Alicia: "I guess, I'll have to go to the city by myself."

Lance: "Good, humph."

Alicia: *She quickly jogged towards the city.* "I might say hello to Holland."

Lance: "Oi, wait for me!" *He turned around and quickly jogged after Alicia.*

Alicia: "You can't catch me-"

Lance: *He smirked and flashstepped behind Alicia.* "Rawrr." *He caught her in his arms, causing her to squeal with laughter.* "Aha, gotcha."

Alicia: "Tee hee."

Lance: "So, Holland looks good?" *He awkwardly looked away, sounding a little serious.*

Alicia: *She faced Lance, looking at him with a smile.* "You look way better."

Lance: "How better?" *He pouted.*

Alicia: "Over this much." *She spread her arms far apart.*

Lance: "Not good enough."

Alicia: "Over infinity."

Lance: *He smirked and slowly leant forward, closing his eyes.* "Good-" *He gently kissed Alicia on the lips.*

Alicia: *She leant back, causing a sound to pop from her lips.* "H-Huh?" *She touched her mouth and smiled with uncertainty.*

Lance: *He smirked and bit his bottom lip.* "That smackin'-pop sound was pretty kool."

Alicia: "Tee hee-" *She pulled Lance's hand towards the city.*

Lance: "OK." *He rolled his eyes.* (I feel pretty good right now-)

Alicia: "Let's go."

Lance: *He rolled his eyes again as Alicia led him towards the city.* "So eager, aren't ya?"

Alicia: "I just feel that we should help out."

Lance: "Why?"

Alicia: "I-I just feel a little guilty."

Lance: *He smirked with a tiresome face.* (I don't really want to help, but I'll do it for her any day.)

Alicia: "Lance?"

Lance: "Alright, wateva."

Alicia: *She smiled in response.* (It's been so serious lately that this feels really nice.)

Lance: "Ya know, I love you so much, aye." *He sighed with blushing cheeks and looked up to the sky, placing his hands on the back of his head.*

Alicia: "Tee hee, I love you, too! Maybe I should cut your hair more often?"

Lance: "You get points for bein' beautiful, points for not killin' me, but ya lose some for tryin' to steal my humour."

Alicia: *She smiled and bit her bottom lip with a growing smile.* (What a grottom bottom.)

PKMY: "You see what I'm doing? Wat am I doing?"

Season: (Blast you, Amy-) *He stood in front of Tyler and hugged him.*

Teresa: "Hoh?" *She looked at Season and Tyler, placing a hand on her waist in confusion.* (Now they are hugging? Perhaps Amy did something?)

Season: "No-" *He sighed in disappointment.*

Season: "I'm not entirely sure." *He looked across the ruins, shaking his head.* "Go to Silver Wind Island?"

Tyler: "What is?"

Season: "Please explain."

Teresa: "Rebuild."

Teresa: "Build anew."

Season: "I don't find jokes like that funny-"

Season: "Don't be foolish-"

Tyler: "Statues?"

PKMY: "Heh." *She turned around and grinned.* "I agree with Teresa, the longer we delay plans to repair, the longer we've got to wait."

Teresa: "Hoh?" *She looked at Season and waited for his response.*

Season: "It would take too long, all of my resources disappeared with the city."

Teresa: "I too, will have the intentions to assist if need be."

Season: "I don't know-"

Tyler: "Yeah, what have we got to lose?"

Season: "Nothing-" *He paused in thought.* "-Time?"

Teresa: "If you do not keep yourself busy, you may exhaust the same amount of time pondering on the destruction of Surpreon."

Season: "Oh.."

Tyler: "Yeah.."

PKMY: (Teresa, she's throwing out these deep good sentences.)

Teresa: "Hmm?" (Did I say something inappropriate?)

PKMY: (Nah, don't worry about it.)

Teresa: (I will not.)

Season: "..."

PKMY: "Well?!"
Teresa: "Hmm?"

Season: "Oh, alright." *He smiled in defeat.*

Tyler: "Yay." *He smiled with slight sadness.*

PKMY: "Yahoo!" *She jumped up and smirked, punching the air in front of her in excitement.*

Teresa: "This is great." *She placed her hand in front of Tyler's face with an emotionless expression.*

Tyler: "U-Umm, what's wrong?" *He leant away from Teresa's hand feeling uncomfortable.*

Teresa: "I have witnessed Lance do this, hit it."

Tyler: "O-Oh, haha." *He awkwardly chuckled and slapped Teresa's hand for a hi-five.*

Teresa: "Indeed." *She looked at PKMY and Season with gratification.*

PKMY: (Heh-) *She chuckled in thought, hiding her emotions from Teresa.*

Season: "Where to start?" *He brushed dirt and charcoal off his robes, glancing around the city.*

PKMY: "Well, let's head back to Silver Wind Island."

Teresa: "Precisely what I was going to say-" *She looked at Season, flicking her hair over her shoulder.* "You mentioned your resources have depleted."

Season: "Yes."

Teresa: "It is obvious and encouraged to find more."

Season: "Right!"

Tyler: *He sniffed and smiled with excitement.* "I-If it's okay with you, Season, I've always wanted to have a garden with certain flowers to scent the air. After Battling Oxident, it usually gets a little smelly."

PKMY: "I agree! Man, people stink."

Season: "Alright."

PKMY: "I'd request a cabin to drink and relax, I've grown to like guild taverns."

Season: "Hohoho, alright."
