Season: "That's actually an excellent idea."

Teresa: "Of course? It was mine, was it not?"

Season: "Hohoho, I like this new Teresa."

Teresa: "Hoh?"

PKMY: *She started to walk towards the crack in the wall.* "Righto, we've already started to make plans, don't forget it, Tyler."

Tyler: "N-No, I won't!" *He watched PKMY step through the crack.*

*Teresa, Season and Tyler started to walk towards the crack to exit the city.*

Season: "You don't have to help if you're too busy."

Teresa: "Family should be one's first priority."

Season: "But-"

Luna: "Shut it, Lizard-"

Lezard: "Lezard."

Blake: "Watevs."
Luna: "Wateva."

Lezard: "Ooo, it's the whatever patrol."

Ginger: *She watched a massive purple glyph engrave itself on the ground.* (Those Astragons. It would appear whatever occurrence hindered teleportation has now been lifted.)

Dawn: "There." *She sighed in relief, watching the glyph slightly glow purple the more the patterns formed.*

Ginger: "Yeoshh."

Dawn: "For research." *She fist punched the air above her and smiled in relief.*

Chrisma: *She hobbled up to Lezard and fist punched the air.* "For research!"

Lezard: "Woop woop."
Chrisma: "Whoup whoup." *They wiggled their bottoms at the same time.*

Luna: "Eww."

Season: "Perfect. When you're ready, collect your things and meet us at Surpreon!" *He yelled with motivation before walking towards the glyph.*

Lance: "Wait, wat's goin' on?" *He watched Season disappear in a flash of purple light.*

PKMY: *She stormed past Lance.* "You know, after all this, you still don't get things! We're rebuilding Surpreon because it was destroyed, so shut it and help us." *She grunted and rolled her eyes, walking towards the glyph.*

Lance: "Gee, someone's cranky."

Alicia: (Surpreon was destroyed, that's horrible.)

Ginger: *She held her breath and slowly exhaled.* "Ey, Rachael, Luna, please assist Dawn in collecting whatever Rosterology items she needs to work expeditiously."

Rachael: "Sure thing."

Luna: "Got it."

Ginger: *She ran up to the glyph and faced the guild.* "Are you coming?"

Lezard: "It was scrumptious talking, but we delightfully need to go."

Chrisma: "Ooooo, shit your face! I'm helping this amazing man out!"

Blake: "Oh gross, she even does that unsexy ooo thingy." *He hissed in disgust.*

Karol: "Surpreon is damaged, let's halp." *He skipped towards Ginger.*

Teresa: *She walked with a professional strut towards the glyph.* "Let us assist him now." *She spoke in a stern tone and took a step forward, causing her image to disappear in a flash of purple light.*

----------

Season: *He stared at the destruction of Surpreon with his hands on his waist.* (This will take a lot of hard work-)

Teresa: *Her image appeared next to Season.* "How long do you think this will take?"

Season: "As long as it needs."

Teresa: "Hoh?" *She looked at Season in confusion.* "What kind of answer is that?"

*Lines of people stepped off the glyph and started to walk towards Surpreon.*

Season: *He watched villagers start to sweep the ground and take away the cluttered debris.* (It could take months, even years-)

Lance: "Oi."

Season: *He turned around puzzled.* "Lance?"

Lance: "So-" *He looked to his sides, as the party gathered around him.* "Wat do ya want us to do?" *He smirked and puffed out his chest, sniffing his finger in a cocky manner.*

Season: "Well-" *He looked behind him and pointed to the cracks on the walls.* "Clearing out the clutter, then repairing the cracks."

*Chatter echoed throughout Surpreon, as Scoldrant appearing people, tribe members, dancers and warriors helped each other lift heavy items out of the city.*

Lance: "Got it!-"

Chapter 5: Acceptable My Way

Madora: *The area around her swirled aurora colours.* (I wonder what PKMY has sent me to do-)

*Echoing whirls howled around Madora as brown and black colours mixed with the aurora.*

Madora: *The area started to slowly stop spinning, causing her to look around.* (The overwhelming support to help rebuild Surpreon has been tremendous, even the Valkyrie used spatial Remenistal to help expedite the process.)

*An aurora glyph drew itself on the ground, causing swirls of dirt to spiral in the air.*

Madora: *She smiled in thought.* (Throughout the millennium, I have enjoyed times of peace, but I have never witnessed so many clans uniting in such a manner. Goes to show just how much productivity people can produce when they set aside their differences and focus on one task.)

*The glyph flashed, revealing Madora standing in the middle of the aurora glyph.*

Madora: *Her long black hair flicked high into the air as the glyph dissipated.* (Due to their efforts, the reconstruction of Surpreon has been a complete success.)

*Loud eagle-like squawks echoed in the far distance and warm gusts of wind blew past Madora, gently blowing her hair forward.*

Madora: "Now what did she say?" *She mumbled to herself and looked up, staring at the entrance to Turnback Cave.*

*The rocks on the top of Turnback Cave unnaturally swirled up as if something had erupted out of it.*

Madora: "Everything has been in such good motion, even the preparations of a Battling Oxident had been announced a while back." *She chuckled to herself.* "Come to think of, I believe Battling Oxident is almost upon us."

*The sunlight shined brightly on the landscape and the sounds of Cicadas could be heard.*

Madora: *She walked towards the entrance of Turnback Cave and noticed the statues.* "These are quite peculiar." *She whispered to herself, listening to bat-like screeches echo deep in the cave.*

*Madora elegantly raised her hand and clicked her fingers, causing a large aurora glyph to draw itself on the ground.*

Madora: "Either way, my respect for the party has increased tenfold after the downfall of Ridley. So I don't mind doing tasks like this for them." *She suddenly disappeared in a flash of aurora, leaving behind thick swirls of dirt where the glyph materialised.*

----------

*Several lion-like men carried large boulders through Surpreon and placed them on the outer layer of the city. Chatter was constant and several food stands were available to the workers. The walls were white and the ground was a grey marble. Large brick houses had smoke rising out of chimneys and tall pine-like trees swayed in the breeze.*

PKMY: *She grunted as she pushed a large green polished brick into place.* (Nearly there-) *She leant back, wiping sweat off her forehead in accomplishment.*

Celest: *She walked out of a large house with Locki and looked up, noticing a newly designed sign with the words 'INN' on it.* "The rooms are designed just like Valhalla's."

Locki: "Thy was impressed we replicated it so well."

Celest: *She nodded her head and noticed PKMY standing in a large circle of green polished bricks with three pedestals in the middle.* "Good work, Locki."

Locki: *He looked at Celest, shaking his head.* "No."

Celest: "Locki?"

Locki: "We should share the gratification. Good work."

Celest: "Hmph." *She grunted with respect and focused back to PKMY, making her way towards her.*

PKMY: *She frowned and violently held the Ryukku, carving several glyph-like lines into the stones.* "Grr-"

Celest: "PKMY."

PKMY: "Huh?" *She leant back and sat on her knees, placing her hands against her legs.* "Oh?" *She looked over her shoulder, staring at Celest and Locki.*

Locki: "Perhaps thou should take a break."

PKMY: "I've almost done my part-" *She grunted and raised her arm, pointing the Ryukku in front of her.* "Just a few more lines and the glyph will be completed."

Celest: *She looked over towards a large manor, noticing a large purple glyph on the ground.* "What is that?"

PKMY: "Ah-" *She wiped more sweat off her forehead and inspected the area.* "That's Battling Oxident."

Locki: "Celest, perhaps we should take advantage of this freedom?" *He stared at the glyph in an intrigued manner.*

Celest: "Yes, thy've watched Battling Oxident via the water mirror, but it would be nice to see it firsthand-"

*A flash of aurora lights caused Locki and Celest to step away, catching the nearby people's attention.*

PKMY: "You're late."

Madora: *She stepped off the blinding glyph, as it slowly faded away.* "Oh dear, these were slightly heavier than I thought." *She stepped to the side and revealed three human-shaped statues.*

Celest: "What are they?"

PKMY: "I'd like them to be placed on these pedestals when you're ready."

Madora: *She quickly observed the city.* "Things are looking better every time I come back here."

Locki: "Indeed." *He grunted in agreement.*

Madora: "Where is everyone?"

PKMY: "They're outside the city taking a break."

Celest: "A break?"

PKMY: "Lance, Holland, Alicia, Teresa, Tyler, Pepper and Season all finished the construction of Surpreon's manor and the entrance to the city-" *She nudged her head behind the party, causing them to notice several women walk through the walls into the city.*

Locki: (They've already fixed the entrance-)

PKMY: "With the entrance and the cabin, I can tell you I am over Reality Sekais and Spacial Funnels."

Madora: "Some people don't have the spatial awareness to deal with them."

PKMY: "Eh? I'm too much in a working mood to appreciate those comments."

Madora: "And what about the other party?"

Celest: (The guild?)

PKMY: "They finished the tasks Ginger allocated to them, and now they're focusing on the teleportation glyph to connect the cities together."

Madora: (Ooo, that will be a tough job.)

Celest: "Nevertheless, please get everyone when the sun sets."

PKMY: "Why?"

Celest: "Did thou not desire to try the new cabin?" *She looked over to an extended part of Surpreon and stared at a large wooden house.*

PKMY: "Heh."

Madora: "I think you should take your own advice, take a break. You look exhausted."

PKMY: "Tssk, just a little more and-"

Madora: "I can move these statues with the help of Locki and Celest."

Locki: "Thy see no problem with that."

PKMY: *She looked at Madora, Celest and Locki and looked away feeling peer pressured.* "Alright, I'll have a break." *She rolled her eyes and stepped out of the ring, placing the Ryukkus behind her waist.*

Madora: *She watched the Ryukkus warp and fade before focusing her attention on Celest.* "Celest, is there a feast or some sort of celebration happening after sunset?"

Celest: "Yes."

Madora: "Oh, I guess an old person like me wasn't invited-"

Celest: "Do not be ridiculous, of course, thou're welcome."

PKMY: (Blah, old people conversations-) *She shivered and faced the exit to the city.* "Right-"

Madora: "Have fun, deary." *She chuckled, glancing at PKMY in the corner of her eye.*

PKMY: "Wateva." *She grunted with respect and flashstepped out of the city.*

Locki: *He smiled and stepped into the ring, walking past Madora towards the statues.* "Hmm?" *He stared at the statues with golden eyes, running his finger along one of them.*

Madora: "Shall we get started?" *She smiled and clapped her hands, looking at Celest.*

Locki: *He stepped away from the statues, glancing at Madora.* "These eyes, thou realise these statues are-?"

Madora: "Indeed I do, deary."

Celest: "Did she want them in any particular order?"

Madora: "No, dear." *She smiled and faced the statues with a large sigh.*

PKMY: *Her arms swayed behind her back, as the area blurred past her.* (Everyone's worked their asses off-)

*PKMY's image suddenly appeared on the shore, causing an eruption of sand to wave around her.*

Holland: *He sat on the sand with his arms behind his back.* "Huh?" *He instantly noticed PKMY, causing him to smile.* "Amy."

PKMY: *She smiled and walked up to him.* "Where is everyone?"

Holland: *He looked away with a smirk.* "Don't know, you might kick me out of the city again."

PKMY: *She smirked and plunked herself next to him.* "I could feel how exhausted you all were, so shut it, you feral ogre."

Holland: "Oh? Nice try, trying to make me feel better."

PKMY: *She grabbed Holland's arm and rested her head against it.* "I'm tired."

Holland: "Too bad-"

Lance: "Rawrr!" *He jumped out of the bushes behind Holland and threw a wet ball of sand at PKMY.*

PKMY: *She hunched forward as the sand splattered over her back.* "You-"

Tyler: *He staggered out of the bushes and threw two handfuls of wet sand at PKMY.* "Haha!"

PKMY: *Her eyebrow twitched in anger.* "You little shits!-"

Alicia: *She ran out of the bushes and past Holland, throwing wet sand balls at him.* "Harh!"

Holland: "Argh, what-?" *He mumbled with frustration.*

Teresa: "Humph." *Her image appeared in the air above PKMY and Holland.* "Hmph-" *She threw four sand balls downwards, exploding them on PKMY and Holland's head.*

PKMY: "Grr-" *She gritted her teeth, growling with growing anger.*

Teresa: *She elegantly landed on the sand and started to directly walk towards the shore.* "Direct hit."

PKMY: "Wat is going on?!" *She stared at Teresa's back and stood up in anger, raising her fists.*

Holland: *He rubbed sand out of his hair with a smirk.* (The plan was to only get Amy-)

PKMY: "Lance, Tyler, you two are my first targets!" *She watched the entire party run towards the water.*

Lance: "Shit, it's happenin' just as we planned!"

Tyler: "R-Right." *He squealed in understanding, intensely staring at the water.*

Destiny: *She dived out of the bushes and flapped her wings, gliding towards Lance and Tyler.* "Meehehehe." *She galloped across the sand and lowered her neck, picking Tyler up from in between the legs.*

Tyler: "Ah-" *He awkwardly grabbed Destiny's mane, pulling an awkward face in fear.*

Lance: *He looked over his shoulder and smirked, watching Destiny gallop behind him.* "Ah-" *He jumped back and landed in front of Tyler on Destiny's back.*

Tyler: "Ah, watch it! I nearly fell off-"

PKMY: "You're all gonna get it!" *She screamed and ignored chunks of sand falling off one side of her face.*

Lance: "I'd be more worried about her!" *He grunted with a fixated smile on his face.*

PKMY: "And why are you all in your undergarments!" *She shouted in disgust and took several steps forward, dragging her feet through the sand.*

Alicia: "Tee hee-" *She giggled as radiant silver wings erupted out of her back.*

Teresa: *She half smirked.* "It appears we have effectively taunted the enemy!" *She yelled out to the party, as white wings erupted out from her back.*

Destiny: *She flapped her wings and flew above the glistening water's surface.* "Mee hee."

Tyler: (We're in the air!-)

Lance: *He looked down at his reflection and placed his hand into the water, causing a line of water to spray past Destiny.* "Kool-"

Tyler: *He leant to one side, watching the water sprinkle past him.* "W-Watch it."

*Teresa and Alicia blasted across the water and flew next to Destiny.*

PKMY: *She stamped her foot and looked at Holland.* "They're all flying, this isn't fair!-"

Season: *He hobbled out of the bushes and waved his arm, causing a wave of sand to crash on top of PKMY.* "Oh, watch your step, you two." *He laughed and ran onto the shore, as the water swirled and bent to his will.*

PKMY: *She grunted in rage, causing her face to light up a bright red colour.* (When I get my hands on them, including Teresa and Alicia-)

Holland: *He stood up and smirked as a purple glyph spiralled in front of him.* "Then we'll have to fly too."

PKMY: "Eh?"

Freya: *She pounced out of the glyph and slid across the sand.* (I saw what happened-) *Her body tripled in size and she extended her wings.* (Let's get them!)

PKMY: *She smirked with enthusiasm.* "Now she's talking!" *She grabbed Holland's hand and stepped forward, pulling him towards Freya.*

Holland: "I'm sitting on the fron-"

PKMY: "I'm on front!" *She smirked as if she knew what Holland was going to say.*

Freya: (Quickly get on, they're making distance-) *She bent down, preparing to carry PKMY and Holland.*

PKMY: *She hopped on Freya's back and stared at the party, as their image started to become dots in the distance.* "They are getting far-"

Holland: "You haven't seen how fast Freya can really fly." *He hopped on Freya's back and placed his hands around PKMY's waist.*

PKMY: "I've seen her in Battling Oxident-"

*Freya blasted high into the air, causing a large pulse of sand to erupted when she stood.*

Teresa: *She looked behind her past the trail of water and noticed Freya flapping directly towards them.* "Everyone, be on guard!"

Tyler: "Haha!" *He squealed with excitement.*

Alicia: "Should we scatter?" *Her hair and pendant rapidly flapped behind her.*

Season: "That's a feasible plan." *He rode on a large wave, glancing at Alicia.*

Lance: "We thought we lost ya for a moment!"

Season: "Hohoho, don't be foolish." *He smirked and continuously looked behind him.* "Freya is fast, isn't she?!"

Tyler: *He held Lance by the waist and looked behind him.* "Oh no!" *He yelled and looked to his side at the party.* "They're getting closer!"

PKMY: *Her hair rapidly flapped across her forehead.* "Freya, I want you to swerve a little and use the momentum to sideswipe them, does that make sense?"

Freya: (Use the speed of a dive and tilt at an angle, hitting them with my wing?)

PKMY: "Yes! Yahoo!" *She grinned with anger as she slowly approached the party.*

Teresa: "Everyone, scatter formation!"

Lance: "Don't tell me, sista!"

Teresa: "We are not of blood relations?"

Lance: *He ignored Teresa, gently kicking Destiny on her sides.* "Come on, horsey!"

Destiny: "Meeheeheehee." *She hunched forward and flapped her wings, causing her to blast straight up into the air.*

Tyler: "Woooo." *He screamed with excitement and fear.*

Lance: "Ahaha, dude you're screamin' in my ear!"

Alicia: "Tee hee." *She looked up with a smile, watching Destiny, Lance and Tyler fly towards the clouds.* "Teresa?"

Teresa: *She slowly rattled to each side, causing her to shake in mid-air.* "It appears I am not used to these wings."

Alicia: "Tee hee." *She held Teresa's hand and her wings moved like razor blades, causing her to fly at a faster speed.*

Teresa: *She noticed Alicia's wings, causing her to gasp in thought.* (There are different speed levels? Impressive-)

Season: *He watched Alicia and Teresa fly into the air.* "Don't worry about me!" *He continued to ride the wave by himself.*

PKMY: "I'll be leaving no witnesses! Hehehe!" *She screamed and laughed like a maniac.*

Holland: (Haha, she's really into it, isn't she-?)

Freya: (I like it.) "Gruff!" *She focused her eyesight on Season and flapped her wings at an angle.* (Your first victim, Amy.)

PKMY: "Yea!"

*Freya flew into striking distance, causing PKMY's evil smirk to widen.*

Season: *He looked over his shoulder and gasped.* "No-"

PKMY: "Bwahaha." *Freya swooped to the side and clipped Season with her wing.*

Season: "Farewell, friends!-" *He tripped on the wave and tumbled across the water like a stepping stone.* "Argh-" *He wheezed, slowly sinking into the water.*

Teresa: *She looked behind her, causing her hair to blow across her face.* (PKMY shifted Season's footing, causing him to trip on his own Rasticsplash, quite impressive.)

Holland: "That's one!"

PKMY: "Yahoo!"
Freya: "Arhwooo."

Lance: "Shit, did you see how she totally just owned Season!"

Tyler: "N-No, I was looking in front-"

Lance: "There-" *He pointed to the ripples in the water, showing how far Season was knocked across the water.*

Tyler: "Eek-" *He closed his eyes in fear and excitement.* "Higher!"

Lance: *He smirked and leant on a side to see Destiny's head.* "You heard him."

Destiny: "Meeheehee." *She flapped slightly harder and faster, causing them to ascend higher.*

PKMY: "Who should be next?" *She grinned evil-like and looked to her left at Alicia and Teresa.*

Holland: "Get the girls!" *He had a flashback of being hit by sand-balls thrown by them.*

PKMY: "Right!" *She leant at an angle, causing Freya to tilt her right wing up.*

Holland: (Ever since Amy learnt how to connect her abilities through the power of a Soul Link-) *He smirked in thought, admiring PKMY and Freya's teamwork.* (-Those two seemed to have bonded beyond my comprehension.)

Teresa: *She glanced at Alicia, struggling to keep a steady flight.* "I wish to announce, Season is down! I repeat, Season is down!"

Alicia: "Oh no!" *She quickly scanned the sky behind her and noticed Freya, ignoring her flapping hair and pendant.* "A-And it looks like we're next!"

Teresa: "Hoh?"

Alicia: "They're flying after us."

Teresa: "Any strategic plans?"

Alicia: "N-No, you?"

Teresa: "Indeed. We maintain enough speed until PKMY flies into striking distance."

Alicia: "Yep."

Teresa: "Then, by using the correct amount of Astragons, we spiral up for a split encounter-" *The tips of large waves clipped her toes, causing bursts of water to spray behind her.* "Then we counterattack."

Alicia: *She looked to her side, staring at Teresa with a blank expression.* "U-Umm, yes."

Teresa: "I believe doing that will give us a chance to win."

Alicia: (Spiral above for a split encounter? What am I meant to do?)

Teresa: "Are you ready?" *She stared in front with determination, causing her hair to swirl above her.*

Alicia: *She admired Teresa's beauty.* "Yes, I'm ready."

Teresa: "Excellent-"

PKMY: "Bwarh!" *She suddenly dived down and landed on top of Alicia's back, causing an eruption of water to blast in Teresa's face.*

Alicia: *She blew out bubbles and looked up, slowly swimming to the surface.* (She was following us, when did she have the time to get above us?!)

Teresa: *She looked to her side in shock, awkwardly swaying away from the explosion.* (She dived from the sky and tackled Alicia into the ocean! I did not predict she would jump off Freya!-)

Alicia: "Arh-" *She inhaled deeply and wiped her nose, looking at Teresa.* "Fly, Teresa!"

Teresa: "Affirmative!"

PKMY: "Heh." *She popped her head up next to Alicia, smirking in an evil-like manner.*

Alicia: "Tee hee, make sure you get Lance big time. It was his idea."

PKMY: (Oh, it was? That's a shock!) *She squinted her eyes in excitement, answering Alicia with her facial expressions.* (Freya! Holly!-)

Holland: (We hear you!)

Freya: *She glided above the water and nicked her legs in the ocean, causing sudden spurts of water to splash behind her.* (Brace yourself-)

PKMY: *She raised her arm and spread her fingers, allowing Holland to grab her hand.* "Yea-"

Holland: "Nice idea by jumping off Freya."

PKMY: "Heh." *She nodded her head and looked at Teresa, ignoring the water dripping off her face.* "You're next!"

Teresa: "Hoh?"

Freya: *She blasted towards Teresa and easily caught up to her.* "Gruff!"

Teresa: *She glanced behind her and gasped in shock, quickly focusing ahead in determination.* "Tcch."

PKMY: *She smirked as Freya tailgated Teresa through the air.* (Heh.)

Holland: (She's surprisingly slow.)

Freya: (She's only recently unlocked her ability to fly, I wasn't this fast either, remember?)

Teresa: (Stick to the plan.) *She thought to herself, ignoring the danger behind her.*

PKMY: (Heheh, almost-) *She leant forward and reached out, as Teresa's legs slowly drifted into reaching distance.*

Teresa: "Humph-" *She curved her back and unnaturally spiralled backwards, twirling above and over Freya.*

Freya: "Grarh?" *She looked up in shock, causing her smooth glide to wobble.*
PKMY: "Eh?" *She looked up, frowning in a competitive manner.*

Alicia: (So that's what she meant! I could've done that if she didn't word the sentence so strangely.)

Holland: (Did she purposely allow us to catch up, or did she use her lack of speed as an advantage?)

Teresa: *She flew behind Freya, causing her to half smirk.* "It appears I am now chasing after you-"

PKMY: "Nah!" *She stood up and the wind pushed her on to Holland, causing him to smirk.* "I'll get you as I did to the princess!"

Teresa: "Hoh? Do you think you can?"

PKMY: "Heh." *She jumped above Holland and tapped his shoulder with her toe, pushing herself towards Teresa.*

Teresa: "Such a frontal dive is easily avoidable-" *She swayed to one side, watching PKMY dive past her.*

PKMY: "Shit-" *She grunted, crashing into the water below.*

Holland: (You know what to do?)

Freya: (Yes.) *She flapped her wings and suddenly flew on a side.*

Teresa: "Hmph." *She stared at the splash and smirked, grunting with satisfaction.*

Holland: "Sorry." *Freya hovered in the air, causing Teresa to look in front startled.*

Teresa: "Harh-?" *She slammed into the side of Freya.*

Holland: *He scratched behind Freya's ear.* (You alright?)

Freya: (Didn't feel anything.)

Teresa: "Tcch-" *She slowly fell towards the ocean and splashed into the water.*

Lance: *He looked down, watching from high in the air.* "Looks like it's just us left."

Tyler: *He looked down and gasped.* "W-We should descend!"

Lance: "Wat, why?!"

Tyler: "What if she knocks us off Destiny and we plummet from this height!"

Lance: "The fall would be nothin', aye, we got that Astragong shield thingy-"

Tyler: "But.."

Lance: "But wat?!" *He grunted in an annoyed manner.*

Tyler: "But.. I'm not strong like you all.. My body doesn't generate the epithelial field of Astragons."

Lance: *He thought to himself in realisation.* (Shit, he's right-)

PKMY: *She reached up and giggled.* (Excellent-)

Holland: *He helped PKMY back onto Freya.* "Next-" *He spoke with a smile, wrapping his arms around her waist.*

PKMY: *She looked up, smirking with anger.* "The try hard and teacher's pet are left."

Freya: "Growlff." *She flapped her wings and flew across the water.*

Teresa: *She pushed herself up and stood on the water.* (Tcch, that was slightly enjoyable-)

*Alicia and Season rode on a wave and stood on the water next to Teresa.*

Season: "All aboard, hohoho." *He chuckled and swayed his arms, causing the wave to expand underneath Teresa.*

Alicia: (Even though I can fly, I still find it amazing how Teresa can stand on the water like that.)

Holland: "Freya, pick up the speed."

PKMY: "Yea, the faster we go, the faster I'll wrap my hands around that shit's neck." *She pretended to choke the air, causing her to smile.*

Freya: "Gruowlth!" *Her wings extended and she flapped harder.* (Brace yourselves!-) *She suddenly soared through the air directly towards Destiny, blasting a wave of air behind her.*

*Holland and PKMY slightly leant back, due to the speed Freya flew at.*

PKMY: (Now this is flying!) *She unintentionally giggled like a girl, causing Holland to smirk and tighten his grip around her waist.*

Tyler: *He watched Freya soar through the air with widening eyes.* "Eek!"

Lance: "Huh?! Oh shi-?!" *He yelled and pushed forward, causing Destiny to quickly swoop downwards.*

Freya: *She flew past Destiny and her tail nicked Tyler on the head.* (Missed.)

Tyler: (She touched me!) *He squealed in thought, unintentionally digging his nails into Lance's waist.*

PKMY: (Damn right!-) *She wiggled her bottom, adjusting herself more comfortably.*

Lance: (Freya can like, fly in circles around us-)

Tyler: "We're doomed!" *He squealed with fear.*

Lance: "Dude, I'm not your bitch, watch the nails, aye."

Tyler: "S-Sorry."

Lance: "Aha, your voice finally suits your appearance-"

PKMY: "Wat!?" *She yelled in anger.*

Tyler: "St-Stop taunting her!"

Lance: "Come on, dive downwards, I've got a plan."

Destiny: (Got it-) *She thought to herself.* "Meeheeehee."

Tyler: "You? A plan? We're doomed!" *He squealed in terror.*

Holland: (We're good, Freya.)

Freya: *She flapped her wings to keep herself afloat.* (Okay-) *She looked down and tilted her head, blasting towards Destiny.*

Lance: *He looked behind him and noticed Freya, causing him to inhale deeply.* "Alright-"

Holland: (Nearly there-)

PKMY: *Freya flew into striking distance, causing her to lean up.* (I'll show you to throw sand at me!-)

Lance: "Now, zigzag on the ocean's surface!"

Holland: "Huh?" *He watched Destiny suddenly dive at a steeper angle.*

PKMY: "No! Don't let my victims escape!" *Her words caused Freya to dive down after Destiny.*

Tyler: "W-Why are we going to zigzag?!" *He spoke awkwardly, watching them dive towards the water.*

Lance: "You're the nerd, why don't ya figure it out?"

Tyler: "No, we're going to cra-ash!"

Destiny: *She violently flapped her wings and water erupted on each side, as she forced herself to a complete stop above the water's surface.* "Meeheehee."

Tyler: "Oh my gosh!" *He quickly squealed in shock, ignoring his frizzed up hair.*

Destiny: "Meehehe!" *She flapped several times and flew across the water, causing Lance to smirk.*

Freya: *An explosion of water blasted all around her, as she shot across the water.* (My aerial skills are superior to Destiny's.)

Tyler: *He looked behind him and noticed Freya slowly gaining speed.* (Freya didn't even stop-)

Holland: *He smiled as they flew out of the explosion of water.* (Perfect skills, Freya.)

Tyler: *He had flashbacks of each party member in the water, causing him to panic.* "N-No, I can't do it!"

Lance: "Can't do wat-?"

Tyler: "Farewell, friends-" *He let go of Lance and flew back, off Destiny.*

PKMY: "Heh." *She smirked, watching Tyler skim past her across the water.*

Lance: "Damn, it's just us-"

Destiny: *She started to zigzag across the water, causing spurts of water to erupt on each side she zigzagged on.* "Meehee."

Freya: *Spurts of water splashed in her face.* (The water is stinging my eyes-)

Lance: *He looked behind him with curiosity.* "Aha, sucked in. Lance for final villain!" *He laughed, as he focused his attention back in front of him.*

PKMY: "That idiot somehow found a strategy!"

Holland: "I guess we'll have to cheat."

PKMY: "Cheat?"

Holland: "For you-" *He mumbled and leant forward with a smirk, looking at Freya.*

PKMY: (How?)

Holland: "Ougi."

Freya: "Gruff." *She showed her teeth, giving the illusion she was smirking.*

Holland: "Brace yourself."

PKMY: "Yea." *She tensed her legs and arms.*

Lance: "Guess I'm just too good for you-" *He looked behind him and gasped in shock.* "Where-?"

Freya: *She flashstepped in front and hit Destiny with her wing, causing Destiny to instantly disintegrate away.* "Gruff."

Lance: *He stared at PKMY in shock as he fell towards the water in slow motion.* "Noooo!"

PKMY: "Ahahahaha."

Holland: *He smirked and watched Lance crash into the water.* "Revenge completed?"

PKMY: "Not quite."

Holland: "Oh?"

PKMY: "Sorry, babe."

Holland: "Huh?"

Holland: "Yeah?" *He mumbled in a deep voice, enjoying the neck rubbing.*

PKMY: "How you were part of the plan."

Holland: "Huh?" *He quickly gasped, as if his cover was blown.*

Freya: "Ruff!" *She roared out a bark in agreement.*

PKMY: "If any one of you do that again-" *She pointed down at the party, who rode on Season's wave.* "Then you'll have another thing-" *Several balls of sand hit her in the back of the head.* "Wat?!"

Pepper: "I say-" *She blasted past PKMY at an incredible speed.*

*Freya and PKMY leant forward due to the sudden rush of air.*

Pepper: "Continuous threats lose their value after repetitiveness." *She soared across the ocean towards the shore in the far distance.*

PKMY: "Get her!"

Freya: (Certainly-) *She quickly faced Pepper and pounced forward, flashstepping into her general direction.*

Pepper: *She looked back with her golden eyes and smirked.* (Freya is able to not only flashstep, but in mid-air too-) *She suddenly blasted directly up, causing a pulse-like wave to swirl on the water.*

PKMY: "Haha-" *She spread her arms and smirked with a frown, readying herself to catch Pepper.* "Where-?"

Freya: (She's gone?)

PKMY: "Didn't you flashstep directly in front of her?"

Freya: (I did-?)

Pepper: "I say, up here!"

PKMY: "Huh?" *She looked up and noticed Pepper flying towards the clouds.*

Freya: (I won't let her escape-) *She flashstepped upwards, causing an explosion of water to ripple where she hovered.*

Freya: "Grr-" *She flashstepped above, in the direction where Pepper flew.*

Pepper: "A little slow-"

Freya: (No, I'm still in my Ancioldrant form.)

*PKMY smiled and placed the Ryukku in her mouth before backflipping out of the circle of bricks.*

PKMY: "Nope."

Chapter 6: Battling Oxident

Pepper: *She quickly swayed to each side, avoiding PKMY's fingers jabs.* "Hmm-" *She watched her hair flap over her shoulder from the force of PKMY's attack.*

Pepper: *She let go of the mallet and quickly blocked PKMY's chop with her forearm.* "Hermph-" *She leant forward and pushed PKMY back, catching the mallet before it touched the floor.*

PKMY: *She slid back and glanced at her hand, noticing it was red from where she hit Pepper.* "Tssk-"

Pepper: "Hammer Spin." *She swung the mallet and a howling wind pushed PKMY further back.*

PKMY: *She gritted her teeth and raised an arm, covering her eyes from the wind.* (She intends to use the Azure Burst's technique as tailwind and buffer-)

Pepper: *She jumped forward, giving the illusion she glided above the floor.* (Jumping in the wind's current allows me to move faster without exhausting as much Neurons as I usually would-)

PKMY: "Crippling might, twenty two finger, wind gales strike." *Her image suddenly disappeared, causing several people from the crowd to gasp.*

Pepper: (She flashstepped?)

PKMY: (Looks like she's stronger than me with that mallet of hers-)

Pepper: *Her eyes shined gold, causing PKMY's image to blur into her vision.* (No! I see her-)

PKMY: *She walked to the side, watching Pepper glide towards her in slow motion.* (She's adjusting herself towards me? I'm in a constant flashstepping state, how can she see me?)

Pepper: *She leapt into striking distance and leant back, elegantly raising her leg.* "Infinity Fury of Kicks."

PKMY: *She stared at Pepper's leg, watching her move in slow motion.* (Wateva, I'll stick to the plan-)

Pepper: (After all you've gone through, you still underestimate these eyes of mine?) *She focused on her leg, causing the muscles to visibly spasm in preparation.*

PKMY: *She frowned at Pepper's slow-moving image and swayed forward, jabbing her hand at blinding speeds.* (Hah!-)

Pepper: "Hmph-" *She quickly kicked across PKMY's face at blinding speeds, causing a sudden thump-like sound to echo.*

PKMY: "Karh-" *She looked shocked, watching Pepper tilt her head back.*

Blake: (C'mon, Amy.. You didn't even have time to react!)

Karol: (They're flying towards the ceiling? Is she going to smash PKMY into it?)

PKMY: "Grr-" *She angrily grabbed Pepper's wrist with both hands.*

Pepper: *Her wrist started to crack around PKMY's grip.* "Grah-" *She threw PKMY forward and smashed her into the roof, causing sparkles of ice to splinter around her.*

PKMY: *She grunted and opened her eyes, watching the ice sparkle past her face.* "Tssk-"

Pepper:*She hovered in the air and looked up to the roof, staring at PKMY.* (An attack with the force of cracking this castle's interior.. PKMY, that would've hurt you far more than you're letting on.)

PKMY: *She violently punched into the ice next to her and grabbed hold of the roof, keeping herself from falling down.* (Shit, that hurt-)

Pepper: "This fight has gone for too long."

PKMY: "Eh? Too long? It's only just started."

Pepper: "Hmph."

PKMY: Wateva! AIR SWIRL" *She violently pushed her free arm forward, causing a gust of wind to force Pepper back on to the floor.*

Ginger: (That Air Swirl Remenistal is clearly mastered.)

Pepper: *She casually stood on the floor and ignored the wind, watching the shards of ice blow around her.* "Hmph." *She smirked to herself, looking back up to PKMY.*

PKMY: *She noticed Pepper's smirk, causing her to frown.* (I hate when people smirk like that in battle!)

Pepper: (Is she trying to force me to my knees? I endure the resistance of wind all the time-) *She stepped back and stood on her toes, readying to dive up towards PKMY.* (This force is nothing to me-)

PKMY: (Fine, take this then!) *She suddenly jumped off the roof and pulled her hand to the side, causing the air to ripple like water.* "Seven finger snap-flying palm strike."

Pepper: (I will finish her with my-) *She paused in thought and looked across the other side of the room, noticing the mallet lying on the floor.*

PKMY: (Yeah focus your attention somewhere else!-) *She smirked, diving directly above Pepper.*

Cameron: *He intensely stared at Pepper, slightly shaking his head in disappointment.* (You should never look away from your opponent.)

Pepper: (She isn't the only one that may understand people's thoughts-) *She casually looked back up to PKMY, placing her hand to the side.*

PKMY: *She lunged into striking distance, shouting with anticipation.* "It's too late!-"

Pepper: "Seven finger snap-flying palm strike."

PKMY and Pepper: "Harh!" *They pushed their palms forward, causing a loud screech to echo in between their hands.*

Pepper: *Her hair violently blew back as she tried to push PKMY away.* "I say, you're strong."

PKMY: "Same-" *She frowned with a smirk and tried to push forward, watching her arm wobble.*

Rachael: (They're evenly matched?)

PKMY: *Her hair violently swayed to each side, as distinctive sounds of clothes ripping could be heard.* (Tssk, the Rasticsplash!-)

*A sudden burst of wind forced Pepper and PKMY back, causing the audience to gasp.*

Pepper: (Her Azure Burst matched my power!-)

*Pepper and PKMY intensely stared at each other, sliding away in opposite directions.*

PKMY: "Let's try that again! Seven finger snap-flying palm strike."

PKMY: *She placed both hands to her side and the air started to ripple.* (Don't recall using the long-range version in a while.)

Pepper: "Hermph-" *She pointed at PKMY and the arcs of light around her vanished.*

PKMY: "Eh?" *She watched the different textures of white aura push themselves back and forth in the air.*

Pepper: *She flashstepped next to PKMY and smirked, holding the mallet next to her.* "Seventy-seven divinity strike."

Nathan: (Her reaction time is about the same as mine-)

Karol: (She's attacking in a continuous spiral-like manner!)

Pepper: *She looked down past the crumbling pillar and stared at a large growing dirt cloud on the bottom.* (Missed!)

Teresa: *Her hair and cape flapped downwards, as she continued to rise higher into the air.* (Her aura has changed-)

*Teresa thought to herself in concern and elegantly straightened her hands in front, staring at Pepper.*

Teresa: "Shattering bonds, with calm Astragons, and forceful Neurons-" *A white glyph formed and drew itself in front of her hands.*

*Teresa's Pentarang reflected the light emitted from the glyph, instantly catching Pepper's attention.*

Pepper: *She looked up and noticed the glyph, hiding her shock.* "Thy see-" *She quickly flashstepped onto the ground for better footing.*

Teresa: *Her face glowed as the rotating glyph shined in front of her.* "SERENITY SWIRL"

Pepper: *She raised her arms towards Teresa.* "Shattering bonds, my Radiatons explode and implode the power of light, SERENITY SWIRL" *She pushed forward and a vortex of light blasted into the sky towards Teresa.*

Ginger: (Two of the same Remenistal but with different incantations?)

Teresa: *She raised her arm, causing two beams of light to spiral out of the glyph and into the air above her.* (I remember her Serenity Swirl on the ship-) *She dropped her arm, causing the beams of light to spiral downwards.*

Pepper: "..."

*The beams of light connected and made a violent whoosh-like sound, cueing a delayed howling gale to blow throughout the ruins.*

Teresa: *She stood on the air and frowned, focusing all her concentration on the glyph in front of her.* (I was expecting some resistance at first, but it feels like my Neurons just hit a brick wall!)

Ginger: (I love it when Remenistal connects like this.) *She smiled and leant forward, watching debris blow across the ruins in excitement.* (It is a beautiful sight, Remenistal at its top existence-)

Pepper: *She smiled in a victorious manner, watching her light suddenly shoot through Teresa's.* "Humph."

Teresa: (It burst through my Rostical!-)

*The vortex of light moved through the air at an unrealistic speed and hit Teresa, causing waves of light to explode around her.*

Teresa: (Inconceivable-) *She lost her composure and stared at the moon, falling towards the ground.*

Rachael: "Wow."

Teresa: *She coughed out blood and slowly kicked the air, causing her feet to face the ground.* "Tcch-"

Pepper: "I say, finish this match, it is over!" *She lowered her arms, looking away in a confident manner.*

Teresa: *She landed heavily on the ground, causing it to crack.* "I have been through worse. VOLCANIC ERUPTION" *She raised one arm in front of her and shouted, causing the ground to crack under Pepper.*

Pepper: *She stared at Teresa in shock, ignoring the bright red light coming from the ground.* (She's no longer weakened to the Radiaton's effects?)

Teresa: (I have placed an immense level of Neurons into this Rostical!)

Pepper: "Ougi, Angelic Celestic Siren." *She hummed on a soft-high note and silver wind blew from her mouth around her.*

Teresa: "You had plenty of opportunities to flashstep out of my Rostical's range-" *She stopped in mid-sentence and gasped as her eyes turned to silver.*

Pepper: "I say, if I flashstepped then you wouldn't have prepared the Remenistal, yeah?" *She smirked and casually stepped off the cracks, noticing their lava-like glow.*

Teresa: (What-?!) *She gritted her teeth in struggle, slowly lowering her arm.*

Pepper: *She looked at the cracks in the ground, causing her to glance at Teresa.* "It looks like it's ready."

Teresa: "T-T-Tcch-" *She grunted and hesitantly dragged her feet, slowly walking towards where Pepper stood.*

Pepper: "Defeated by your own Remenistal."

Teresa: (I can not move my body!-)

Pepper: *She held her eye in pain, as a tear of blood ran down her cheek.* (She's powerful, my Ougi will not last long-) *She nodded her head, causing Teresa to raise her hand.*

Teresa: "Tcch-" *A red glyph flashed under her feet and an eruption of lava exploded beneath her, causing several of the spectators to gasp in disgust.*

Rachael: *She slightly squinted her eyes.* (It's just as bright as the Meister siblings.)

Madora: (Terra-) *She didn't wait for the lava to stop.* "It appears Teresa is unable to battle! Pepper wins!"

*The area started to revert back to normal, causing the Rostical to prematurely finish.*

Teresa: *Her skin was black and she fell to the ground.* (Is this how devastating my own power is-?)

Pepper: *She flashstepped in front of Teresa, catching her in her arms.* "I say, are you okay?"

Teresa: *A revitalising wind healed her wounds, causing her skin to revert back to normal.* "S-Such an Ougi-"

Pepper: *She tilted her head on a side with a smile.* "Thy tend to only use it on Scoldrants or other beings."

Teresa: "Hoh?"

Pepper: "Because I don't feel right controlling other people."

Teresa: "So, I should take it as a compliment? The fact you were forced to go against your own moral code to take me down?"

Pepper: "Hmph. You're not only quick on your feet?" *She smiled as if she was impressed with Teresa's deduction.*

Teresa: *She slowly regained her awareness and stood on her feet.* "I believed I had seen it all."

Pepper: "My Ougi works similar to how Rostical Users use illusions."

Teresa: (Jewel..) "You affect the senses by asserting you own Astragons into the opponent?"

Pepper: "Close, I insert my Radiatons into the opponent's bloodstream via my siren. I then manipulate the opponent's Astragons and control it through a connected resonance of Neurons."

Teresa: (Impressive.)

Pepper: "I am curious to know more about your ability."

Teresa: "Understood-" *She glanced at the audience and stepped to the side, focusing her attention to the gate.* "Let us go, we can talk in the waiting area."

Pepper: *She nodded her head and picked up the mallet which rested on the ground next to her.* "Yes."

Madora: *She watched Pepper and Teresa flashstep out of the arena.* "Next is-"

Holland: *He walked into the arena and slowly exhaled, keeping himself relaxed.* (He's been an awesome, and entertaining friend. So, I want to see how well he goes.)

Freya: (Why?) *Her voice echoed in Holland's mind.*

Holland: (Maybe to take him seriously? To compare strengths? I'm not sure.)

Lance: *He ran into the arena and stopped in the middle.* "Oi, ya big ogre."

Holland: *He smirked and raised an eyebrow.* "Hmm?"

Lance: "Pick ya arena already-"

Madora: "Choose your arena!" *Her voice caused Lance to cockily smirk at Holland.*

Holland: *He touched his chest and tribal markings, watching the arena blur around him.* "Come out!" *He punched forward and a purple glyph spiralled in front of him.*

Lance: *A large fern suddenly slapped him across the face as the area turned into a thick damp forest.* "Aye?" *He grunted with a frown, violently flicking the fern behind him.*

Freya: *She jumped out of the glyph and landed on all fours, facing Lance in a welcoming manner.* "Ruff."

Lance: "Oh shut it, fleabag-"

Freya: "Grr." *Her docile like personality towards Lance quickly changed into aggressiveness.*

Luna: (It's like a clearin' surrounded by thick bamboo looking trees.)

Destiny: (I like it yeup!) *Her voice echoed in Luna's head.*

Madora: "Holland versus Lance!-"

Chapter 11: Holland Versus. Lance

Madora: "Let the battle begin!"

Lance: *He noticed thick patches of differently-shaped ferns, causing him to grunt in frustration.* "Why'd you pick such a stupid level?!" *He stared at Holland who stood on the spot with his arms folded.*

Holland: "'Cause." *He smirked with confidence.*

Lance: "Sorry, man, but wateva-" *He straightened his arm and pointed it at Holland.* "LIGHTNING-"

Freya: "Bwarh!" *Her bark gargled from behind Lance.*

Lance: "Wha!?" *He sounded shocked and turned around at a wall of ferns.* "I heard-"

*A vortex of high pressured water swirled through the vegetation and hit Lance, knocking him onto the ground.*

Lance: "Bah-" *He flicked water off his hands, looking at the wall of ferns.*

Freya: *She ran through the long ferns, circling around Lance.* (What a good environment to choose.)

Lance: (The dumb dog is usin' the forest as a cover.. I can't see her.)

Holland: *He smiled, watching Lance stand back up with an angry face.* (I thought of you this time.)

Freya: "Ruff." *She barked in appreciation, causing Lance to quickly glance on his side.*

Lance: *He brushed wet hair off his forehead and spun around, keeping a close eye on the moving ferns.* (Gotcha!-) "LIGHTNING BLAST"

*Lance quickly raised his hand and pushed forward, blasting a stream of lightning through the ferns.*

Holland: (You're far off, Lance.)

Lance: "Aye?" *He watched the lightning string in between several branches in confusion.* "Why didn't it catch on fire?"

Holland: "I figured you would use your lightning to burn away the environment, so that's why I specifically chose the arena to be a rainforest."

Lance: "Rainforest? Wat's the point?"

Rachael: "Seriously?" *Her disappointed tone, caused Luna, Nathan and Blake to chuckle.*

Holland: "Everything is damp, wet."

Lance: "Wet, hey?" *He smirked and pointed to the ground.* "LIGHTNING BLAST" *He shot a stream of lightning in the ground and watched bursts of dirt and grass fly up into the air.*

Rachael: "At least he's trying."

Luna: "I am not related to him."

Rachael: "Hehe."

Lance: "Nothin'?"

Freya: (Sonic Roar.) *She stared at Lance's back and opened her jaw, barking out a visible shockwave.*

Lance: "H-Huh!" *He quickly spun and faced the sound in shock.* "You're-? Blargh!-" *He suddenly bent forward in pain, as the shockwave hit him in the stomach.*

Freya: *She pounced out from a cluster of ferns and stared at Lance's back, running towards him with extended claws.* "Gruff-"

Lance: (The damn dog was behind me-?!) *He wrapped his arms around his stomach, staring at the ground in pain.*

Freya: *She leapt through the air over Lance and pounced into the wall of vegetation behind him.* (This is too easy.)

Lance: *He grunted and stood up straight, pretending he wasn't hurt.* "Oi, come out."

Holland: (You can literally run in circles before he can react to your Azure Bursts.)

Lance: *He spun around and clicked his fingers, causing a stream of lightning to form itself into a sword.* "I won't hurt ya-" *He pointed the sword in front of him with a slight smirk.* (Much.)

Holland: (Keep it up, Freya.) *He stared at a cluster of bushes as if he knew the location to her whereabouts.*

Lance: *He stepped away from nearby ferns, swaying his sword to each side in a paranoid manner.* "Come on out-" *The wet leaves of the ferns slightly flickered light, due to his lightning.*

Freya: *She pounced out of the ferns towards Lance.* "Gruff."

Lance: *He looked up and smirked.* "You really are a dumb dog-"

Freya: (Aerial Pounce.) *Her speed drastically and suddenly increased, allowing her to jump on top of Lance.* "Grah-"

Lance: "Stupid-" *He stumbled back and pointed the lightning at Freya, readying to ram it through her side.* "Sorry, flea-"

Freya: "Grah-" *She bent her legs, flicking Lance's arm away with her tail.*

Lance: (The shit just tail whipped me!-)

Freya: "Gruff-" *She kicked forward, knocking Lance off his feet and into the air.*

Holland: (Awesome work!)

Lance: (What the friggin' dirty shit nuggets?!)

Freya: *She elegantly landed on all fours and wagged her tail.* "Ruff."

*Several villagers in the audience cheered with amazement.*

Lance: *He awkwardly landed on a small bush, causing his lightning sword to lose its swirl and spark away.* "You're cheerin' on the wrong person!"

Freya: "Gerooh!" *She howled into the air in a victorious manner.*

Lance: "Stupid dog!"

Freya: *She squinted her eyes at Lance and growled, separating her legs for a better stance.* (I'll have to burn-)

Holland: (It's fine, this isn't a real forest.)

Freya: (Okay-) *Liquid-like flames dripped out from the sides of her mouth, catching Lance's attention.*

Lance: "You might want to get that checked out-"

Freya: (Gargling Flaming Wheel.) *She leant forward, barking out a vortex of flames towards Lance.*

Holland: "..." *He watched the fire burn the surrounding vegetation.*

Lance: "Huh-?" *He stood up and stared at the flames, causing him to step back in shock.* "Shit-" *He stepped to the side and flashstepped out of the flame's range.*

Holland: *He looked to each side, trying to spot Lance.* (Be on guard, Lance is usually a full-frontal fighter.)

Freya: "Gruff!" *She bent her knees and lowered her head, preparing for Lance's inevitable attack.*

Lance: *He flashstepped behind Freya and ran towards her, raising his hand for an attack.* "Flames? Wait, I thought it was water-?" *He tripped on an ankle high bush, causing him to fall face first into the ground.*

Holland: (I used to trip over in forests all the time when I was younger. Checking your surroundings has become second nature to me.)

Freya: *She jumped into the air and spun around facing Lance, landing on all fours.* (Holland?)

Holland: (How about that Ice Fang?)

Freya: (Ice Fang.) *She opened her jaw and her two longest teeth shined a fluoro blue.*

Lance: *He looked up and noticed two streams of ice zigzag towards him.* "Huh-?"

Freya: "Grah-" *She closed her jaw and the streams bit into Lance's arm, causing him to yell.*

Holland: "Good work, Freya!"

Lance: (Holland?) *He discreetly looked to the side and formed a fist, causing a swirl of lightning to shatter the surrounding ice away.* (I'm an idiot!)

Freya: (Have I fought Lance before?)

Holland: (I don't think so, well, not at least seriously, why?)

Freya: (His lightning, he's never made me feel fear before-)

Holland: (His lightning frightens her-?)

Lance: "THUNDER BOOM" *He punched the air towards Freya and rumbles of thunder shattered the remaining ice.*

Freya: (Aerial Pounce.) *She jumped high into the air and looked down, watching a line of vegetation blow back due to the thunder.*

Lance: "Smear upon the skies and envelop your might, thunder roar down-" *He clapped his hands and a ring of blue lightning sparked around them.*

Holland: (Be careful, Freya, I've seen him use this before, it moves very fast!) *He watched Lance stare at Freya from the ground.*

Freya: *Her ears, tail and fur flapped in the air.* (Got it! Sonic-)

Lance: "LIGHTNING PULSE" *He quickly spun around and pushed forward towards Holland.*

Holland: "Huh?" *A ring of blue lightning rumbled like thunder towards him.*

Freya: (Holland!)

Holland: *He grunted in alert and stared at the lightning, quickly jumping to the side.* "Argh-" *The lightning touched his foot and travelled up his body, causing him to yell in pain.*

Lance: "Owgee, Brazza's Supreme Strobe Light Storm." *He raised his arms and lowered them, causing lightning as thick as trees to strike downwards.*

Luna: *She smirked, watching the lightning blast on top of Holland.* (I wonder whose Owgee is stronger? Mine or his?)

Destiny: (Yours is effective at binding the opponent with a mass combo of arrows inside a Reality Sekai, yeup!)

Luna: (True.. But, I've also got our Hi-Owgee in terms of power.)

Destiny: (Yes!)

Holland: (It burns!-) *He scrunched his eyes shut in pain as he twitched back and forth.*

Freya: *She growled at Lance and flapped her wings, causing her to stay in the air.* (Gargling-) *Lightning struck on top of her back and slammed her into the ground.* "Grarh-oowel!"

Holland: (I can't!-) *He gritted his teeth and tried to move.*

Freya: (I can't move my body!)

Lance: "Whoo." *He stretched and smirked, watching strings of lightning flash around Holland and Freya.*

Holland: (I can't-..) *He sighed and fell unconscious while his body continued to violently twitch.*

Madora: "It appears Holland is unable to battle! Lance wins!" *She watched the area revert back into the arena.*

Lance: *He took several steps towards Holland as a revitalising wind awakened him.* "You all good?"

Holland: *He quickly stood up and grunted, stretching his back.* "Yeah-" *He held his throat, causing Freya to disintegrate into nothing.* (How about you?)

Freya: (The wind healed me, thank you-) *Her voice echoed in Holland's mind.*

Holland: (But still?)

Freya: (To be honest, I'm pretty sure I felt your heart stop at one point..)

Holland: (Crud! Your instincts were right, his lightning is definitely dangerous-)

Lance: "Oi! Let's get goin'."

Holland: "Yeah sure, good match." *He mumbled and scratched the back of his head.*

Lance: "Aha, sure was. The trick where the dumb dog kept sneakin' around me in the bushes, I bet that would've been pretty funny to watch."

Holland: "Ha ha, it was."

Lance: "Pssht, wateva." *He smirked and quickly walked with Holland out of the arena.*

Madora: "Next is-"

Season: *He hobbled into the arena and stood in the middle.* (I'm rather shocked with this match request-)

Tyler: *He staggered out of the gate and into the arena.* (I asked Season for a match-)

Luna: "Tyler?" *She leant forward in shock.*

Rachael: "What?!" *Her eyes widened in confusion.*

Lezard: (He doesn't know Remenistal and can't use Azure Bursts? Despite having the title of quickfingers, I'm not sure how well he can hold his own against Season!)

Tyler: (This way, I can show him what Ragnarok can really do-) *He stopped in the middle and nervously held the RPG bag's strap around his shoulder.*

Season: "Are you okay, Tyler?"

Tyler: "..." *He silently looked away as if he was hesitant on fighting Season.*

Season: "Tyler-?"

Madora: "Choose your scenery."

Tyler: (This was my favourite area besides work-) *He closed his eyes and the area blurred.*

Season: "Hmm?" *He looked around, noticing differently-shaped coloured blocks which acted as obstacles.*

Luna: (Wow, awesome!)

Rachael: "Cool!" *She bounced to the edge of the seat with nostalgic excitement.*

Season: "Where is this?" *He noticed black paint smeared across the ground and on the coloured blocks.*

Tyler: "Dee Highs, the paintball area."

Ginger: "Ey, Rachael, why so excited, please respond?"

Luna: "She used to manage this area."

Ginger: "This entire area? Impressive." *She spoke with a smile, looking back to the arena.*

Season: "Oh?" *He looked around, intrigued.*

Madora: "Tyler versus. Season-"

Chapter 12: Season Versus. Tyler

Madora: "Begin!"

Season: "Remember, you can give up at any point during the battle-"

Tyler: "Ougi." *He threw both hands into the RPG bag and quickly ran behind a block out of Season's eyesight.*

Karol: "H-How come?"

Blake: "He's got no Neurons and Astragons, lame if ya ask me."

Cameron: "Do not underestimate his power. He was able to defeat a number one ranking captain."

Rachael: "He what?"
Luna: "Wut?" *Their gasps caught Nathan's attention.*

Blake: (A captain?!)

Rachael: "Number one? Really?"

Cameron: "Indeed." *He nodded his head as he recalled Tyler blasting Dakota's head into tiny white orbs.*

Season: *He sighed and pointed his hand at the block.* (I really didn't want to fight you, Tyler-) "DIMENSION CRISIS" *Small purple rings clustered in between his hands and he flicked his hand at the block.*

*A purple firework exploded against the block, causing it to explode.*

Rachael: "I'm really curious about Tyler's Ougi, but Season has the complete upper hand."

Ginger: "I concur."

Cameron: (Despite his Ougi, Season does have the complete upper hand.)

Ginger: "I want to know how he can use the Ougi, it is not logical or explainable."

Season: *Black smoke quickly masked the area as the firework burnt the plastic.* "Tyler?" *He stepped forward, shouting out in a worried manner.*

Lezard: (Dimension Crisis looks like a similar Remenistal affinity Karol uses.. It can't be categorised in the basic elements and doesn't have Radiatons to be classed as light-based, maybe it's Shadiatons?)

Season: *He watched the smoke eventually clear, revealing nothing but black grass.* "T-Tyler?!" *He started to panic.*

Blake: "Fufufu, did he just blow up that guy to nothing?" *He leant forward with a smirk.*

Nathan: "Surely Madora would've said something already."

Blake: "Hmm, true aye."

Tyler: *He sat on the ground resting his back on a block with his hands still in the RPG bag.* "Mastered state of Alchemy and Crafting I show you, Ragnarok." *He threw his hands out and white liquid swirled around his fingers.*

Season: *He looked up and faced the direction where Madora would be, only staring at a large warehouse.* (Blast it-)

Tyler: *His face slightly flickered, due to the swirling light.* (I have to give it my all. For some reason, I'm more nervous than when I was fighting that captain.)

Season: *He took a deep breath.* (If the battle hasn't finished, then he's obviously still-)

Tyler: *He jumped up from a block far away, causing Season to gasp in relief.* (One of the reasons why I spent most of my time creating and practising this weapon-)

*Tyler squealed in thought and pulled the triggers to two handguns, shooting green fluoro bullets at Season.*

Season: *Several bullets shot into his arm, causing small streams of green smoke-like residue to evaporate off tiny holes in his robes.* "AQUA LIQUID" *He swayed his arm and a wave of water crashed in front of him blocking the other bullets.*

Tyler: *The handguns turned into liquid and started to change shape.* (I want to show Season how much I've grown. I want to be the best researcher-)

Season: *He looked down and gently placed his finger in one of the bullet holes, causing him to hiss in pain.* (These wounds are akin to a Rasticsplash.)

Tyler: *He quickly ran towards another maze of blocks, taking advantage of Season's distracted attention.* (I'll do what Freya did with Lance and utilise my surroundings.)

Rachael: *She watched Tyler hide himself in between two blocks, triggering flashbacks of many paintball games.* (Not many people know this, but Tyler was actually very good at paintballing.)

Season: *He moved his arm and observed his wounds with a proud smile.* (Alright-) *He focused his attention to the blocks, looking around where he last saw Tyler.* (He's hiding again?)

Tyler: *He held a large metallic tube.* (I devised this form specifically for this type of scenario-)

Season: (I used to deal with Scoldrants and warriors that hid within the environment-) *He stamped his foot and a swirl of liquid spiralled around his leg.* "AQUATIC DIVIDER"

Tyler: *He felt vibrations along the ground, causing him to look puzzled.* (I better fire it now-) *He pointed the large tube into the air and slightly tilted it behind him.*

Season: (This should get him out of hiding.) *He swayed both arms and watched a large wave sweep across the blocks.*

Tyler: "Huh?" *He looked to his side and stared at a large wave, rumbling towards him.* "N-No!-"

Season: *He mumbled in a curious manner, looking to each side.* (I heard him.)

Tyler: *The wave brushed past him, causing him to tumble to the side.* "Blah-" *He awkwardly landed on the tube and coughed out water, accidentally pulling the trigger.*

*A big green ball misfired out of the cannon-like tube and hit a nearby block, creating a large fluoro green explosion.*

Cameron: "That explosion, at such a close range to Tyler, he will-"

Tyler: *The explosion caused a pulse of water and wind to blast him out of hiding.* "Argh-"

Season: *He watched Tyler slide into his vision, noticing the tube in his hand.* (So he's able to change the shape of the weapon? How quickly and how often can he do that?) *He mumbled to himself, looking at the green explosion in amazement.*

Tyler: *He quickly stood up and stepped in a puddle, watching Season point both hands towards him.* (Too bad the grenade launcher didn't work out well. Luckily, I've been able to speed up the transition between different forms-) *The long tube turned into liquid and swirled around him.*

Season: *A swirl of visible wind howled in between his hands.* "FLURRY STYX" *He cupped his hands and pushed forward, blasting a condensed ball of wind towards Tyler.*

Tyler: *The liquid formed into a medieval-like shield.* "Argh-" *The wind hit his shield and he blasted back across the ground.*

Rachael: (A shield?)

Tyler: (It's strong-) *He thought with a struggling frown and watched the wind pulse away from his shield.*

Season: (He used a shield to wall my Rostical? That is such a strange Ougi-)

Tyler: *A spike erected out of the shield and he aimed the shield at Season in a defensive manner.* (I have to prove how good I am.)

*Tyler watched the spike shine a fluoro green, cueing him to nudge the shield forward, blasting the spike towards Season.*

Season: *He raised his arm and spun around, pointing his hand at Tyler.* "PIERCING CLOUDS" *A curved cloud-like smog waved in front of him.*

Tyler: (Please work!)

*The green spike hit the cloud and momentarily stopped before piercing through the Rostical and towards Season.*

Ginger: (Tyler who can not use Remenistal has the ability to pierce through it!) *She watched the green spike spiral out the smog, making its way towards Season's head.* (He simply astonishes me.)

*Ginger paused in thought and shook her head in amazement as if she couldn't believe what she was witnessing.*

Season: (How-?!) *He quickly stepped to the side, watching the spike blast past him.* (Close-)

Nathan: *He watched the spike shoot through the air and into the warehouse.* (Not many projectiles can pierce through Rostical. Luna and Rach are a different case though-)

Tyler: *Another spike erected out of the shield and shined a fluoro green.* (I can do this!-) *The spike shot itself out of the shield and blasted towards Season.*

Season: (I know I can avoid this, but-) "Winds, gentle and agile, gallop with pride and take on your natural prowess." *He spun around raising his arm.*

Ginger: (He used the Remenistal's incantation-)

Season: "PIERCING CLOUDS" *He dropped his hand at Tyler, causing a thick cloud of smoke-like smog to wave towards Tyler.*

*The green spike hit the cloud and momentarily stopped, causing several members of the audience to gasp with anticipation.*

Tyler: *He looked past the shield, staring at the spike in shock.* (My projectile is having trouble going through, he must've put more Neurons into the Rostical-)

*The smoke-like smog pulsed, causing the spike to wobble.*

Blake: "He's actually doing pretty good, hey."

*Suddenly the smoke and spike disintegrated into a pulse of green vapour.*

Tyler: (His Rostical withstood the spike?! This weapon was designed purposely for breaking through Rostical!)

Season: (They blocked each other!) *He frowned in thought, watching the cloud and vapour slowly fade away.* (I was hoping my Rostical would block his projectile and continue to blast towards him.)

Tyler: *He ran towards Season and aimed a bazooka for his head.* "I can do this!"

Season: *He gasped and stepped back as the bazooka made laser-like charging sounds.* "Might, strength, fury, courage, form these emotions in array of mighty pillars, GROUND SHAKING"

Tyler: "Harh-" *He shot a large green fluoro ball, causing him to stumble back.*

Season: *He reached behind his back and sparks scattered around his large red trident.* (I never would have thought-)

*A thick pillar of rock erupted up in front of Season, blocking Tyler's projectile.*

Season: (I never would have thought I'd have to go serious on you, Tyler-)

*The pillar of rock shattered into pieces behind an explosion of green swirls.*

Season: *He watched rocks fly past his face in shock.* (The projectile's strength shattered my boosted Rostical with ease!-)

Tyler: *He quickly dropped to one knee and aimed the bazooka at the large dirt cloud which enveloped Season.* (I can't believe I'm doing it!-)

Season: *He waved his trident and the dirt cloud instantly blew away.* "Good work, Tyler-"

*Season spoke with an emotionless face, pointing the trident at Tyler.*

Lezard: *He stared at Season, observing his body posture.* "He's serious now."

Season: "Powers of the never ending red, beat and skip through the winds, FIRE'S PULSE" *A ring of fire burnt the air at the end of trident.* "Harh."

Tyler: *His bazooka glimmered red before a ring of flames swirled in front of him.* "N-No-" *He spoke under his breath, staring at the flames with widening eyes.*

Season: (Sorry, Tyler-)

Tyler: *The ring of flames suddenly burst, pushing him off his feet.* "Oof-"

Ginger: *She watched Tyler fly back in the air, causing him to drop the bazooka.* "Now the match has been determined."

Lezard: "My delightful spice? Why do you say that?"

Ginger: "Because Tyler's trump card is now out of his grasp."

Tyler: "Argh-" *He awkwardly hit the ground and moaned in pain.*

Season: *He swayed the trident in the air as arcs of lightning zapped down it.* "Drums of terror from the skies, flash down and amplify, LIGHTNING SLICE" *He swayed the trident and a spear of lightning shot towards Tyler.*

Tyler: *He coughed and wheezed, tightly holding onto the RPG bag.* (I know how Season fights-) *He squinted his eyes in determination and randomly rolled to one side out of the way.*

Luna: "Wat a trooper." *She grunted with a giggle, watching Tyler roll out of the Rostical's range.*

*The lightning struck through the ground, causing a trail of dirt to explode into the air.*

Teresa: *Her hair violently flapped backwards.* (Tcch-)

Holland: *He raised an eyebrow and slowly shook his head in confusion.* "Amy, stop being so vague."

PKMY: "Well, I shouldn't have to be. What use of having a high ranked Scoldrant User if he can't sense it?!"

Holland: (I only sensed her vitals because I thought there was something wrong.) *He closed his eyes and concentrated.*

PKMY: (Nothing to say, that's what I thought-) *She continued to stare at herself in the mirror, discreetly waiting for Holland's reply.*

Holland: *Three heartbeats loudly echoed in his ear.* (There's nothing wrong, I don't know. Any ideas?)

Freya: (I don't sense anything wrong either, but I sense a mixture of emotions from her.)

Holland: (Yeah me too.)

Freya: (Maybe-) *She heard another heartbeat, causing her to stop in mid-sentence.*

Holland: (Freya?)

Freya: (Stop trying to sense for something negative.)

Holland: (What does that mean?)

Freya: (...)

Holland: "Ah, no.. She's being vague too." *He grunted to himself and sighed, opening his eyes in frustration.*

PKMY: "Freya?"

Holland: "Yeah." *He walked towards PKMY, oblivious to what's happening.* "If I've done something wrong-.."

*Holland spoke in a caring manner and gently grabbed PKMY's shoulder, spinning her around.*

PKMY: *She stared at Holland in a serious manner.* "N-No."

Holland: *He wrapped his arms around her and closed his eyes.* "I don't like it when we don't tell each other things-" *His arms instinctively twitched, causing him to look surprised.*

PKMY: "Eh?"

Holland: (What was that feeling?) *He looked at his arms in shock, filled with confusion.*

PKMY: "Holly?"

Holland: "I felt a heartbeat, but.. I don't know?"

PKMY: *A smile twitched on the corner of her mouth.* "O-Oh?"

Holland: *He inspected himself before staring into PKMY's eyes.* "Weird? It was like you had two heartbeats."

PKMY: "..." *She silently stared back into his eyes.*

Holland: *He chuckled and smiled.* "Maybe I am a bad Scoldrant User-" *He noticed PKMY's blank facial expression, causing his smile to slowly fade away.*

PKMY: "..." *She slowly looked down to Holland's chest and to the floor.*

Holland: (Two heartbeats? She's not allowed to fight-?) *He gasped with surprise and amazement.*

PKMY: "Heh." *She smirked.* (I sense his emotions-)

Holland: "Y-You're-?!" *He gently placed his hands on her stomach.*

PKMY: "Y-Yea." *She looked up and slowly nodded her head.*

Holland: "I don't believe it!-" *He quickly grabbed her around the waist and lifted her up before spinning around.*

PKMY: "Hehe."

Holland: *His face turned red with excitement.* "W-When did you find out?" *He gently placed PKMY on the floor, intensely staring at her.*

PKMY: "During Battling Oxident. I kept sensing another."

Holland: "W-Wow, how embarrassing." *He chuckled.*

PKMY: "What is?" *She smiled while tilting her head on a side in a curious manner.*

Holland: "Pretty bad how an empath and Scoldrant User didn't pick up on it sooner."

PKMY: "Yea-.." *She coughed and looked up.* "Rachael has a good soul, that was the reason why she didn't deliver that final killing blow. I'll ensure to be more careful with my body for now on-"

Holland: *He kissed her on the lips and chuckled in disbelief.* "I haven't been this happy since-"

Freya: *She looked up in the dark room and growled, causing a purple glyph to spiral in front of Holland.* "Gruff-"

PKMY: "H-Huh?" *She stepped back in shock as Freya jumped out of the glyph.* "Freya?"

Holland: (Since meeting Freya.)

Freya: (I'm happy!-) *Her body shrunk in size and she flapped her wings towards PKMY's face.* "Ruff-" *She hovered in the air, licking PKMY's nose.*

Holland: (My two little girls-) *He smirked and placed his hands behind his head.* (And another joy on its way.)

*Lance and Alicia adjusted their new garments and checked each other out, smiling in response.*

Luna: "Umm.."

Lance: "Hey, isn't that one of them Crystalline Membrane or Blossom things?"

Luna: "What?" *She glanced at Lance in shock as if she was surprised he was correct.*

Lance: "Yea, sometimes I know what I'm actually talkin' about."

Lance: "Why?"

Lance: "Explain?"

Luna: "It was a parting gift." *She mumbled.* "It's also a Summonce Scarbra."

Lance: "Aye?"

Luna: "Just touch the damn crystal." *She grunted in an annoyed manner.*

Luna: *She paused in confusion, glancing across the room in disappointment.* "Maybe it doesn't work?"

Lance: "Oh well, it was a dud. No biggie-"

*Strings of green light swirled out of the crystal, forming small white orbs.*

Luna: (It's workin'-?!)

?????: "Please don't be frightened-" *A man's voice echoed from the clustering light, as it slowly took shape of a man.*

Lance: *He glanced at his hand, twitching his fingers in disappointment.* (Damn-)

Luna: "If you want me to fight, then just say so-" *She clicked her fingers and electricity streamed around her hand, forming into a bow.*

?????: "Luna, Lance. Sit back down." *The light's brightness started to fade, revealing the man's identity.*

Luna: "D-Daddy?"

*Lance ran straight through Leon and fell to the floor, grunting with emotional pain.*

Leon: "We found ways to see each other before and after missions."

Luna: "Oh, that's right, you guys ain't allowed to see each other, aye."

Leon: *He looked down, hesitantly nodding his head.* "Yeah. Sometimes we even helped each other do missions."

Luna: "So, we're safe to say, you got to know each other really well?"

Leon: "Yeah. It was an amazing seven months-"

Lance: "Whoa, big time skip there."

Leon: "You want me to show you every single mission for the next seven months?!"

Lance and Luna: "Yes!-"

Leon: "Yeah, no."

Luna: (Aha.. I feel so comfortable with him. It's like, we don't know each other that well, but it feels like I can tell him anythin'-)

Leon: "So, we're doing some romantic stuff and we decide it's finally time we told our peers."

Lance: "Ooo, this will be excitin'-" *He unintentionally tightened his grip on the crystal, leaning forward with anticipation.*

--

*Leon and Kairi lay along a bed of differently coloured flowers, looking up to the beautiful clear sky.*

Kairi: *She pointed straight up, drawing Leon's attention to faint flickers in the sky.* "And that's the lunar signs."

Leon: "Fascinating. I didn't know you could see some stars while it was still daylight."

Kairi: "Hehe." *She took a deep breath, mentally preparing herself.* "Today is the day."

Leon: "How do you think they'll take it?"

Kairi: "Well, if it was anything like us, they'll probably neglect it at first, then realise how foolish they are."

Leon: "Yea, the Elementalists and Remenistal Users combining forces. It could really serve our people well by sharing each other's resources."

Kairi: "Wow, that's big talk from a numpty."

Leon: "Oi, I told you to stop callin' me that."

Kairi: "Told you to stop calling me that." *She groaned in an idiot-like manner, causing Leon to roll on top of her.* "Hehe, what are you doing, Leon?"

Leon: "Leon?" *He leant back, raising an eyebrow in a curious manner.* "This is Margaret, lemme absorb your Astragons!-"

*Leon growled like a bear and bit Kairi's neck, causing her to screech with a giggle.*

--

Luna: "Is it weird I actually like watching the younger version of you two?"

Leon: "Ah?" *He looked confused as if he was unsure how to respond.*

Lance: "In our defence, it's not somethin' many people will get to see."

Luna: "Yea." *She nodded her head, smiling at Leon as if she was happy to be with him.*

Leon: *He tilted his head and sighed, looking at the floor in a serious manner.* "Turns out they didn't like the idea as much as we had hoped.."

--

Kairi: *She stood in a secluded forest, crying in Leon's arms.* "What is so bad about us?"

Leon: "Nothin'. It'll just take time-"

Kairi: "We don't have time! We need their support."

Leon: "We don't have time?"

Kairi: *She leant back and sniffed, wiping away her tears with an awkward smile.* "We don't."

Leon: "I'm not followin' you?"

Kairi: "Feel my Neurons-" *She sniffed again and grabbed Leon's hand, placing it against her stomach.*

Leon: *He moved his fingers and concentrated as if he was trying to find something.* "I don't-" *He gasped with widening eyes, causing him to smile.*

Kairi: *She nodded her head in a proud manner.* "..."

Leon: "How did you know?"

Kairi: "Well-" *She stepped back and straightened her arm, causing Leon to look even more confused.*

Leon: "Is this some Remenistal User thing-?"

Kairi: "LIGHTNING BLAST" *She pushed her arm, blasting a faint string of lightning into the air.*

Leon: "Wow! You know lightning too?!"

Kairi: *She sighed and rolled her eyes.* "No.. My elemental affinity is wind."

Leon: "But how can you-?" *He paused in mid-sentence, suddenly grunting in realisation.* "OK, gotcha."

Kairi: "So, that's why we need help."

Leon: "I can raise our little one-" *He eagerly and arrogantly shook his head.* "We don't need their help."

Kairi: "I've heard of an offspring being able to use either of their parents' affinity. But, I've never heard of the parent being able to use their offspring's affinity before."

Leon: "I see what you mean now."

Kairi: "We have no idea what the mixture of our abilities will do."

Leon: "OK. I'm takin' you to Celestiana."

Kairi: "Celest?"

Leon: "She'll know what to do!" *He grabbed Kairi's hand and frowned in determination, power walking through the forest.*

--

Lance: "That sucks they couldn't help you out."

Luna: "Well, this totally explains our abilities."

Lance: "So, who's the baby?"

Leon and Luna: "..."

Lance: "Wat?"

Luna: "After viewin' some of your memories, I see where Lance gets his intelligence from."

--

Celest: *She stood on The Divine Path, staring at Leon and Kairi with a dropping jaw.* "Elementalist and Remenistal User?"

Kairi: "What do we do?"

Leon: "Just name it, anything, and I'll do it to the best of my abilities-" *He frowned with determination, glancing at Kairi.* "For my family."

Kairi: *She discreetly smiled at Leon.* "Celest?"

Celest: "There are two things that worry me."

Leon: "W-Wat is it?!"

Celest: "One, is the well-being of your child. And two, the mixture of blood."

Kairi: "Well-being?"

Leon: "What about our blood?"

Celest: "Thy'm not sure how, but news of your child will be inevitably spread across the lands."

Leon: (If they responded so negatively for us just being together, I'd hate to think what they would do if they heard about-) *He gritted his teeth in thought, forming a fist.*

Celest: "The reason thou two were chosen for our previous mission nearly a year ago, was because of your powerful bloodlines and affinity abilities."

Kairi: "My affinity allows me to recharge Neurons just by using the wind's current."

Leon: "Wow, really?!"

Kairi: "Hehe, yeah? Didn't I tell you that before?"

Leon: "No!-"

Celest: "Point being, thy'm not sure how this will affect your child."

Kairi: "It could make him very powerful."

Celest: "Or, it could cause immense stress on the child, which possibly and could lead up to death."

Kairi: *She silently gasped, staring at Celest with a dropping jaw.* (Death?)

Leon: "No.. What can we do, Celestiana?"

Celest: "It would be wise to take precautions seriously."

Kairi: "Anything for our baby?"

Celest: "Thy recommend a seal."

Leon: "A, seal?"

Celest: "Indeed. It's plausible to avoid the possibility of damage, by merely sealing one of your powers away."

Kairi: "That sounds fair." *She looked at Leon as if his opinion mattered.* "Leon?"

Leon: *He nodded his head.* "Yes. I agree with this."

Celest: "Then, whose powers shall be sealed?"

Leon: "I think mine."

Kairi: "Why?"

Leon: "Lightning is a dangerous affinity to have."

Kairi: "But you'll be there to raise him."

Celest: "Thy see a valid point. Thy'm shocked it wasn't obvious sooner."

Kairi: "Okay. What do we do?"

Celest: "Leon, thy will show thou how to communicate with The Voice of On."

Kairi: "The Voice of On?"

Leon: *He glanced at Kairi, shaking his head.* "I'll explain it to you later."

Kairi: "Okay."

Celest: "Are thou ready?" *She glanced at Kairi and Leon, waiting for their responses.*

Lance: "My bad."

Leon: "That's coming up now." *He smiled, triggering another flashback.*

--

Leon: *He opened his eyes, noticing Celest and Kairi standing around him.* "It's done-"

Celest: "My close companion. She may be able to help thou."

*Celest, Kairi and Leon stood in a line on a cold shore, staring at a woman's back.*

Celest: *She slightly bent her knees in respect and stood up straight, glancing at Kairi's baby bump.* "We have lots to discuss."
