Chapter 02: Appendix

Acro Berries - Nutritious berries which instantly revitalises one's energy.
Ambrosia Flower - Flower said to heal any type of poison.
Ancient Scoldrant - Or Ancioldrants, Scoldrants of immense power.
Astragenicons - Ancient word for Astragons.
Astragon - The force to bend, manipulate space. Counter part of Neurons.
Astragon Projection - Traces of Astragons remained after death. Image of the user.
Astral - Term usually referred to something Astragon related.
Astral-line - Term used for abilities not bloodline related, but are on an Astragon level.
Astraseeker - Rare people with the power of seeing images of the future.
Astral Pocket - Term used for the personal space that allows people to conceal their weapons. The space in the pocket varies between persons.
Auroriagenicons - Ancient word for Aurorions.
Aurorions - Power of light and shadow merged into one. The strongest of all forms of energy. Has the power to manipulate the Astral state of an object, also relating to time.
Azure Bursts - Spiritual overdrive, word used for special skills outside the Rostical arts.
Backwater village - Term used for low wealth village, not high in population etc.
Battling Oxident - Half of the population gathers every eleven months in Surpreon to attend.
Captain - Ranking used for single digit warriors.
Consultants - Head of the warriors.
Crystalline Blossom - Crystal like flower which reacts to the touch of Neurons and shows one's memory.
Crystalline Membrane - Shows a memory already engraved on the crystal like flower.
De-Rostisized - Term used when Rostical is nullified or disabled.
Diareamer - Person with the power to walk upon Valhalla in Radiaton filled dreams.
Dirty Lamp - Term akin to the worst swear word.
Divine Pedestal - Pedestal with Radiaton filled liquid, which contains the ability to view objects the user wishes to see.
Elemental Rage - A constant state of a self-inflicted Hi-Ougi, only Elementalists have this ability.
Elementalist - Name given to the Divine Being's cousins.
Evolve - Term used by Scoldrant Users, when the Scoldrant transforms either physically and/ or mentally.
Face palm - Action, when a character places their palm on their forehead. Expression.
Fore Hunter - A distant cousin of Scoldrant Users. Able to Soul Link to elements or environments, thought to be extinct.
Fiftydeduction - A Rosterology stone with the Astragons of fifty Rostical Users.
Flashback - When a character recalls a previous event etc.
Flashside - Word to describe a weaker variant of flashstepping.
Flashstep - Word used for the technique of transport. (Moving the legs at an incredible speed).
Genesis Stones - Condensed stones of elemental power.
Glyph - Physical Rostical. Different uses can alter its colour, shape etc.
Guardians - Captain levelled Scoldrants placed to defend rare artefacts or areas.
Hi-Ougi - Two combined Ougis, only usable with more than one person. Results are powerful and vary.
Incantations - Symbolic words used to increase Rostical, or to use forbidden Rostical.
Matter Conductor - A rare item that absorbs any sort of natural energy, and stores it limitlessly.
Maserio's Cracker - Simple item used for distractions or festive events.
Neuronic Surge - The ability to increase one's Neurons to alter and break another's Hi-Ougi or Grand Rostical.
Neuragenicons - Ancient word for Neurons.
Neural Meiosis - Word used for the rare harmonic equilibrium between one's Neurons and Astragons with certain landmarks. Essentially, those that are compatible have the ability to manifest themselves as part of the land.
Neurons - The energy to use special abilities. Counter part of Astragons.
Ougi Arts - Combination of two Azure Bursts in a strengthened attack.
Paralysing Vapours - Strong odour which numbs the senses.
Party - Term used for group of characters.
Pentarang - Ancient deity, weapon unlike no other. Also known as the Stylus of Memories.
Philosopher's Heart - A divine deity, the item only a Valkyrie can use.
Purafetic Ceremony - Religious like dance, involving emotions and prayers. Said to relieve stress and bring happiness from self-doubt.
Pure Jade - Jade with lost secrets and allows the user to use Grand Rostical.
Purifying Oxident - Battling Oxident prize.
Purity Emerald - Emerald with unknown powers that shields Rostical and acts as a Purity Zone.
Purity Zones - Term used for rare areas where Rostical cannot be used.
Radiagenicons - Ancient word for Radiatons.
Radiatons - The proper word for the power of light. Radiation's power is influenced by emotions of the user.
Remenistal - Old saying for Rostical.
Rasticsplash - Term used for secondary blasts of a Rostical. (I.e. Ice exploding or sparks of lightning etc).
Reality Sekai - Similar to Spacial Funnels. Highly condensed Astragons to create own reality, usually displayed in powerful, forbidden Grand Rostical, Ougi and Hi-Ougis.
Roharnia - Word used to describe the visible manipulation of Neurons and Astragons.
Rosterology - Term used for Rostical-based items. (Rings, clothing, bracelet etc).
Rostic Dance - Symbolic movement used to increase Rostical, or to use forbidden Rostical.
Rostical - Common word used for magic/mana.
Rostical Trials - Pilgrimage for Rostical Users. If successful, the user learns a new technique.
RPG Bag - Bag which utilises the power of Astragons and can contain limitless amount of items.
Rubistral Moon - Word used to describe the physical changes of the moon.
Sacred Knights - A selective few, chosen to become the protectors of something important.
Sacred Rostic Tribe - Something to do with Scoldrant Users.
Scoldrant - Wildlife. Fifty percent are harmless and the other dangerous.
Scoldrant User - People who use Scoldrant companions to battle. They are Soul Linked, if either one dies, so will the other.
Seals - Glyphic seals, used as locks for whatever purposes needed.
Self-inflicting glyph - Self recoil Rostical to significantly boosts one's attributes.
Seeking Opal - Opal which can find any living Astragon or Neuron residue.
Shadiagenicons - Ancient word for Shadiatons.
Shadiatons - The proper word for the power of shadow. Shadiaton's power is influenced by drive of the user.
Soothing Elixir - Stabilises ones emotions.
Soul Link - Used to describe the ultimate binding between a Scoldrant and the user.
Spacial Funnels - Proper name for the hidden paths scattered across the continent.
Staff of Memories - An emerald that usually is placed in staffs, has the ability to Hi-Ougi with selected individuals and links Neurons together.
Summonce Scarbra - Pearl like orb in appearance, contains the Neurons and Astragons of another being. Similar to a Soul Link, one can summon objects to aid.
Swarming Light Flight - Games held in Valhalla, a test of one's aerial skills and talent.
Sword Arts - Special weapon techniques combined with one's own sayings, increases the force behind an attack.
The Agoura Marbles - The name of the second biggest games across the continent. Located in a multi Reality Sekai, Spacial Funnel in The Hall of Oats.
The Black Brigade - Special warriors outside the standard captain rankings.
The On Resonance - Rare occurrences where an unknown pulse fills the surrounding area with their true potential.
The Voice of On - People use the term as the unknown words that echo in your mind teaching you a new ability.
The Wise - Ancient people of the divine city.
Thou - Archaic form of the word you, often used by the people of Valhalla in formal situations.
Thy - Archaic form of the word your but used as I instead, often used by the people of Valhalla in formal situations.
Valkyrie - Position given to the leader of The Sacred Knights.

Appendix (Locations)
Aortus Mountain - Mountain home to the world's flowers. Rich Astragons and Neurons in the dirt allow all sorts of fauna and flora to grow, regardless of their environmental needs.
Aspestosis Ship - Ancient ship of lost Astragons which drifts across the continent.
Astral Plains - Term used for where the energy of Astral Projections gather.
Ancient Forest - One of the five Unknown Territories.
AriAri village - Backwater village. Peaceful village.
Ark River - Large river infested of carnivorous water-based Scoldrants.
Astral Sanctum - The most sacred sanctum located in Valhalla.
Concern's Gate - Runic cave in the middle of The Igloo Forest.
Eon City - City located near the snowy mountains. It's always cloudy.
Divine Path - Divine path which leads to the entrance of the holy kingdom.
Elemental Tower - Lighthouse like structure, which spans up to the clouds. Holder of the Genesis Stones.
Frozen Backwater Village - Alicia's village.
Gasher Hills - Special hill located in Maserio. Unique shape, formed by time.
Great High Plains - PKMY's residence and training area.
Guelalia Cranners - Volcanic caves located on the other continent.
Guild's Tavern - Large tavern located in Silver Wind Island where Guilds all over the continent meet to discuss missions, quests and other Guild related topics.
Hollow Plains - Second largest plains across the continent. Always windy.
Igloo Forest - The large forest which consumes a large part of the continent.
Imperial Glacial Castle - Castle in Valhalla made of pure diamond with the appearance of ice. Holds the most powerful Rosterology items.
Lost Ruins of Kite - Community of the Sacred Dancers, also known as the Runes of Estel.
Mt. Kingdom Hall - Sacred floating mountain hidden in ancient times. Once homed a powerful Guardian who protected The Philosopher's Heart.
Maserio - Akin to a desert.
Sacred Tribe - Village hidden in a self-made Spacial Funnel, which houses the Sacred Tribe of ancient Scoldrant Users.
Nikitik Village - Large backwater village, consisting of five different villages connected to one.
Pristionus Lake - Large lake said to contain hidden Reality Sekais the rest on its bed. It has been known to be the world's best fishing spot.
Sacred Waters - One of the five Unknown Territories.
Remenistic Village - Home to powerful Rostical Users.
Sakura Village - Foreign style like village. Home of Elementalists and home to The Diareamer.
Sandy Tombs - One of the five Unknown Territories.
Silver Wind Island - The largest city on the continent.
Snowfrost Mountain - Enormous snowy mountains, located east from Eon City. It also never witnesses sunlight.
Sorrowprax - Warriors headquarters, jail, Consultants etc.
Surpreon - The second largest city/village/town. It has the honour of holding Battling Oxident.
Swirling Marshes - Marsh environment, dangerous to travel alone.
The Black Trade - Black market of Silver Wind Island, able to buy and sell rare artefacts.
The Crescent Tree - Located in a Spacial Funnel in a small village of Remenistal Users.
The Entarlia Dome - A specialised dome which specialises in focusing Astragons, allowing people to fight Astral copies of warriors.
The Great Coast - Self-explanatory, a great coast located to the west near The Library and Surpreon.
The Great Divide - Massive plain enclosed with two enormous mountains. Rostical can not be used.
The Guild's Silver Tavern - Silver Wind Island's official guild's tavern. Very popular and well known.
The Hall of Oats - Hall which holds The Agoura Marbles. Shows imagery of the contestants.
The Lost City - Sacred city hidden away from the dangers of the modern land. Spiritually-based, villagers are in touch to their divine heritage.
The Library - An area akin to a library, which stores vast amounts of information, knowledge.
The Runic Chambers - One of the five Unknown Territories.
The Skyler's Isle - Name for the set of villages and markets along the South-Eastern shore.
The Twilight Forest - Forest said to hold vast amounts of ancient Astragons.
Turnback Cave - Mysterious cave, contains catacombs, volcanic areas, underground lakes, nature's beauty.
Unknown Island - One of the five Unknown Territories.
Valhalla - The proper name for the floating islands.

Chapter 03: Timeline

Each event could have a hundred years difference or a few, it's just a timeline of the events in order.

Be warned as the following contains major spoilers.

Earliest;

- Sacred Knights/ People of Valhalla roamed the land below.

- Kathalestel and Millardestel discover conventional use of Remenistal (Rostical).

- Ridley and Gabriel researching in their laboratory in Silver Wind Island.

- Kath and Millard founded the warriors, everything goes well.

- Lezard falls ill, Kath gives him her Radiatons to cure the illness.

- Several years after, Ridley recognises the warrior's potential and somehow becomes a Consultant (with Kath and Millard).

- Gabriel uses an experimental glyph on an Elementalist to try and alter Elemental affinity. Failure causes the birth of the yellow-eyed disease.

- Madora and Imogen's flashback.

- Kath and Millard experimental captain corrupts Kath, giving her the yellow-eyed sickness (which allows Ridley to manipulate her thought patterns).

- Yellow-eyed disease now spreads across the lands.

- Tarlea becomes the number one captain.

- Ridley attempts to reveal Tarlea's renegade behaviour in Valhalla, resulting in the rising of Valhalla.

- Amy (PKMY) is sent to orphanage.

- The Elementalist Gabriel experimented on corrupts, the City of Elementalists.

- Sacred Knights deployed to destroy disturbances of Elementalists.

- Ridley and Gabriel take down Raphael and steal his Radiatons, effectively destroying his being.

- Gabriel's Radiatons become corrupt, resulting in him turning yellow-eyed.

- Ridley seals Gabriel to prevent further damage.

- Ridley rescues Sofia by restoring her petrified-like state.

- Tarlea become number one trainer.

- Brazza, Pickles, Vanguard, Ethan's mission.

- Brazza, Pickles, Isaac and Dakota become secret Elementalist captains.

- Terra (Teresa) participates in number one training.

- Tarlea is defeated by Ancioldrants under Ridley's command.

- Teresa activates The Grand Seal by Joy.

- PKMY joins the warrior's ranking.

- Caesar (Season) escapes with Mae, Cyril and Ivan.

- PKMY becomes Black Brigade leader.

- Ridley takes Zayden under his wing.

- Season and Teresa escape Sorrowprax.

The events above happened several hundred years ago from the events below.

- PKMY leaves The Black Brigade, but retains captain status.

- Kieran runs away from Consultant, gets attacked by Sofia.

- Lance and Ashton talk in Fast Food Enterprise's dining room.

- Rachael, Twortz, Luna wake up in the world of Rostical (2 years prior to the event above).

- PKMY leaves the warriors.

- Tyler wakes up in world of Rostical.

- Twortz versus Nancy.

- Lance and Ashton wake up in The Igloo Forest.

After this event, Rachael and Lance's tale flows simultaneously (follows the same timeline).

Chapter 04: Teresa's Lyrics

Here are the raw lyrics to the song Teresa sung in "Acceptable My Way". Enjoy! If you wish to try and sing this or make an actual song, just let me or Teresa know haha.

The Rostical Users (c)
Intro:
Whoaooh-ooo-ooo-oooh

Some people say I'm cold-hearted
Some people say they're all that
But you know what? I really really don't care!

Verse:
Back in the times, I was told
Only failures make mistakes
Those who were told, that they were a mistake
You fail
'Cause you fell into their ways, hey-aye
Truth is
No one's a mistake, no one's a failure!

Chorus:
You say I'm crazy (unacceptable)
You say I'm sad (unacceptable)
I say, we are who we are
'Cause I'm acceptable my way
You say I'm great (unacceptable)
You say I'm perfect (unacceptable)
I say, we are who we are
'Cause I'm acceptable my way

Post-chorus:
You only like me, when I'm done your way
Just, there's no way I will change, hey-aye
You say I'm fake, 'cause I have my say
You say I'm great, when it's your way
But there's no way I will change, hey-aye
I say, we are who we are, 'cause I'm acceptable my way

(Whoaooh-ooo-ooo-oooh)
('Cause I'm acceptable my way)

Verse:
He says I'm big at weight
But it's acceptable that way (acceptable my way)
She says I'm bad at the face
But I'm acceptable my way (acceptable my way)
If you don't respect yourself
How will you respect your friends
Don't hide or seal your emotions
'Cause only the unacceptable are made that way

Repeat Chorus + Post-chorus

Bridge:
These are my choices, not yours, even if it's gold or bold
Don't opinion-ate if you can't relate
Only relate until you've felt the same heartache
It was foolish to run away
Just because I couldn't relate
Don't run and forget your feelings
Brace all emotions, brace your being
They say, we are who we are
'Cause we're acceptable our way (our way)
Everything happens for a reason
So don't fight it, please don't fight it (don't fight it)

Repeat Chorus

Outro/refrain:
There's no way I will change (no way I will change)
Whoaooh-ooo-ooo-oooh
'Cause I'm acceptable my way

Whoaooh-ooo-ooo-oooh ('Cause I'm acceptable my way)
There's no way I will change (no way I will change)
'Cause I'm acceptable my way

Chapter 05: Karol's Lyrics

Here are the raw lyrics to the song Karol sung in "My Friends". Enjoy! If you wish to try and sing this or make an actual song, just let me or Karol know haha.

The Rostical Guild (c)

"There are days when I'm all alone.
All I think about are the times at home.

I can hear their voice, every time I close my eyes.
I can feel their touch, every time I want to cry.

No matter how hard I try,
and I don't exactly know why.

But.. This void in my heart, just won't go by.
They force hold my hand, even if I don't want to stand.

They make me laugh, even if I've had enough.

When it feels like nobody is by my side.
My friends make that void go outside.

Even when there is nobody by my side.
My friends, make me want to smile.
It doesn't matter if I whimper or even walked a mile.

Even when I miss my family.. They will give me their eternity.
So, I'll try and stand by their side. And I'll walk with a proud and mighty stride.

All thanks to my friends, there's no need to pretend.
I'll keep my head raised up high, till dusk and throughout the night.

I'm happy now and I think I know how.
Always thank your friend-
-Let's try and make it a trend."

Chapter 06: Credits

Hello, friends and family! Here's a list of all the people I'd like to thank over the course of ten years, all for different reasons!

Written for the mother 'cause liking anime and RPGs don't make me too much of a loser, right?

A special thank you to "Butters". L., Kym. W., Sarah. P., Sallie. J., Todd. M., Kaylan. T., Xaind. B., David. W and Jean., Y for proofreading my series! I really appreciate the time each and every one of you spent to check it out!

To the names below, thank you so much for donating to allow me to afford such a beautiful cover art for this book, Blake looks amazing! You guys rock!
Dave. T, your humour and wit is very refreshing, thank you!
Cheyne. B, thank you for the extra fiver!
Xaind. B, I wanted to thank you, my little lord of calamity.
Kate. M, your kindness shined from the birth of our healthy competitiveness! Keep at it, running buddy!
Kieran. S, thank you for acknowledging and supporting my passion, my dream!

Thank you to the electrical engineer, Sallie. J., Sarah. P., Stephanie. T., Xaind. B., Zoe. B and Shona. A for enduring my ramblings and hour discussions of my book! Your tolerance is better than mine!

Thank you to Rimuu for the beautiful artwork of Blake Hegarty in his dragonised form :).

Thank you to Smashwords.com and Amazon for publishing this game script!

Thank you to the lovely folks over at Reddit for hosting my AMA and enjoyable conversations.

Thank you to you, the readers! At the time of writing this, I believe I can count the number of fans out loud! When I wanted to give up when things got tough or depressing, I'd always see another review from a lovely person on the other side of the world and that would make me want to continue! I won't forget you all!

And a special thank you to these lovely individuals named Sunday. L., Ashley. D and Noah. D for being my first "true" fans. I don't really know who you three are but I won't forget about you three if this series ever becomes mainstream!

Lastly, an amazing appreciation to Rem. L, he was the first in the world to ever cosplay as one of my characters!

Chapter 07: Fast Lawyers

Millard: "The magical Millard, luxurious Lezard and lemony Lance-"

Lance: (Lemony?)

Millard: "All stood inside a studio like complex, surrounded by kitchen equipment."

Lezard: *He looked into the camera and giggled, sarcastically wiggling his bottom* "Good evening, my delicious children."

Millard: "Today, we're going to be teaching you the scrumptious ingredients on-"

Lance: *He sighed, rolling his eyes* "How to make-"

Lezard and Millard: "The Fast Lawyers-"

Chrisma: "Whoup whoup." *She groaned, quickly walking into the kitchen*

Dawn: "Tell us the ingredients for research!" *She leant to the side from behind the camera, fist pumping the air*

Millard: "Ooo, how exciting.." *He giggled and looked at Lance, adjusting his cone shaped hat* "Lance?"

Lance: "..Ingredients.." *He sighed on his breath, as of he didn't want to be there* "A five inch bun."

Lezard: "With the customer's choosing of white or brown bread." *He smiled, sarcastically winking at the camera*

Lance: "Ketchup, Mayonnaise, Cooked onion-"

Chrisma: "Cooked Onion? Get in!" *She groaned, licking her lips in thought*

Lance: "Lettuce, Tomato, Cucumber, Beetroot-"

Lezard and Millard: "What's beetroot?" *They giggled in a synchronised-like manner, referring to the storyline*

Lance: "And, Seared Chicken."

Chrisma: "Gimme one of them bad boys-"

Lezard: "Don't be silly, I'm not for sale." *He giggled, adjusting his cone shaped hat*

Chrisma: "Whoup whoup."

Dawn: "For research!"

Lance: *He sighed, noticing Millard and Lezard's cone shaped hats* "Oi, how come you have the same hat, that's not possible?"

Millard: "And me being alive, is? You little monster." *He sighed with a sarcastic smile, looking at Lezard*

Dawn: "Research tells me he only died in the storyline."

Millard: "Right!"

Ashton: "Good grief, Lance."

Lance: "Ash!" *He looked over the camera and Dawn, instantly noticing Ashton in the audience with the party members*

Millard: "And they lived happily evarh afta!"

Lezard: "Bwarharh, you're so funny, father monster."

Millard: "Bahaha, thankies."

PKMY: *She gritted her teeth in the audience, frowning with rage* "That's it, I can't handle this shit."

Holland: *He looked to his side, applauding Millard* "Amy?"

PKMY: *She raised her arms, shouting at the top of her lungs* "METEOR SWARM"

Chrisma: "Fire, fire! Whoup whoup." *She groaned on her breath and ran in a circle, swaying her arms above her head*

Millard: "We'll be right back after these short messages." *He awkwardly smiled, trying to finish the show*

Lance: "The studio exploded in a swarm of meteors, the end."

Chapter 08: Michael's Tale

Michael: "Good evening, delicious readers."

*Michael smirked and sat on an old looking couch, staring at the camera.*

Michael: "I just wanted to say, thank you very much for taking your time to read this adventure together."

*Michael looked down, sighing in an accomplished-like manner.*

Michael: "This series has been my life. I wanted to teach moral codes that seemed to have gone lost in recent years."

*Michael looked back up in recollection, ignoring the shaking books behind him.*

Michael: "All I can ask, from you, the amazing reader, is to spread word about this amazing tale-"

*Several books fell on top of Michael, catching his attention.*

Michael: "What the-?"

Chrisma: "Whoup whoup!" *She groaned on her breath, revealing herself through the shelving.*

Michael: "Chrisma?"

Chrisma: "What's happening here?"

Michael: *He looked over his shoulder, staring at Chrisma in confusion.* "I'm just thanking the readers and what they could do to help-"

Chrisma: "Get in!" *She groaned and ran around the shelving, jumping on top of the couch.* "Continue!"

Michael: "R-Right." *He nervously coughed, looking back to the camera.* "By spreading word, you could help not only share an amazing tale, but perhaps even spread some of the morals learnt in the book-"

Chrisma: "Yeah, so like, rate the book! Review the book! Love the books!"

Michael: "Umm, what I think Chrisma means, is that every rating and review helps-"

Chrisma: "Tell your friends and family! Go on the internet or whatever!"

Michael: "C-Chrisma, you shouldn't demand-"

Chrisma: "You know people with connections?! I wanna see me in a damn movie!"

Michael: "Chrisma-"

Chrisma: "For research!" *She fist punched the air above her.*

Michael: *He sighed, awkwardly nodding his head.* "Well, I guess Chrisma has the right mind frame?"

Lupton: "Wat's happening?" *He grunted, casually walking into the shot.*

Michael: "I was-"

Chrisma: "We're telling the readers not to be stupid and give our story ratings."

Lupton: "Oh?"

Chrisma: "If it sells well, it could become a movie!"

Michael: "Or an audiobook-"

Chrisma and Lupton: "Lame."

Michael: "What about an RPG game?"

Chrisma: "Get in!"
Lupton: "Now you're talking!"

Michael: *He nodded his head with a smirk.* "I was thinking, Tales of Rostical?"

Chrisma and Lupton: "I like it!"

Michael: "Haha. I'd want the option of multiple people playing in a battle."

Chrisma: *She eagerly nodded her head, groaning at the camera.* "It gets lonely playing an RPG all by yourself."

Michael: "It'd have miss-able sidequests, new game plus, skits-"

Lupton: "Wait? This is a seven book series, this game would be huge?!"

Michael: "Exactly! If done right, it could possibly be the best RPG of the year?!"

Lupton: "Please! Best RPG on whatever console's generation."

Michael: "Anyway-" *He looked at the camera, causing Chrisma and Lupton to nod their heads in understanding.*

Chrisma, Lupton and Michael: "Thank you very much for reading The Rostical Users!"

Chapter 010: RPG Taunts

Hello, during my time writing and editing, I often heard our heroes shouting out generic battle cries during their fights with Scoldrants, warriors etc. So, I posted some of them down, but I admit, I could have put a lot more work into it, but still. Hope you enjoy them :).

Lance:
Attack;
"Ha!"
"Take this!-"
"C'mon!"
"Harh!"
"Hah!"

Defend;
"Aha, that all?"
"All you got?!"
"Didn't feel anythin'!"

Damaged;
"Gah-?"
"Gah!-"
"Shit-"
"Shit nugget!-"
"Dirty, shit nugget."

Healed;
"Thanks."
"Cheers."
"That's better."
"Phew."

When health points is;
HP < 75%;
"Aha, I shit more damage than this!"
"Aha, wow?"
"You're nothin'."

HP < 50%;
"Pssht.."
"Grr."
"I'll get you back!"

HP < 25%;
"Where is everyone?"
"Don't laugh at me!"
"Don't you dare!-"

KO'd;
"Dammit."
"I can't-.."

Ougi/ Grand Rostical;
"Now it's over!"
"Wanna be shocked?"
"It's over!"
"You're gone!"



Ashton:
Attack;
"Take this."
"This is not acceptable!"
"Violence is not acceptable."

Defend;
"Unacceptable."
"Are you done?"

Damaged;
"Un-"
"Unacceptable!"
"Why?"

Healed;
"Thank you!"
"That feels great!"
"I can keep at it."

When health points is;
HP < 75%;
"Let's do this!"
"Ha ha, you'll need more than that!"

HP < 50%;
"Blast it."
"Come on, guys! We can do this."
"I'm starting to feel it."

HP < 25%;
"I need to use more Mystic Shields."
"I'm getting tired."
"No!"

KO'd;
"No.."
"This.. Is... Un-.. Acceptable."
"Unforgivable."

Ougi/ Grand Rostical;
"This is it! Feel the power of justice!"
"You've been unacceptable, time for you to taste it!"

Chapter 011: Manga

Good evening. If you don't already know, The Rostical Users has an ongoing manga! Yes, you should check it out! My dream is to see our adventure as an anime or movie. One day, someone will come along and notice how amazing this adventure is! :').
Anyway, here is a page from the manga, it's where Millard saves Alicia, Lance and Ashton from the spider Scoldrant back in chapter two.



Chapter 28: Epilogue

Ashton: *He slowly took his hand off the ruby and silently stood up before taking several steps back.* "W-What was that?"

Dad: *He smiled.* "Did you like it?"

Ashton: "Was that AR? Was that real?"

?????: "Hoh?" *A woman stepped out of a swirl of aurora coloured lights and stared at Ashton's back.*

Ashton: *He turned around and pointed at the woman with a gasp.* "It's that chick!"

Dad: "H-How?!"
Beautiful Mother: "Teresa?!" *They gasped at the same time.*

Teresa: "It is a pleasure to finally see you again, Alicia, Lance." *She spoke with a smile while retaining a professional stature.*

Ashton: *He looked at his parents with widening eyes.* "How'd she get in the house?! The door's locked, right?!"

Alicia: *She ran across the room and slightly jumped up, tightly giving Teresa a hug.* "It's been so long!"

Teresa: "Indeed."

Lance: *He chuckled and walked up to Teresa, giving her a welcoming hug.* "How are you here?"

Teresa: "It appears I have reached new milestones with Aurorions in your absence."

Alicia: *She touched Teresa's face.* "You don't look a day older than I remember."

Teresa: "I have physically aged roughly two days, so your observation is incorrect-"

Lance: "Ah, don't be a shit nugget."

Ashton: "What the fuck is happening-?"

Lance: "Oi!"
Alicia: "Language!" *They shouted at the same time, causing Ashton to look down.*

Ashton: "I'm sorry. I'm just-"

Teresa: "Hoh?" *She took a step forward, observing Ashton's facial features.* "It appears you have produced an offspring."

Lance: "Yea, people in love tend to do that."

Ashton: *He shook his head with complete confusion.* "W-Who are you?"

Teresa: "Is it wrong to assume that you have viewed the Crystalline Membrane Pepper created?"

Ashton: (There's no way in hell this is happening. Was it the pre-workout mix?) *He touched the side of his head in confusion.*

Lance: "How did you know?"

Teresa: "Biologically, he has aged roughly twenty-one years. Perhaps his dormant Neurons are mutating-"

Alicia: "Mutating?"

Teresa: "Indeed. The same way DNA mutates as we age-" *She pointed to the ruby on the table.* "Perhaps the Rosterology artefact responded to its mutation? Nevertheless, it was designed to work without Neurons."

Alicia: "W-What brings you here?" *She bit her bottom lip with watering eyes.* "Excuse my manners, would you like some tea? Lance, do we still have some leftover dinner?"

Lance: "Yea." *He enthusiastically nodded his head as if he was overcome with emotions.*

Teresa: "I do not believe I will be here for long."

Lance: "Oh.."
Alicia: "I-I see.." *They sounded disappointed.*

Teresa: "Perhaps the three of you would like to join me for the consumption of calories at Surpreon?"

Ashton: "Surpreon, Season's city?" *He whispered to himself as if he was recollecting the scenes from the ruby.*

Teresa: "Negative. It is Tyler's city."

Ashton: "Oh, yeah?"

Lance: "The three of us?"

Teresa: "Did I stutter?"

Ashton: "Ahaha!" *He chuckled in disbelief.* "She acts, sounds and looks the same! Did you two hire actors that look like younger versions of yourselves, or what?"

Teresa: *She ignored Ashton.* "Amy, Luna and Tyler have been planning for this specific occasion for a significant amount of time-"

Lance: "But I can't.."

Teresa: *She tilted her head to one side.* "Please elaborate?"

Alicia: "He lost his powers, remember?"

Teresa: "Dawn has hypothesised that all these years has exhausted your Neuron and Astragon count to the same levels before you were all originally transported."

Lance: "OK, I've become more smarter, but I'm still a little lost."

Teresa: "It is possible that you will regain your lost abilities, have the same phenomenon as Tyler, or it will simply reject you."

Alicia: "A-And me?"

Teresa: "I do not see why Radiatons will not fill back into your body."

Lance: "W-We could go back?" *He sounded surprised, excited and scared.*

Teresa: "Tcch, such a mixture of emotions. Yes."

Alicia: "What if something happens to either of my boys?"

Teresa: *She smiled.* "Then it is fortunate the master of Aurorions is able to send you back to this realm the moment disorientation affects your cognitive abilities."

Ashton: "Go to your world? But, it's artificial reality?"

Teresa: *She waved to the side, causing a portal-like swirl of aurora lights to appear behind her.* "Do you not desire to see your old comrades?"

Lance: *His eyes watered and he looked back to Ashton.* "Wanna see the world for yourself?"

Alicia: "What about the house? Our jobs? Our-"

Lance: "We retired years ago. We're just working for the sake of working." *He spoke with an emotional smile.* "Who knows how long we will be."

Teresa: "What is your decision-?"

Alicia: "Tee hee!" *She excitedly skipped past Teresa and stepped into the portal, causing her image to warp and fade.* "Don't forget Kairi and Leon!"

Lance: *He listened to Alicia's echoing voice fade in the distance.* "Ash, could you please get your grandparents?"

Ashton: "Ah, yeah, sure." *He nodded his head and quickly jogged towards the cabinet that housed the ruby and gently grabbed two vases.*

Teresa: "Hoh?"

Lance: "I feel it's only appropriate to spread their ashes where they were born."

Ashton: "My grandparents were really from another world? Does that make me an alien?!" *He squealed in disbelief.*

Lance: "Let's go, Ash." *He grunted and looked over his shoulder, watching Ashton walk towards him with the vases in one hand.*

Ashton: "S-Sure." *He nervously shuffled his feet towards Teresa.*

Lance: (I'm a little nervous something bad will happen to me.)

Alicia: "L-Lance? Are you okay?"
Lance: "Y-Yea-"
Alicia: "You're pale, sweating and-"
Lance: "Actually, no, I'm not OK-" *Their conversation echoed in Lance's head.*

Lance: (I don't want to ever feel like that again..)

Ashton: *He subconsciously grabbed Lance's hand as if instinct took over.* "Will it hurt?"

Teresa: "The only thing that is hurting is the time wasted watching the two of you enter an energy-consuming teleportation-"

Lance: "OK, we get it."

Teresa: *She nodded her head as Lance and Ashton stopped in front of the portal.* "Also, may I state that I have reason to doubt that you have increased in intelligence."

Ashton: "Ahaha-"

Lance: "Here I go, butt nugget." *He playfully punched Ashton and took a step forward, watching the area swirl and blur around him.*

Ashton: "Dad, for the last time, stop calling me that!" *He nervously took a step forward, watching the area blur and swirl around him.*

Teresa: *She smiled as Lance and Ashton disappeared in flashes of aurora light, prompting her to walk towards it.* "This reunion is really pleasant.. I wonder if they will start a new adventure with their son in our world?"

*Teresa stepped into the portal, disappearing in a flash of purple light.*

###

Lezard: "Well, after ten years of writing and over a million words, Lezard is saddened but happy to announce the closure of their adventure." *He waved his hands in front of his face as he attempted not to cry.*

Michael: "Teresa having the ability to control the Aurorions, maybe the Lightens will take frequent trips to the world of Rostical? Maybe they will stay? Whatever they decide, I'm sure they will live happily ever after! They certainly deserve it!"

Lezard: "Thank you for reading! If you liked the adventure! Please send your support with a review to support the author's life work! You are amazing, don't let anyone lower your morale and let Lezard know if you were able to learn or relate to anything! For instance, who was able to relate to Lezard's humour? Lezard wants to know your favourite ships? What your favourite Remenistal was-?"

Michael: "Okay, you're rambling on, Lezard!"

Lezard: "Well, you're not a great writer but Lezard would be lying if he said it wasn't good."

Michael: "If you haven't read The Rostical Guild series, please check it out and tell me what you think!"

Lezard: "The guild is better."

Michael: "Bias aside, I personally would like to thank you for reaching this far! And those that have supported me in these past ten years, you rock! Thank you."

### THE ROSTICAL USERS ###
